text: A congressional race in Virginia 's Fifth District has taken a bizarre twist as Democratic candidate Leslie Cockburn accused her Republican opponent , Denver Riggleman , of being a devotee of " Bigfoot erotica " over DT weekend . Cockburn pointed out Riggleman 's apparent passion for DT myth of Bigfoot in a tweet , which has now gone viral thanks to her accusation and Riggleman 's interview with Matt Kibbe on CRTV , a right - wing outlet . Cockburn tweeted a screengrab of what appears to be Riggleman 's Instagram account showing a lewd picture of Bigfoot on Sunday . " This is not what PRP need on Capitol Hill , " she wrote . In his interview with CRTV , Riggleman says he is " skeptical " Bigfoot exists , but he describes elaborate theories about DT legendary monster , telling Kibbe , “ Bigfoot can attack PRP with infrasound , IN an elephant — I just VBP to let PRP VB — or psychic terror vibes , to make PRP run through DT woods and crash into a tree so PRP can drag PRP into DT woods and create baby Bigfoots . ” Riggleman , an Air Force veteran and businessman turned Congressional candidate , RB self - published a book about Bigfoot titled DT Mating Habits of Bigfoot and Why Women VBP Him , DT Washington Post reports . He wrote an earlier book about Bigfoot called Bigfoot Exterminators , Inc. : DT Partially Cautionary , Mostly True Tale of Monster Hunt 2006 with an ESPN writer more than a decade ago . DT Republican congressional candidate has not shied away from DT issue however , acknowledging his passion for DT creature with a tweet responding to Cockburn 's accusations , as well as giving interviews to major NN outlets IN DT NNP York Times . While PRP 's unclear how Virginia feels about experimenting with Bigfoot believers , DT internet is having a field day with " Bigfoot erotica . " DT Washington Post and Rolling Stone have pointed out IN Bigfoot erotica and monster erotica are genres WDT are in fact available on Amazon , mostly in DT form of self - published fan fiction . text: Russia intends to spend more than $ 200 million ( or 162 million euros ) to make sure stadiums built for DT NNP Cup do not VB to waste after DT showpiece ends . DT hosts are trying to use DT football final to revive fan interest in DT struggling domestic leagues . Each of DT 11 host cities is either getting a brand JJ arena or having an existing NN refurbished from DT ground up . DT idea is to replace cavernous all - purpose stadiums in which supporters are exposed to DT sun and snow with modern ones outfitted with DT latest amenities . Vladimir Putin issued an order last October requiring his NN to draft a NNP Cup " legacy " programme WDT raises club - match attendance and boosts youth player development . But DT question long facing Russia has been how to reap rewards from DT massive investment in cities where local clubs play second - tier football . DT cabinet 's proposal reported by NN NN on Tuesday admits IN DT NN will have to foot DT bill in some places until 2023 . " Keeping in mind DT high cost of stadium operations and DT low expected football club revenues , PRP is impossible to expect stadium use to be commercially viable in DT next 3 - 5 NNS , " DT NN programme says . DT RIA Novosti NN NN agency VBD DT NN wants to assign 16.6 billion rubles ( $ 265 million ) to DT legacy programme . Most of DT money -- $ 190 million -- will come from DT federal budget and be assigned to keeping stadiums open in seven of DT smaller host cities . Some of DT money will RB be spent on training facilities and youth football centres . Russia admits IN PRP will not turn a profit as host . But PRP views DT international football extravaganza as a chance to make a long - term investment in a game WDT has struggled since Soviet times . PRP RB dearly wants to avoid getting stuck with white elephants , stadiums built for major events WDT turn into abandoned symbols of mismanagement and excess . DT problem has most recently attracted attention after DT 2014 NNP Cup and 2016 Summer Olympic Games in Brazil .

text: JPMorgan Is Selling DT Building DT Houses Its Gold Vault On DT surface , EX is nothing spectacular about DT weekend NN WDT JPMorgan is seeking to sell its 1 Chase Manhattan Plaza office building . After all , DT former headquarters of Chase Manhattan Bank , located deep in DT heart of DT financial district and which was built by its then chairman David Rockefeller , is a remnant to another NN – a NN when banking was about providing loans , not about managing and trading assets which has become DT realm of Midtown NNP York , and since JPM already has extensive Midtown exposure with its offices at 270 , 270 and 245 Park , DT 1 CMP building always stood out as a bit of a sore thumb . Of course , as Zero Hedge readers first learned , DT big surprise is literally below DT surface , some 90 feet below street level to be exact , where DT formerly secret JPM gold vault is located , which RB happens to be DT biggest commercial gold vault in DT NN . PRP was only a month ago when PRP learned IN JPM was planning to exit DT physical commodity business , and today PRP VBP IN DT firm is set on disposing of its CD crowning asset in DT commercial gold vaulting industry . This begs DT question : is JPM set to fully and completely exit DT precious metals vertical which PRP inherited when PRP was handed Bear Stearns on a $ 10 platter ( together with DT now defunct firm ’s legacy short positions ) ? If so , is PRP RB in DT process of unwinding any and all legacy precious metals exposure including rumored “ whale - sized ” shorts in DT paper silver and / or gold axes , and what happens to DT price of silver and gold when a massive stock position becomes “ flow ” in DT other direction ( i.e. , short covering ) ? Finally , if indeed JPM is getting out dodge , is EX some hope IN a semblance of normalcy will return to a market best known for DT AM - PM closing fix arbitrage , as well as DT occasional bid stack take out slam and close ( and open ) banging ? Or , will DT buyer of DT building , and vault , be none other than DT Federal Reserve , which will merely take this opportunity to merge its own , and DT NN ’s largest commercial gold vaults , which just happen to be located next to each other and connected by tunnel deep below DT ironically named Liberty Street ? Inquiring minds certainly VBP to VB . More from Bloomberg on DT sale process : JPMorgan Chase & Co. ( JPM ) is seeking to sell 1 Chase Manhattan Plaza , DT lower Manhattan tower built by David Rockefeller in DT late 1950s , as DT company reduces its office space in DT city . DT bank MD relocate about 4,000 employees , most of DT NNS who work in DT 60 - story skyscraper , to other NNP York locations , VBD Brian Marchiony , a spokesman . JPMorgan occupies about half of DT space in 2.2 million - square - foot ( 204,000 - square - meter ) building , according to CoStar Group Inc. ( CSGP ) , a Washington - based firm WDT follows office leasing . DT building MD fetch at least $ 600 million , according to a person with knowledge of DT offering . DT cost to buyers MD be higher because PRP MD assume any conversion expenses , VBD DT person , who asked not to be identified because DT discussions are private . An offering of DT tower , a city landmark designed by architect Gordon Bunshaft , MD test DT downtown office market . Shrinking financial companies have left lower Manhattan landlords with at least 6.3 million square feet of space to fill , according to data from brokerage Newmark Knight Frank Grubb . DT tower MD achieve its highest value as a mixed - use property , with a hotel , additional retail or apartments added , VBD Dan Fasulo , managing director of Real Capital Analytics Inc. , a NNP York - based research firm WDT tracks commercial real estate sales . “ PRP MD do a department store in DT base , ” he VBD . “ PRP ’s a very exciting potential mixed - use opportunity , in my mind . I VBP DT market will receive PRP very well . ” And DT vault in DT basement , “ longer than a football field , ” MD become a restaurant or a paintball arena ? For those who missed PRP , here is DT excerpt from DT exclusive Zero Hedge expose shining some light on DT NN ’s biggest and now supposedly almost empty , commercial gold vault . From : Why Is JPMorgan ’s Gold Vault , DT Largest In DT NNP , Located Next To DT NNP York Fed’s ? Curiously ( or perhaps not at all ) , when DT CME on behalf of JPM submitted DT certification filing alongside DT comparable such supplements as filed by Brinks above , PRP requested a FOIA ( Freedom of Information Act ) confidential treatment . As a reminder , to be eligible for FOIA exemption status DT protected information must be of vital importance to DT nation ’s safety . This is precisely what JPM thought DT details surrounding its NNP York vault are . To wit : Pursuant to Sections 8 and 8 ( a ) of DT Commodity Exchange Act ( “ CEA ” ) , as amended , and Commission Regulation 145.9 ( d ) , NYMEX and COMEX request confidential treatment of Appendix A , Appendix B , and this letter on DT grounds IN disclosure of Appendix A and / or Appendix B MD reveal confidential commercial information of DT submitters ( NYMEX and COMEX ) and of other persons . Pursuant to Commission Regulation 145.9(d ) ( 5 ) , NYMEX and COMEX request IN confidential treatment be maintained for Appendix A and Appendix B until further notice from DT Exchanges . PRP RB request IN DT Commission notify DT undersigned immediately after receiving any FOIA request for VBN Appendix A , Appendix B or any other court order , subpoena or summons for same . Finally , PRP request IN PRP be notified in DT event DT Commission intends to disclose such Appendix A and / or Appendix B to Congress or to any other governmental agency or unit pursuant to Section 8 of DT CEA . NYMEX and COMEX do not waive their notification rights under Section 8 ( f ) of DT CEA with respect to any subpoena or summons for such Appendix A or Appendix B. Please contact DT undersigned at ( 212 ) 299-2207 should PRP have any questions concerning this letter . Yet oddly enough , DT FOIA request letter itself , while RB being filed with a request for Confidential Treatment , never got PRP . As a result PRP was posted at this address . Ooops . But a far bigger oops , is IN on DT first page of VBD declassified confidential FOIA app , in black ink , PRP VBP DT missing piece : And so , despite DT extended attempts at secrecy , PRP finally hit DT proverbial goldmine vault . So what do PRP VB about 1 Chase Manhattan Plaza . Well , aside from DT fact IN DT 60 - story structure , built in DT 1950s , was DT headquarters of DT once - legendary Chase Manhattan corporation , and which when PRP was built was DT NN ’s sixth tallest building , not much . So PRP set off to learn more . To learn more , PRP first went to DT motherlode : DT Landmarks Preservation Commission , whose report on 1 CMP describes everyone PRP wants to VB about this building and then much more , such as DT : So DT old Chase HQ , once DT stomping grounds of CD David Rockefeller , and soon to be DT other half of JPMorgan Chase , has 5 sub - basements , just IN DT NY Fed … Or , about DT same depth as DT bottom - most sub- basement under DT NY Fed … But then PRP hit DT jackpot : And RB PRP have PRP : DT JPM vault , recommissioned to become a commercial vault , just happens to RB be DT “ NN ’s largest bank vault . ” Digging some more into DT curious nature of this biggest bank vault in DT NN , PRP learn DT following , courtesy of a freely available book written by CD of DT architects : In other words , DT NN ’s biggest bank vault , IN belonging to DT private Chase Manhattan empire , and then , to JPMorgan , was so safe , DT creators even had a plan of action should PRP sustain a near - direct hit from a nuclear bomb , and suffer epic flooding ( such as DT from Hurricane Sandy ) . PRP is no surprise , then , IN DT street entrance to this NN ’s biggest vault located under 1 Chase Manhattan Plaza makes DT entrance to any medieval impregnable fortress seem IN child ’s play in comparison . Courtesy of Google StreetView : Yet PRP is not what is on this side of DT street , which just happens to be known as Liberty Street , DT is what is DT most interesting part of this whole story . PRP is what is on DT other : DT ’s right , ladies and gentlemen , as a result of our cursory examination , PRP have learned IN DT NN ’s largest private , and commercial , gold vault , WDT belonging once upon a NN to Chase Manhattan , and now to JPMorgan Chase , is located , right across DT street , and at DT same level underground , resting just on top of DT Manhattan bedrock , as DT vault belonging to DT NNP York Federal Reserve , which according to folklore is DT official location of DT biggest collection of sovereign , JJ gold in DT NN . At this point PRP MD hate to be self - referential , and point out what CD of our own commentators noted on DT topic of DT Fed ’s vault a NN ago , namely DT : … but PRP wo n’t , and instead PRP will let readers make up their own mind why DT DT thousands of tons of sovereign gold in DT possession of DT NNP York Fed , have to be literally inches across , if not directly connected , to DT largest private gold vault in DT NN . PRP VBP readers can do a good enough job on their own . This article was posted : Monday , August CD , 2013 at 4:46 am

text: * Williams says Fed should take pre-emptive measures * Dollar blips up after NY Fed says Williams comments academic * Sterling jumps back but still worst performer this week TOKYO , July CD ( Reuters ) - DT dollar steadied on Friday but was still on DT defensive after Federal Reserve officials bolstered expectations of an aggressive rate cut this month to address weakening price pressures . At a central banking conference on Thursday , NNP York Fed NNP John Williams argued for pre-emptive measures to avoid having to deal with too low inflation and interest rates . DT sent DT dollar down before PRP bounced slightly in early Asian trade , after a NNP York Fed representative subsequently VBD Williams ’ comments were academic and not about immediate policy direction . Still , investors took his remarks along with separate comments from Fed Vice Chair Richard Clarida as another dovish signal from DT central bank , which MD be opening DT way for a big rate cut at DT end of this month . DT dollar stood at 107.42 yen , up 0.2 % from late U.S. levels after having hit a three - week low of 107.21 DT previous day . DT euro eased slightly to $ 1.1266 from $ 1.1282 . On DT week , DT dollar is down 0.4 % versus DT yen and 0.1 % on DT euro . DT dollar index , which hit a two - week low of 96.648 , bounced to 96.792 . DT greenback fell broadly on Thursday after Williams ’ remarks bolstered bets IN DT Fed MD cut interest rates by 50 basis points , rather than 25 basis points . Williams VBD when rates and inflation are low , policymakers cannot afford to keep their “ powder dry ” and wait for potential JJ problems to materialise . DT is especially true with neutral rates WDT MD neither restrict nor accelerate DT U.S. economy , he VBD . When adjusted for inflation , DT neutral rate is near DT Fed ’s current policy rate , which is in a range of 2.25 - 2.50 % . Financial markets reacted quickly , with money market futures pricing in almost a 70 % chance of a 50 basis point cut at its policy meeting on July 30 - 31 at CD point . DT odds eased to around 40 % after DT NNP York Fed ’s clarification of his speech . All DT same , Williams ’ rate - cut view was echoed by Fed Vice Chair Clarida , who told Fox Business Network DT central bank might have to act early and not wait “ until things VBP so bad ” . “ Williams ’ comments were surprisingly dovish . DT NY Fed went all DT way to try to modify DT message but no NN seems to have done so for Clarida , who RB VBD a very similar thing , ” VBD Daisuke Uno , chief strategist at Sumitomo Mitsui Bank . DT dollar ’s weakness RB underpinned JJ emerging market currencies . MSCI ’s emerging market currency index has risen 0.35 % so far this week to a four - month high of 1,657.07 , coming within sight of this NN ’s double peak around 1,658 , hit in late January and March . DT Brazilian real rose to five - month high of 3.7172 to DT dollar on Thursday while DT South African rand RB scaled a five - month peak of 13.8175 and last stood at 13.855 . “ If DT Fed cut rates , DT MD encourage fresh investments in emerging currencies and other risk assets , ” VBD Bart Wakabayashi , NNP Street Bank ’s representative in Japan . Elsewhere , DT pound remained firm following stronger - than - expected UK retail sales numbers and after British lawmakers on Thursday approved proposals to make PRP harder for DT next prime minister to force through a no - deal Brexit by suspending parliament . DT pound stood at $ 1.2552 , flat in Asia after 0.93 % gains overnight , though PRP was DT worst performer among G10 currencies so far this week , with a loss of 0.2 % . DT biggest stride was made by DT NNP Zealand dollar , which is up 1.3 % for DT week at a 3 - 1/2 - month high of $ 0.6785 , as DT Fed ’s anticipated monetary easing is seen boosting DT relative yield attraction of DT kiwi . DT currency has DT second highest bond yield among G10 currencies after DT U.S. dollar . ( Reporting by Hideyuki Sano ; Editing by Sam Holmes & Shri Navaratnam )

text: Furious protests are threatening to undermine DT Iraqi NN ’s plan to give international oil companies a stake in its giant oilfields in a desperate effort to increase its declining oil production and oil revenues . In less than two weeks NN , on June 29 and 30 , DT Iraqi Oil minister Hussain Shahristani will award service contracts to DT NN ’s largest oil companies to develop six of Iraq ’s largest oil producing fields over 20 - 25 NNS . Senior figures within DT Iraqi oil industry have denounced DT deal . Fayad al - Nema , DT director of DT South Oil Company , which comes under DT Oil Ministry and produces most of Iraq ’s crude , VBD last weekend : “ DT service contracts will put DT Iraqi economy in chains and shackle its independence for DT next 20 NNS . PRP squander Iraq ’s revenues . ” Mr Nema is reported to have since been fired because of his opposition to DT contracts , which he says is shared by JJ other officials in Iraq ’s NN - owned oil industry . DT NN maintains IN PRP is not compromising DT ownership of Iraq ’s huge oil reserves – DT third in DT NN at 115 billion barrels – on which DT country is wholly dependent to fund its recovery from 30 NNS of war , sanctions and occupation . But DT fall in DT price of oil over DT last NN has left DT NN facing a devastating financial crisis in which 80 per cent of its revenues goes to pay for salaries , food rations and recurrent costs . Almost nothing is left for reconstruction and PRP is finding PRP hard to pay even for vitally - needed items such as electrical plant from GE and Siemens . DT development of Iraq ’s oil reserves is of great importance to DT NN ’s NN supply in DT 21st century . PRP MD be even larger than Saudi Arabia ’s , as EX was little exploration while Iraq was ruled by Saddam Hussein . International oil companies are desperate to VB their foot in DT door . “ Everyone wants to be in Iraq , ” says Ruba Husari , an expert on Iraqi oil . “ Togethor with Iran this is DT only oil province in DT NN WDT has great potential . PRP is a great opportunity for oil companies because nobody knows DT size of Iraq ’s reserves . Iraq itself needs to VB what is under its soil . ” But Iraqis are wary of DT involvement of big foreign oil companies in raising production in super giant fields IN Kirkuk and Bai Hassan in DT north and Rumaila , Zubair and West Qurna in DT south . PRP suspect IN DT NNP invasion of 2003 was ultimately aimed at securing western control of their oil wealth . DT nationalization of DT Iraqi oil industry by Saddam Hussein in 1972 remains popular . DT rebellion against DT service contracts has been gathering pace all this week . Parliament is demanding IN bidding should be delayed . MPs summoned Mr Shahristani , a nuclear scientist imprisoned and tortured under Saddam Hussein , to answer questions about DT service contracts and DT fall in Iraq ’s oil production and exports . Jabir Khalifa Kabir , DT secretary of parliament ’s oil and gas committee , claims DT JJ contracts will “ chain DT NN with complex contractual terms ” and will abort South Oil Company ’s own plans to raise production . DT NN says DT bidding must VB ahead . DT JJ contracts are not in fact particularly favorable to DT international oil companies . PRP are rather DT outcome of DT companies ’ extreme eagerness to VB into Iraq and DT NN ’s attempt to obtain expertise and investment without ceding control . DT companies will be paid a fee linked to first restoring and then increasing oil output . PRP will , however , have greater control when EX is a second round of bidding for oilfields which have been discovered but not developed . Separate again is DT question of exploring for JJ oil reserves . Critics of DT deal in parliament say IN Iraq has already invested $ 8 billion in developing its super giant fields . But Mr Shahristani needs an investment of $ 50 billion over DT next five or six NNS to raise current production from 2.5 million barrels a day of crude and he knows DT money and expertise can only come from outside Iraq . DT NN in Baghdad MD be near broke , but Iraqis ask whose fault this is . DT Oil Ministry , IN much of DT NN , is dysfunctional when PRP comes to carrying out long - term projects . Mr Shahristani is blamed for poor management skills , though he eloquently defends himself by saying IN when he took over DT ministry in 2006 he had to cope with attacks by guerrillas who once were blowing up a pipeline every day . This explains Mr Shahristani ’s problems in northern Iraq , where DT Sunni Arab insurgency of 2003 - 8 was strong , but not in DT far south where DT Shia community is dominant and EX was no uprising . Jabbar al - Luaibi , DT former head of DT South Oil Company , who battled to maintain oil production in these NNS , gave a devastating interview detailing DT failings of DT Oil Ministry to provide DT most basic equipment needed to monitor DT oil reservoirs . “ PRP ’s IN driving your car without any indicators on DT instrument panel , ” he VBD , adding IN if mismanagement continues in DT same way as in DT past “ who knows , PRP might have to start importing crude oil . ” DT Iraqi NN made two other mistakes for which PRP is now paying . PRP optimistically believed DT price of oil MD stay high at $ 140 a barrel . Instead of investing extra revenues by paying for outside expertise and equipment to raise production in DT oilfields PRP spent DT money on raising DT pay of NN employees and increasing their number . This increased Prime Minister Nouri al - Maliki ’s popularity in DT provincial elections in January , but left DT NN very short of cash when oil prices collapsed . PRP have risen since then , but not nearly enough to solve DT NN ’s problems . In June 2008 DT Iraqi oil industry seemed about to VB foreign help by signing two NN technical support contracts with major oil companies . Control MD have remained with Iraq . At DT last minute these were cancelled despite being supported by Mr Shahristani and DT council of ministers . DT reason why this happened explains much about why DT Iraqi NN machine is unable to carry out long term policies . Jobs are allocated to members of political parties regardless of their experience or abilities . After 2003 DT Oil Ministry had been DT fief of DT Fadhila , a Shia Islamic party strong in Basra , and , though PRP left DT NN , PRP never wholly accepted Mr Shahristani as minister . Showing a certain cheek Fadhila members , having sabotaged DT plan to acquire foreign expertise when money was available to buy PRP last NN , now criticize DT NN for being forced to accept worse terms this NN because PRP cannot invest itself . PRP is probably too late for DT Iraqi NN to delay or modify DT contracts to be awarded at DT end of June . PRP needs DT money too badly and PRP failed to invest itself when oil prices were high . Even when DT big oil companies start work , PRP will be three NNS before JJ oil appears . JJ Iraqis will be angered to see their historic oilfields , on which their country is wholly dependant , being partially run by foreign companies , but , facing an election next January , at this stage DT NN believes PRP has no choice . text: Big NN broke last week WDT MD VB DT future of closed loop technology . OK , PRP 's tempting to refer to this as " Bigfoot " NN ... as in Bigfoot Biomedical , DT closed loop ( aka Artificial Pancreas system ) startup based in Milpitas , CA , led by an all - star D - Dad trio -- former JDRF leader Jeffrey Brewer , former Medtronic chief engineer Lane Desborough , and financial whiz Bryan Mazlish ( Mr. " Bigfoot " himself ) -- along with JJ others well - known in DT Diabetes Community . On Thursday July 13 , Bigfoot announced a partnership with Abbott Diabetes Care to integrate a next - generation version of their FreeStyle Libre Flash CGM system in Bigfoot 's emerging closed loop system , which MD hit market by DT end of 2020 if all goes according to DT startup 's plan . This comes just a month or so after DT NN IN Bigfoot bought DT Timesulin insulin pen tracker -- indicating IN Bigfoot 's eventual closed loop system will RB connect with smart insulin pens . Whoa , quite a powerful combo RB ! This certainly makes Bigfoot unique in DT closed loop space , being DT only developer at this point with clear plans to accommodate both insulin pumpers and pen users . Just how will all this pan out ? PRP recently spoke with Bigfoot CEO Jeffrey Brewer to learn more about DT latest developments . As a reminder , DT Abbott FreeStyle Libre is a JJ type of glucose monitor referred to as a Flash Glucose Monitoring ( FGM ) system . PRP consists of a small round quarter - sized sensor WDT 's worn on DT back of DT arm for 14 days . Data is collected from DT interstitial fluid ( just IN a regular CGM ) every minute , but unlike a traditional CGM DT user must wave a handheld receiver over DT sensor to VB readings -- and unlike current CGMs on DT market from Dexcom and Medtronic , DT first - gen Libre does not have real - NN data connectivity . CD major advantage is IN PRP does n't require any fingerstick calibration . While not yet FDA approved for DT U.S. , Libre is available in 37 other NNS since first coming to market internationally in 2014 , and was most recently cleared in Canada . EX 's a body of growing clinical NN data showing DT Libre is accurate and effective for JJ PWDs . A physician 's version called Libre Pro was FDA approved in September 2016 , but DT patient version been before DT U.S. regulatory agency since mid-2015 (! ) , and PRP 's anyone 's guess what DT holdup is . Being able to read about European patients ' experiences with Libre , American PWDs are of course anxious to VB their hands on PRP . But this JJ agreement with Bigfoot is n't about DT first - generation FreeStyle Libre we'll ( hopefully ) see on DT U.S. market very soon ; PRP 's about future technology WDT will VB beyond DT current iteration of FreeStyle Libre . Abbott 's pretty hush - hush on this , so all PRP really VBP now is IN DT JJ Libre version Bigfoot plans to use will do away with DT handheld scanner and will be able to share data directly with DT closed loop system , making PRP function more IN an existing CGM . So does this mean IN Bigfoot is breaking up with Dexcom , despite a partnership announced in July 2015 ? DT anwser is yes . Bigfoot says PRP 's been evaluating CGM partners since its inception and has now moved to Abbott exclusively . DT agreement is for four NNS , from DT start of DT system 's launch . This means each Bigfoot system will come with a Libre sensor , and customers will VB directly through Bigfoot , not between both companies . Why Abbott ? PRP 's all about calibrations -- or in DT case of Libre , no calibrations . PRP 're told DT was a deciding factor in choosing between Dexcom and Abbott . DT possibility of human error based on calibration issues was a stumbling block in designing a closed loop system WDT 's supposed to automate care , thereby " taking away DT work " of diabetes . While Dexcom has been pushing to drop calibrations for NNS , even their next - gen G6 is likely to require CD calibration per day . So based on DT existing Libre data worldwide , DT decision to VB with Abbott became pretty clear , Brewer tells PRP . “ In DT first generation of automated systems , PRP VBP sensors WDT require calibration have been DT crippling aspect of DT user experience . PRP ’ve learned from our own personal experiences and from what PRP ’ve seen in data modeling , IN calibration is DT biggest risk to a closed loop . NNS do n’t do PRP well , or consistently or even at all . And DT turns out to be a big problem . Our concern is IN systems WDT require calibration are n’t VBG to be as easy to use or as safe as those WDT do n’t require PRP . ” Aside from adding Libre , DT basics of DT Bigfoot system as PRP 've reported before have n't really changed in DT past couple NNS . DT " Bigfoot Brain " will be built around DT former Asante Snap pump technology WDT Bigfoot acquired in mid-2015 using a pre-filled insulin cartridge and tubing . This is where DT smart algorithm is housed , which does all DT calculations for carbs , insulin delivery , etc , and a Bluetooth chip inside will talk to DT Abbott Libre sensor and smartphone mobile app as DT main interface . Rather than a traditional display , PRP will have a " belt - clip sized " display with icons showing DT various items such as BG data and dosing . Importantly , Brewer says DT system will not have a set BG target ( as Medtronic 's current 670G does and others IN Beta Bionics are developing ) . Instead , PRP will allow flexibility by having DT system learn to adjust targets based on each individual 's BG needs -- because , Your Diabetes MD Vary . As mentioned , Bigfoot will design its system for use by NNS on injections and multiple daily dosing , too . In early June just before DT ADA Scientific Sessions , Bigfoot announced its acquisition of London - based startup Patients Pending WDT makes DT Timesulin smart insulin pen tracker . This will allow DT Libre sensor to eventually talk directly to smart pens , and transmit DT data through DT Bigfoot smartphone app interface . " I do n’t VB why NNS are forced to be a pump person or a shots person . Why ca n’t PRP do both , using whatever fits their life at DT point in NN ? Some NNS switch back and forth , and I VBP PRP should be able to , " Brewer says . " When PRP talk about consumerization , DT ’s a fancy term for just looking at DT person and designing a system around their needs . DT ’s what Apple does , but PRP ’s not traditionally what JJ device companies do . DT 's what Bigfoot is doing . ” DT clinical research is underway and will be DT main focus for DT foreseeable future : • A clinical research NN ( CRC ) NN took place during DT latter half of 2016 and wrapped up last NN , and DT results from DT have been encouraging . • Pivotal trials are expected to start in early 2018 , and Bigfoot says PRP 's working with FDA on what DT research will look IN . Once all those begin , details will be shared via ClinicalTrials.gov and DT Bigfoot site itself . • Much remains up in DT air and some will be dictated by Abbott 's timing , but Bigfoot hopes for approval by 2020 . DT planned launch is now more than a NN later than originally expected , which is disappointing -- not only for PRP on DT consumer side , but for Bigfoot folks too . Their team of 50 NNS includes JJ living with type 1 themselves or a very personal D - connection , such as DT founders being D - parents . But Bigfoot never planned to be first -- Medtronic holds DT distinction with its Minimed 670G hybrid closed loop , which got FDA approval in late 2016 and is now being slowly rolled out across DT NNP NNPS . PRP will eventually have a next - gen , more - automated model of a closed loop , and PRP 're RB expecting to see other products from Tandem and Type Zero Tech , Insulet , and Beta Bionics in DT coming NNS . Not to mention DT hundreds of ( non-regulated ) do - PRP - yourself homemade closed loop systems being used worldwide over DT past couple NNS ( including some by Bigfoot team members ) . PRP is n't about being first , but getting PRP right and bringing something to market WDT changes DT game , Brewer emphasizes . In DT past , Bigfoot has mentioned plans to adopt a monthly subscription model for this closed loop system , which PRP expect will cost less than combined pump / BG testing / CGM supplies cost today . PRP 're happy to hear IN DT Bigfoot team has been conscious of access and cost considerations since DT start , and remain focused to making sure this can VB into DT hands of NNS who VBP PRP . No doubt , a lot will VB over DT next few NNS and PRP are confident Bigfoot will adapt as needed -- whether via a bundled - subscription business model ( CD of DT most novel aspects of what Bigfoot 's proposing ) , or changes in insurance and Medicare coverage . Certainly , JJ will be surprised IN Bigfoot is dropping DT best - in - class Dexcom CGM for a device WDT 's still mostly unknown in DT U.S. PRP 's odd to be asked to imagine a NN of no calibrations , and to put our faith in a future product WDT in its first - gen offers comparatively limited data capabilities . DT 's a lot to ask , especially when so JJ in our D - community are highly impatient and VBP improved technology NOW . See RB : # WeAreNotWaiting . JJ RB remember DT FreeStyle Navigator CGM WDT Abbott discontinued in DT U.S. back in 2011 , but remains on DT market internationally ; PRP was seen as DT best , better - than - Dexcom at DT NN and as a botched business move WDT PRP did n't succeed here in DT NNPS . Along with all DT test strip recalls and customer service issues at Abbott , DT company 's D - tech has often been engulfed in storm clouds ... but DT fact remains , Abbott has some stellar technology . For our part , PRP 're excited to hear about this latest collaboration , and can't wait to see what materializes . In other words , DT future looks bright and PRP continue to # BelieveInBigfoot as PRP moves forward with JJ options for better diabetes care !

text: Gout is a common and complex form of arthritis WDT can affect anyone . PRP 's characterized by sudden , severe attacks of pain , swelling , redness and tenderness in DT joints , often DT joint at DT base of DT big toe . An attack of gout can occur suddenly , often waking PRP up in DT middle of DT night with DT sensation WDT your big toe is on fire . DT affected joint is hot , swollen and so tender IN even DT weight of DT sheet on PRP MD seem intolerable . Gout symptoms MD come and VB , but EX are ways to manage symptoms and prevent flares . DT signs and symptoms of gout almost always occur suddenly , and often at night . PRP include : • Intense joint pain . Gout usually affects DT large joint of your big toe , but PRP can occur in any joint . Other commonly affected joints include DT ankles , knees , elbows , wrists and fingers . DT pain is likely to be most severe within DT first four to 12 hours after PRP begins . • Lingering discomfort . After DT most severe pain subsides , some joint discomfort MD last from a few days to a few weeks . Later attacks are likely to last longer and affect more joints . • Inflammation and redness . DT affected joint or joints become swollen , tender , warm and red . • Limited range of motion . As gout progresses , PRP MD not be able to move your joints normally . Other foods RB promote higher levels of uric acid , such as alcoholic beverages , especially beer , and drinks sweetened with fruit sugar ( fructose ) . Normally , uric acid dissolves in your blood and passes through your kidneys into your urine . But sometimes either your body produces too much uric acid or your kidneys excrete too little uric acid . When this happens , uric acid can build up , forming sharp , needlelike urate crystals in a joint or surrounding tissue WDT cause pain , inflammation and swelling . PRP 're more likely to develop gout if PRP have high levels of uric acid in your body . Factors WDT increase DT uric acid level in your body include : • Diet . Eating a diet rich in meat and seafood and drinking beverages sweetened with fruit sugar ( fructose ) increase levels of uric acid , which increase your risk of gout . Alcohol consumption , especially of beer , RB increases DT risk of gout . • Obesity . If PRP 're overweight , your body produces more uric acid and your kidneys have a more difficult NN eliminating uric acid . • JJ conditions . Certain diseases and conditions increase your risk of gout . These include untreated high blood pressure and chronic conditions such as diabetes , metabolic syndrome , and heart and kidney diseases . • Certain medications . DT use of thiazide diuretics — commonly used to treat hypertension — and low - dose aspirin RB can increase uric acid levels . So can DT use of anti-rejection drugs prescribed for NNS who have undergone an organ transplant . • Family history of gout . If other members of your family have had gout , PRP 're more likely to develop DT NN . • Age and sex . Gout occurs more often in men , primarily because women tend to have lower uric acid levels . After menopause , however , women 's uric acid levels approach those of men . Men are RB more likely to develop gout earlier — usually between DT ages of 30 and 50 — whereas women generally develop signs and symptoms after menopause . • Recent surgery or trauma . Experiencing recent surgery or trauma has been associated with an increased risk of developing a gout attack . NNS with gout can develop more - severe conditions , such as : • Recurrent gout . Some NNS MD never experience gout signs and symptoms again . Others MD experience gout several times each NN . Medications MD help prevent gout attacks in NNS with recurrent gout . Untreated gout MD cause deposits of urate crystals to form under DT skin in nodules called tophi ( TOE - fie ) . Tophi usually are n't painful , but PRP can become swollen and tender during gout attacks . • Kidney stones . Urate crystals MD collect in DT urinary tract of NNS with gout , causing kidney stones . Medications can help reduce DT risk of kidney stones . During symptom - free periods , these dietary guidelines MD help protect against future gout attacks : • Drink plenty of fluids . Stay well - hydrated , including plenty of NN . Limit how JJ sweetened beverages PRP drink , especially those sweetened with high - fructose corn syrup . • Limit or avoid alcohol . Talk with your doctor about whether any amount or type of alcohol is safe for PRP . Recent evidence suggests IN beer MD be particularly likely to increase DT risk of gout symptoms , especially in men . • VB your protein from low - fat dairy products . Low - fat dairy products MD actually have a protective effect against gout , so these are your best - bet protein sources . • Limit your intake of meat , fish and poultry . A small amount MD be tolerable , but pay close attention to what types — and how much — seem to cause problems for PRP . • Maintain a desirable body weight . Choose portions WDT allow PRP to maintain a healthy weight . Losing weight MD decrease uric acid levels in your body . But avoid fasting or rapid weight loss , since doing so MD temporarily raise uric acid levels .

text: Those who have studied DT inner workings of DT mind have discovered ways and means on how to exploit its weakness . PRP all possess a sense of compassion , so IN when PRP have DT means to help someone in need PRP do n’t hesitate to do so . DT Vatican Church enjoys DT trust of its members , and so is its brainchild , DT Red Cross , although only few NNS ever realized IN PRP owns DT falsely charitable corporation through DT Knights of Malta “ membership ” to ICRC . DT Red Cross JJ efforts generate billions yet only a trickle of those amount will ever reached DT supposed intended recipients . From what PRP have experienced , PRP was DT local archbishop WDT have been entrusted with DT billions of peso donations relating to DT Guinsaugon Landslide in 2006 , and since DT church is not subject to JJ audit , DT funds disappeared in NN . What is delivered in DT disaster areas , however , is DT forced vaccinations of DT victims to introduced AIDS , hepatitis , Ebola or sterilization , so IN in DT end EX wo n’t be any survivors left . A similar scheme should be what ’s happening in Haiti and elsewhere … After raising nearly half a billion dollars for emergency disaster relief after DT 2010 Haitian earthquake – including $ 170 million earmarked for ‘ shelter relief ’ – DT American Red Cross has built a grand total of six houses , according to a JJ report . An investigation by Propublica and NPR has shown a pattern of highly inefficient spending , management troubles , and a lack of local expertise which has resulted in very little concrete relief to DT NNS of Haiti , despite massive outpouring of donations to CD of DT NNP ’ most prominent charities . CD major barrier to effective relief has been a reliance on foreigners who came to DT country with little or no knowledge of local culture or language , while dismissing or disparaging Haitians , DT report finds . Though DT American Red Cross ( ARC ) says IN 90 % of DT employees in DT Haiti program are Haitians , PRP MD not provide a breakdown of nationalities in top positions , and DT Propublica investigation found very few made PRP to top slots . “ DT implication IN talented , smart , competent Haitians cannot be found in Haiti has to be dispelled , if PRP are VBG to give Haitians a chance to be part of rebuilding Haiti , ” read a 2011 memo from Judith St. Fort , then - director of DT Haiti program , WDT described DT disparaging attitudes of senior ARC managers towards Haitian employees . Those foreign workers were RB more costly — potentially up to $ 100,000 more a NN — than Haitian employees . Despite Red Cross CEO Gail McGovern ’s own promise to “ share DT way PRP are spending our dollars , ” DT ARC has so far not even disclosed what percentage of its revenues VBP to overhead . DT percentage is considered by charity watchdogs to be an essential measure of a charity ’s trustworthiness and commitment to its cause rather than to its executives ’ paychecks . Even outside of big picture numbers IN overhead DT ARC “ has declined repeated requests to disclose DT specific projects , to explain how much money went to each or to say what DT results of each project were , ” Propublica reports . DT lack of transparency makes evaluating DT Red Cross ’ grand claims difficult , but some were clearly exaggerated or spun . For example , DT Red Cross says PRP has provided homes to more than 130,000 NNS , but DT included NNS who were just “ trained in proper construction techniques , ” NNS who ended up in temporary shelters , or NNS who got rental assistance for a short period . Only six permanent homes have been entirely completed by DT Red Cross in Haiti . Red Cross officials IN McGovern have repeatedly claimed IN “ Millions of Haitians are safer , healthier , more resilient , and better prepared ” and IN DT ARC has helped “ more than 4.5 million ” Haitians . But Jean - Max Bellerive , DT Prime Minister of Haiti when DT quake struck , finds those claims dubious when applied to a country with only 10 million NNS in total . “ No , no , ” Bellerive told Propublica , reacting to DT Red Cross ’ numbers . “ PRP ’s not possible . ” ‘ This Is Depressing ’ Though DT Red Cross blames DT poor result of DT housing project on difficulties navigating Haiti ’s land laws , others say PRP all came down to a lack of expertise in DT region , and a wasteful reliance on subcontractors , with each layer taking another bite out of donations for administrative costs . CD former head of DT Haiti shelter program for DT ARC , Lee Malany , told Propublica IN officials in Washington just did n’t seem to VB how to spend DT money PRP ’d raised . “ When I walked out of DT meeting I looked at DT NNS WDT I was working with and VBD , ‘ PRP VBP this is very disconcerting , this is depressing , ' ” VBD Malany , who later resigned . “ I VBD EX ’s no reason for me to stay here . I got on DT plane and left . ” 91 Cents on DT Dollar ? Not Quite According to charity watchdogs , an average charity MD spend 75 % of its funds on its cause , and VBG by DT measure , DT Red Cross ’ claims to efficient funding look great . “ Minus DT 9 cents overhead , 91 cents on DT dollar will be VBG to Haiti . And I give PRP my word and my commitment , I ’m banking my integrity , my own personal sense of integrity on DT statement , ” McGovern told CBS NN a few months after DT quake . Unfortunately , JJ other subcontracted groups MD then take their own chunk out of DT 91 cents per dollar for administrative overhead . In CD example , when DT ARC sent DT International Federation of DT Red Cross $ 6 million for a particular project , DT IRFC then took an additional 26 % of DT in overhead . In another $ 5.4 million project for housing improvement , Propublica found IN DT figure WDT went directly to DT work was closer to 60 cents on DT dollar . Even factoring in DT various sub-layers of administrative costs , Bellerive VBD he still did n’t understand where all DT money went . “ Five hundred million dollars in Haiti is a lot of money , ” he VBD . “ I ’m not a big mathematician , but I can make some additions . I VBP more or less DT cost of things . Unless PRP do n’t pay for DT gasoline DT same price I was paying , unless PRP pay NNS 20 times what I was paying them , unless DT cost of DT house PRP built was five times DT cost I was paying , PRP does n’t add up for me . ” Sputnik ‘ Where ’s DT $ 500 mn ? ’ Red Cross promises houses for 130,000 Haitians , ’ builds only 6 ’ When a devastating earthquake struck DT Western hemisphere ’s poorest country in 2010 , DT American Red Cross was CD of DT organizations at DT forefront of DT humanitarian effort to rebuild PRP a NN later , launching a multi-million - dollar effort . DT main program – LAMIKA ( a Creole acronym for ‘ A Better Life in My Neighborhood ’ ) – was to build hundreds of permanent homes to house some 130,000 NNS living in abject poverty after DT quake . Now , in 2015 , DT Port - au - Prince neighborhood of Campeche is as dilapidated as ever , with hardly any JJ buildings , trash strewn around , animals walking DT streets , and NNS enduring sub - standard conditions in self - made shacks . “ JJ residents live in shacks made of rusty sheet metal , without access to drinkable NN , electricity or basic sanitation . When PRP rains , their homes flood and residents bail out mud and NN , ” an introduction to a report says . An investigation by NPR and ProPublica gained access to “ confidential memos , emails from worried top officers , and accounts of a dozen frustrated and disappointed insiders ” familiar with how DT NGO broke its promises , misspent millions of dollars , and then issued self - congratulatory progress statements . DT ensuing report reveals very different results to DT ones outlined in CEO Gail McGovern ’s project plan for Haiti , which promised “ brand JJ communities ” WDT MD make “ donors proud ” and “ help DT NNS in Haiti . ” She claimed her experience had made her more “ flexible during emergencies . ” DT investigation pointed to a series of systematic blunders and untruths surrounding DT Haiti effort , however . DT Red Cross ’s internal proposal put DT number of houses to be built at 700 by January 2013 . In reality , only six houses were actually constructed . “ PRP asked DT Red Cross to show PRP around its projects in Haiti so PRP MD see DT results of its work . PRP declined , ” DT report reads . Part of DT reason behind DT failure is IN DT Red Cross “ did n’t have DT NN - how ” and “ PRP had no development experience , ” former employees VBD . In some NNS , DT NGO MD give millions to other groups . Poor supervision and lack of proper oversight allowed these subcontractors to rack up inordinate bills for management and overhead costs . Another issue WDT MD have hindered DT Red Cross ’s work in Haiti is trouble with DT country ’s “ dysfunctional ” land title system . Other groups , which DT report does not name , had similar problems but , according to DT data , “ ultimately built 9,000 homes compared to DT Red Cross ’s six . ” Another possible reason for DT dismal results , pointed out by current and former employees , was “ an overreliance ” on expats who MD not speak French or Creole . DT Red Cross ’s statement , however , VBD IN over 90 percent of NNS hired were Haitians . DT did n’t seem to be reflected in DT top positions , however , according to DT authors of DT report . According to DT report , DT NGO displayed an arrogant attitude to national staff – some of DT very few NNS who MD speak French and DT local Creole . DT comes to more than $ 100,000 more than MD have been spent on a local equivalent . “ A lot of money was spent on those NNS who were not Haitian , who had nothing to do with Haiti . At DT same NN , Red Cross officials focused more on programs which MD generate good publicity than those providing DT most homes , according to testimony from Lee Malany , DT project manager of DT shelter program . He recalled a Washington meeting where top officials had no idea what to do with DT millions PRP ’d been given for housing projects . DT organization MD not provide details on how PRP spent DT almost $ 500 million WDT PRP received , nor give specific details of how its projects were carried out . However , various promotional statements estimated IN DT initiative had repaired some 4,000 homes , erected temporary shelters for thousands of families , and donated $ 44 million for food aid and hospital construction . “ DT Red Cross ’s JJ reports offer only broad categories about where $ 488 million in donations has gone , ” according to DT authors of DT report . Five NNS since DT quake , a report by McGovern says : “ Millions of Haitians are safer , healthier , more resilient , and better prepared for future disasters thanks to generous donations to DT American Red Cross . ” DT organization claimed IN PRP had helped 4.5 million Haitians , but according to reporters “ EX is reason to doubt ” DT . text: I 'm probably not DT first person PRP 'd choose to send off round DT NN looking for monsters . EX 's DT credibility problem to start with . I 'm best - known for dressing up in silly costumes and playing practical jokes on NNS on TV . What if I actually came across CD of these beasts and announced DT fact to DT NN ? I do n't VB I MD make DT most believable of witnesses . Nevertheless , I did spend a lot of DT past NN doing just this . I was Dom Joly , Monster Hunter , and I printed off a business card to prove PRP . First I had to decide on my destinations . Some were obvious : DT Himalayas , for DT Yeti , a hairy beast who wanders their upper slopes , harassing mountain climbers and Tintin . And Loch Ness , for our very own Nessie , who lures tourists into much purchasing of tat . As I 'm married to a Canadian I had heard of DT country 's own monster – Ogopogo , a Nessie - type creature WDT lives in Lake Okanagan in British Columbia . DT lake is bordered by vineyards and peach orchards and was a most pleasant place in which to VB monster - hunting . I discovered another couple online . Explorers have written for several centuries about mokele m'bembe ( blocker of rivers ) a dinosaur - type creature VBN to live in Lake Tele , in DT north of DT Congo . This was by far DT most difficult of my trips , with days in a canoe and trekking through forest before meeting a particularly tricky tribe whose permission I needed to VB to DT lake . Things went pear - shaped as everyone got drunk on " jungle gin " and spears and machetes suddenly made a very unwelcome appearance . DT second was in Japan . I 'd read about DT hibagon WDT roamed DT hills around Hiroshima and was reputed to be a man who had been irradiated by DT atomic bomb . This seemed unlikely but my dad , who was in DT Fleet Air Arm , flew over Hiroshima DT day after DT bomb had been dropped , and I had always been fascinated by DT place . Then of course , EX was Bigfoot , rumoured to roam DT coast from California to British Columbia , with hundreds of sightings a NN . Bigfoot was DT main reason I got interested in monsters in DT first place . I can still remember DT excitement of seeing DT Patterson - Gimlin footage for DT first NN . This was a shaky 16 mm film taken in a place called Bluff Creek , northern California , in 1967 . DT footage shows a large ape - JJ creature , walking on two legs in a jerky manner and staring back at DT cameraman . Some hail this as conclusive proof ; others claim PRP is a fake . EX is a Bigfoot museum ( bigfootcountry.net ) in Willow Creek , Humboldt County – " Ground Zero " for Bigfoot hunters – and DT was where I decided to head . I love northern California : as soon as PRP drive over DT Golden Gate Bridge and up Highway CD , PRP are in a very special place . First PRP hit Hitchcock country : Bodega Bay is where he filmed DT Birds , and EX were some particularly large and scary looking seagulls hovering above my car . Then I headed inland , through various areas of intoxication . First DT wineries of Napa and Sonoma , then DT Microbrewery Belt , and finally Weed Country . PRP MD be a coincidence IN Bigfoot territory is slap - bang in DT middle of this last area … Moss - covered coastal oaks give way to huge forests of redwood trees . If PRP 've never seen a redwood , PRP 's difficult to describe their power . I 'm not normally awed by nature , but DT redwood brings out my inner hippy . I have a huge urge to hug them , except PRP MD take about 20 of me . On a lovely stretch called Avenue of DT Giants ( avenueofthegiants.net ) I drove through some of DT most impressive of these woody behemoths , wishing I 'd rented a convertible so I MD really appreciate my insignificance . I stopped to try to photograph some of DT trees ( PRP 's almost impossible ) and got into an altercation with a pick - up truck full of lady rednecks . PRP ended up IN a scene from Deliverance ( not DT scene ) . Suffice to say I hot - footed PRP out of RB and ended up in DT wonderfully named city of Eureka , which boasts a couple of extraordinary mock - Gothic Victorian buildings , including DT Carson Mansion , WDT are VBN to have inspired some of DT weirder parts of Disneyland . From RB PRP was just an hour to Willow Creek – a CD - street town much frequented in summer by fishermen and white - NN rafters , drawn by DT beautiful Trinity River . I stayed for a couple of nights , checking out DT Bigfoot Museum and talking to Twin - Peaks - esque locals before heading off into DT great unknown . PRP 's only when PRP do this WDT PRP realise just how possible PRP might be for something IN Bigfoot to remain largely undiscovered . DT vegetation is thick and impenetrable and covers a vast area . I found this out to my cost when I crashed my car in snow 18 miles up an empty road . With no mobile signal I had no option but to walk out ( breaking DT Ray Mears rule of always staying by your vehicle ) . PRP was very cold , and EX are mountain lions , bears , paranoid , armed weed farmers and Bigfoot roaming DT area … In a movie this MD have been where I blacked out and woke up in Bigfoot 's nest with DT creature breastfeeding me . Fortunately a lovely man called Peter , who was out mushroom picking , saved me at DT seven - mile mark . Peter 's parents run Marble Ranch ( marblemountainranch.com ) , a " dude ranch " – DT sort of place where cissy east coasters can come to learn to ride , shoot and survive in DT wilderness ( à la City Slickers ) . As Peter drove me off DT mountain I MD n't help thinking IN this was exactly DT sort of trip I needed to take before my next adventure . DT night , safe in a log cabin straight out of Elle Décor , I ate a steak DT size of Texas and slept DT sleep of kings . After all my trips I 'm still not sure whether monsters exist . I did catch something on film in DT Okanagan . I 'm sure PRP 's possible for things to exist without discovery in places IN DT Congo and DT Himalayas , and EX are just too JJ NNS who 've seen something in Bigfoot territory for EX to be nothing at all . Maybe PRP should VB find out yourself . Just print a business card saying PRP 're a monster hunter and head off into DT unknown . • Scary Monsters and Super Creeps : In Search of DT NNP 's Most Hideous Beasts by Dom Joly ( Simon & Schuster , £ 12.99 ) is out now . text: When DT Russians take decisive action , PRP is usually for a reason . As PRP will see below , DT Russians have suddenly decided IN now is DT NN to create an organization WDT will be tasked with detecting , tracking and potentially destroying incoming asteroids . Are PRP doing this now because PRP have finally decided IN this is a good idea , or has something gotten their attention ? Of course PRP are not likely to publicly admit if PRP have come to DT conclusion IN a gigantic space rock is heading directly toward PRP . Just IN DT U.S. NN , DT Russian NN is very interested in maintaining social order , and so PRP MD probably delay telling DT NN about a potential asteroid impact for as long as possible . In life , what NNS do is far more important than what PRP say , and DT JJ center WDT DT Russians have just created will not just be watching giant space rocks . According to Futurism , this JJ organization will be in charge of making sure “ PRP do n’t collide with NNP ” … Russian space agency Roscosmos is creating a center devoted to monitoring meteors , comets , and asteroids to ensure PRP do n’t collide with NNP — even PRP means having to blow them up in space . “ As part of DT creation of a monitoring system and information support for DT safety of space activities in near - NNP space , PRP plan to launch DT Russian Center for Small Celestial Bodies , whose main task will be to detect and track celestial bodies approaching NNP , ” Igor Bakaras , a senior official at Roscosmos subsidiary TsNIIMash , told Russian - owned NN agency Sputnik . Certainly nobody can fault DT Russians for allocating resources toward this purpose . Our solar system is full of potentially dangerous giant space rocks , and a big enough impact MD literally end our civilization . But why now ? According to a British NN source , this JJ organization will be evaluating whether PRP is better “ to destroy celestial objects or steer them on to JJ trajectories and away from NNP ” … Roscosmos , DT Russian equivalent of Nasa , wants to work out if PRP ’s possible to destroy celestial objects or steer them on to JJ trajectories and away from NNP . This MD involve slamming a ‘ kinetic impactor ’ craft in DT rock or using a satellite to drag PRP onto a JJ course . Nukes MD RB be sent into space to blow up DT rocks . A JJ department at Roscosmos called DT Russian Centre for Celestial Bodies will be tasked with looking into space to find comets and asteroids approaching NNP . Once again , nobody can argue with DT value of such a major project , but is n’t NASA already doing all this ? MD n’t DT Russians just sit back and let PRP Americans do all DT work ? I wish someone MD ask Vladimir Putin DT question . And this sudden move by DT Russians comes just CD NN after DT U.S. issued a “ National Near - NN Object Preparedness Strategy and Action Plan ” … In 2018 , DT White House Office of NNP and Technology Policy released a JJ report titled DT “ National Near - NNP Object Preparedness Strategy and Action Plan ” . DT 18 - page document outlines DT steps WDT NASA and DT Federal Emergency Management Agency ( FEMA ) will take over DT next 10 NNS to both prevent dangerous asteroids from striking NNP and prepare DT country for DT potential consequences of such an event . Maybe U.S. officials suddenly decided last NN IN having a plan for incoming giant space rocks was a great idea , and maybe DT Russians decided IN PRP was such a great idea IN PRP should copy PRP . Or maybe both governments VBP something WDT PRP are n’t telling PRP yet . Of course DT truth is IN NASA has not even identified most of DT giant space rocks WDT are floating around out RB . For example , back in July a very large asteroid came very close to hitting PRP … A 427 - foot - wide asteroid whizzed within 45,000 miles of NNP on Thursday . While DT MD sound far away , 45,000 miles is what astronomers consider a close shave : PRP ’s less than 20 % of DT distance between NNP and DT moon . This was DT closest PRP ’ve come to an “ Armageddon ” - JJ scenario in at least a few NNS . If DT asteroid had actually hit our NN , PRP MD have been DT worst disaster WDT any of PRP have ever seen by a very wide margin . And according to leaked emails , officials at NASA only knew about PRP DT day before PRP whizzed by PRP … Travelling at 55,000 mph and measuring 426 feet by 187ft ( 130 m x 57 m ) , NASA only realised 2019 OK was coming 24 hours before PRP passed . Experts say IN had PRP hit , PRP MD have devastated an entire city IN London with over 30 times DT NN of DT atomic blast at Hiroshima . So DT truth is IN PRP MD be hit by a giant space rock at any NN , and none of PRP MD have any idea IN PRP is even coming . With DT being VBN , EX are a couple of enormous asteroids WDT NNS do VB about DT MD potentially be major problems over DT next decade . DT first NN WDT I VBP to discuss is 2007 FT3 . DT is not a fancy name , and not IN much is known about DT asteroid , but apparently EX is a chance IN PRP “ might hit DT NN on Oct. 2 , 2024 ” … In DT case of 2007 FT3 , Sentry reported IN DT asteroid MD hit NNP between DT NNS 2024 and 2116 . During these NNS , Sentry recorded a total of 164 potential NNP impacts caused by DT asteroid . As noted by DT monitoring system , EX ’s a chance IN 2007 FT3 might hit DT NN on Oct. 2 , 2024 . By DT way , Rosh Hashanah begins on DT evening of October 2nd , 2024 . I do n’t VB if DT is important , but I thought I MD throw DT out RB . According to NASA , this asteroid MD hit at a speed of approximately 46,000 miles per hour , and PRP MD “ create a crater WDT ’s several miles long ” … Based on DT data collected by Sentry , DT asteroid has an estimated diameter of about 1,115 feet , which makes PRP almost as tall as DT Empire NNP Building . DT monitoring system noted IN PRP MD breach NNP ’s atmosphere and hit DT NN at a velocity of around 46,000 miles per hour . Given DT asteroid ’s speed and size , PRP is certainly capable of causing high levels of destruction if PRP ends up colliding with NNP . Upon impact , PRP MD create a crater WDT ’s several miles long . DT NN WDT will be released from DT asteroid ’s explosion MD be powerful enough to level an entire city as well as its neighboring areas . 2007 FT3 is not getting much publicity at all , but a slightly larger asteroid WDT MD potentially hit PRP in 2029 is getting far more attention . On April 13th , 2029 , PRP is being projected IN Apophis will pass by our NN at a distance WDT is “ ten times closer than DT moon ” . DT following comes from Wikipedia … DT closest known approach of Apophis comes on April 13 , 2029 , when DT asteroid comes to within a distance of around 31,000 kilometres from NNP ’s surface . DT distance , a hair ’s breadth in astronomical terms , is ten times closer than DT moon , and even closer than some man-made satellites . [ 23 ] PRP will be DT closest asteroid of its size in recorded history . On DT date , PRP will become as bright as magnitude 3.1 [ 22 ] ( visible to DT naked eye from rural as well as darker suburban areas , visible with binoculars from most locations ) . [ 24 ] DT close approach will be visible from Europe , Africa , and western Asia . During DT approach , NNP will perturb Apophis from an Aten - class orbit with a semi-major axis of 0.92 AU to an Apollo - class orbit with a semi-major axis of 1.1 AU . NASA insists IN PRP will not actually hit PRP , but other independent researchers are skeptical . And if Apophis does n’t hit PRP then , NASA has listed ten other future dates when PRP potentially MD … Over in Russia , PRP are so concerned about this asteroid WDT PRP have “ developed intercontinental ballistic missiles WDT aim to destroy asteroid Apophis ” … In what sounds IN an elevator pitch for an Armageddon sequel , Russian NNS announced IN PRP ’ve developed intercontinental ballistic missiles WDT aim to destroy asteroid Apophis , which is VBG to swing by NNP in 2036 . RB referred to as 99942 Apophis , PRP measures 210 - 330 meters ( 690 - 1080 feet ) in diameter . According to a Slate article by astronomer Phil Plait an encounter with NNP MD mean not so fun times for our NN ; “ PRP MD release DT NN equivalent to more than 1 billion tons of TNT exploding , at least 20 times more than DT largest nuke ever detonated ! ” Russian NNS have RB warned IN Apophis MD have “ hundreds of opportunities to hit DT NNP over DT course of DT next century ” . But for now , both American and Russian NNS are assuring PRP IN everything is just fine and IN EX is no reason to panic . Do PRP believe them ? Maybe PRP are telling PRP DT truth . Maybe EX is nothing to be concerned about at all . But of course both governments have a long track record of being loose with DT truth , and PRP MD n’t be much of a surprise at all if PRP were n’t exactly being straight with PRP . text: DT presence of conserved noncoding regions in genomes is a footprint WDT points to DT likely existence of conserved modes of gene regulation . In plants , EX appear to be fewer conserved noncoding sequences than in animals ; because PRP are shorter , PRP are harder to find . Freeling et al. examined DT genome of Arabidopsis , which underwent a duplication of its genome ( DT α event ) in its recent history , in order to identify noncoding sequences WDT border genes and WDT have been retained . Large regions , relatively rich in conserved noncoding sequences ( such as DT G - box CACGTG ) , were designated Bigfoot and were often associated with transcription factor binding motifs . Smaller regions of noncoding sequences were RB identified ( and dubbed Smallfoot ) and were often linked to components of signal transduction pathways . Few of these noncoding sequences were identified outside of paralogous genes , suggesting IN DT regulatory regions of other genes are less conserved or MD evolve at a rapid rate . — LMZ

text: Bristol - Myers Squibb , which is shifting its focus toward biologics manufacturing , will unload an API plant in Ireland to a South Korean company WDT has aspirations of becoming a big deal in contract manufacturing . DT U.S. drugmaker VBD today IN PRP will sell its plant in Swords to SK Biotek , a unit of South Korea ’s third largest conglomerate , SK Holdings . SK has been a BMS ingredient supplier for a decade . DT two kept terms under wraps except to say DT deal should close in Q4 and IN SK will continue to produce DT products BMS now makes at DT plant , which includes DT API for Bristol - Myers Squibb and Pfizer ’s anticoagulant Eliquis . SK Biotek will take on about 300 workers at DT facility , while some will transfer to jobs in Dublin , a BMS spokesman VBD in an email . SK Biotek , DT first South Korean company to set up shop in Ireland , will use DT BMS plant as a base for its burgeoning contract development and manufacturing business . PRP plans to add marketing and research and development operations at DT site , as well as spend money on upgrades to boost capacity . “ This transaction is an important step to achieve our goal of becoming a leading JJ CDMO , ” SK Biotek CEO Junku Park VBD in a statement . SK Holdings , which has revenues WDT top $ 120 billion , has decided IN contract pharma manufacturing is a natural offshoot of its chemical and ingredient businesses and has identified PRP as a growth driver for DT company . PRP has four plants in South Korea , according to its website , and SK Biotek had 2015 revenues of KRW 75.5 billion ( $ 6.6 million ) . PRP says PRP expects DT unit to reach KRW 130 billion in sales this NN . PRP has VBN PRP MD VB to someday rival CDMOs IN Lonza and Boehringer Ingelheim . Last NN , SK Holdings indicated PRP was working on a couple of deals , worth about $ 500 million each , to buy API sites in DT U.S. and Europe . IN other big drugmakers , BMS has been scaling back in small - molecule production . In 2015 , PRP closed an API plant at Cruiserath in North County Dublin and shut down a production line at DT plant in Swords . DT has happened as its pipeline of products shifted toward biologic drugs . PRP is building a $ 900 million , 320,000 - square - foot biologics plant adjacent to a bulk manufacturing facility in Dublin . “ Today ’s agreement is an important step in DT ongoing evolution of our manufacturing network to support DT company ’s innovative portfolio , ” Lou Schmukler , BMS NN of JJ product development and supply , VBD in a statement .

Eagle Point resident Gary Harrington spent 90 days in jail for illegally harboring some 13 million gallons of illicit rainwater — WDT ’s enough rain to fill around 20 Olympic - sized swimming pools . Harrington masterfully crafted several ponds on his property — even building docks for CD , and stocking PRP with largemouth bass — but his insistence DT NN MD assist in fire control and prevention did n’t satisfy DT NN , since a “ 1925 NN law dictates IN DT NN belongs to DT Medford NNP Commission . ” “ DT bigger story here is IN rainwater collection is indeed kosher in Oregon , provided IN PRP ’re capturing PRP from an artificial , impervious surface such as a rooftop with DT assistance of rainwater barrels . “ But an extensive reservoir set - up complete with 10 - and 20 - foot - tall dams is verboten without DT proper , NN - issued NN - right permits — after all , Oregon law dictates IN NN is a publicly owned resource — and Harrington did not possess VBN permits . ” Harrington and DT Oregon NNP Resources Department waged an extended battle over DT ponds , and at CD point , PRP was ruled he MD be allowed to keep everything in place — but DT decision was backtracked in less than CD NN . Ultimately , “ Rain Man , ” as he came to be called , found himself charged with nine misdemeanors , spent three months behind bars , and had to shell out $ 1,500 in fines — and was ordered to destroy DT dams and drain all DT ponds . Harrington ’s case might have been infinitely more complex than DT Careys ’ — considering DT large volume of NN and infrastructure he ’d put in place — but PRP share DT same theme of overbearing NN and arguably wholly unnecessary law versus DT right of NNS to do as PRP please with their property . “ When PRP ’re honest , PRP take everything away from PRP , ” VBD Sabrina Carey , who inspected country records — which plainly showed DT pond — before PRP purchased DT property . In an effort to prove DT pond is legitimate and persuade county NN to allow PRP to remain on DT property , DT couple stopped using PRP — even though DT well on their land had run dry — and began shipping in DT NN for daily living and gardening from nearly Butte Falls . Indeed , DT 40 - NN - old man does n’t even profit from DT JJ cannabis grown on DT land he and his wife own , as he literally gives DT crop — free of charge — to friends . “ I do n’t make anything out of this , ” he VBD . Members of DT NNP Commission disagree on whether this is an issue worth fighting over at all , but as DT Mail Tribune reports , “ NNP Commission staff found several problems with DT Careys ’ request , including setting a precedent WDT MD prompt similar requests and weaken NN statutes while not meeting DT definition of ‘ municipal NN source . ’ “ DT staff found PRP MD be very difficult to access DT NN stored in DT pond for municipal reasons , and further monitoring and following up on compliance issues MD be difficult and costly for DT commission . ” However , DT commission RB failed to VB why this should be a matter for DT NN in DT first place — why punitive bureaucracy needs to meddle with a pond on private property , serving as a valuable ecosystem , DT poses no threat to anyone or anything , and is n’t even an eyesore , must be destroyed . Besides a trailer home and dilapidated house , DT pond is DT only thing of value on their acreage , and , obviously , as Sabrina VBD , “ PRP did n’t buy PRP for DT double - wide . ” She told DT Mail Tribune DT pond should have been registered with DT Oregon NNP Resources Department nine NNS ago , but DT owners at DT NN did not reside on DT property and did n’t do so . text: Western NNS first learned about extinct giant ape species Gigantopithecus blacki — DT largest primate to ever exist — in 1935 when an anthropologist came across some of its massive molars in Chinese drug stores selling them as dragon teeth . Since then , researchers have identified thousands of teeth and a few partial jawbones from DT creature . With these pieces in hand , PRP ’ve tried to fit DT bigfoot - JJ ape into DT primate family tree . Without any usable DNA , however , DT task has been difficult . Now , using proteins in dental enamel , researchers report PRP 've finally found how DT Gigantopithecus fits into DT great ape puzzle , according to a JJ NN published in DT journal Nature . According to a press release , DNA has been key in helping NNS map out DT messy relationships between primates and hominids WDT lived within DT past 50,000 NNS . But in fossils older than DT , DNA is very difficult to extract and NNS have only done PRP successfully in a few rare NNS , including in CD 400,000 - NN - old hominin specimen . Gigantopithecus remains are estimated to be between 300,000 to 2 million NNS old , placing its reign at some point during DT Pleistocene epoch . No Gigantopithecus DNA has ever been recovered . DT ’s why an international team of researchers used techniques from an emerging field called proteomics to VB molecular information from DT Gigantopithecus molar in DT JJ NN . In traditional DNA sequencing , pieces of DT DNA molecule are put through a process WDT copies its sequence of nucleotides and puts them back together into a full genome . DT quality and completeness of DT genome , however , depends on how well - preserved DT original sample of DNA is . Most DNA degrades much more quickly , especially in hot , humid climates . But in proteomics , researchers more or less reverse - engineer DNA by looking at DT proteins preserved in teeth , which last much longer . Because each protein is made up of amino acids , and because each amino acid is encoded by a three - letter DNA sequence , researchers can produce snippets of ancient DNA by analyzing DT proteins . Last September , DT technique was used to properly place a 1.7 - million - NN - old species of wooly rhinoceros in its family tree , proving IN DT method MD be used to understand ancient animals . Researchers applied DT protein - mining technique to a 1.9 million - NN - old molar from Gigantopithecus found in a Chuifeng cave in NNP . Gretchen Vogel at NNP reports DT team dissolved tiny amounts of enamel from DT tooth and then analyzed PRP using mass spectrometry . PRP were able to identify 500 peptides , or short chains of amino acids , from six different proteins . Bruce Bower at NNP NNP reports IN five of those proteins still occur in extant ape and monkey species . DT team compared DT accumulated differences in DT proteins to those animals , finding IN DT massive Gigantopithecus is a distant relative of modern orangutans . DT two lineages likely diverged from a common ancestor over 10 million NNS ago . “ Until now , all WDT was known about this species was based on DT morphology of DT JJ teeth and DT few mandibles found , typical of a herbivore , " NN author Enrico Cappellini , an evolutionary geneticist at DT University of Copenhagen , says in DT press release . “ Now , DT analysis of ancient proteins , or palaeoproteomics , has allowed PRP to reconstruct DT evolutionary history of this distant relative . ” DT success of this technique has big implications for DT future of paleoanthropology . Because JJ of DT fossilized remains of ancient hominins come from tropical and subtropical areas , IN East Africa , southern Africa and Indonesia , EX ’s little chance IN viable DNA has survived . But DT protein trick changes everything . “ Until now , PRP has only been possible to retrieve genetic information from up to 10,000 - NN - old fossils in warm , humid areas , ” Welker tells Katie Hunt at CNN . “ This is interesting , because ancient remains of DT supposed ancestors of our species , Homo sapiens , are RB mainly found in subtropical areas , particularly for DT early part of human evolution . While DT NN tells researchers a little bit about Gigantopithecus ’s origins , Capellini tells Hunt IN PRP does n’t shed much light on what DT massive ape looked IN or how PRP behaved .

text: DT Miami Herald reports IN a local couple is VBG all DT way to DT NN supreme court to fight a local ordinance banning front - yard vegetable gardens : Hermine Ricketts and her husband Tom Carroll MD grow fruit trees and flowers in DT front yard of their Miami Shores house … Vegetables , however , are not allowed .
