But according to a village ordinance WDT restricts edible plants to backyards only , PRP were actually criminals . “ DT ’s what NN does – interferes in NNS ’s lives , ” Ricketts VBD . “ PRP had DT garden for 17 NNS . PRP ate fresh meals every day from DT garden . Since DT village stepped its big foot in PRP , PRP have ruined our garden and my NN . ” These sorts of stories pop up several times a NN . PRP are often discussed at free - market oriented and libertarian sites to illustrate just DT myriad of ways WDT DT NN interferes in our daily lives . JJ times , PRP intervene to prohibit totally innocuous activities IN growing a front - yard garden . What articles IN these often fail to point out of course , is IN these laws did n’t appear out of nowhere . PRP are often passed because some voters demanded DT city council or DT county commission pass laws prohibiting front - yard gardens , or backyard chicken coops , or other non-violent activities deemed by some to be a nuisance to DT neighborhood . These laws then persist over NN because DT majority of voters either agree with DT laws , or do n’t feel strongly enough about DT matter to demand a NN . In Miami Shores , DT law against front - yard gardens was likely passed because at least a few NNS felt IN front yard gardens were not so innocuous after all . This situation illustrates , yet again , a problem with majoritarian NN . If a majority of DT citizens of Miami Shores — or whatever jurisdiction — hate front - yard gardens , then PRP likely to vote for candidates who will vote to ban them . DT minority , of course , is simply out of luck . DT implied solution in JJ of these free - market publications is IN NN should just VB out of DT business of regulating front yards . OK . But then NNS will begin to ask DT inevitable questions : • Should NNS be able to just dump garbage in their front yards then ? • Can PRP park a food truck RB 24 - hours a day and sell hamburgers out of them ? • Can PRP put in their front yards a 20 - foot sculpture of a jackalope ? If DT response is “ of course not ” then DT next question is “ why not ? ” or “ so what is prohibited in front yards ? ” If a pile of old appliances is not acceptable in DT front yard , why is a vegetable garden acceptable ? What if JJ NNS VBP gardens are nearly as unsightly as an old car on blocks ? PRP can probably figure out where this leads . PRP ’re right back at regulating what NNS can do in their front yards . text: Bigfoot is a racing video game released in July 1990 for DT Nintendo Entertainment System . PRP was developed by Beam Software and published by Acclaim . DT game was advertised by DT legendary monster truck of DT same name in DT cartoon segment of DT 1990 television show , Video Power , titled DT Power Team . DT show RB often used sound effects for DT actions of not only Bigfoot , but others as well . DT gameplay involves racing monster trucks including DT title truck , Bigfoot ( blue ) . DT computer controlled trucks are green ( DT Growler ) , and yellow ( DT Charger ) . DT player begins competing against DT Growler , but if DT computer 's truck runs out of money PRP will forfeit DT race and be replaced with DT Charger . Should DT Charger run out of money PRP will be replaced with a second green vehicle and so on . PRP was not uncommon for a skilled player to be challenged by three to four different monster trucks during DT game . In two player mode DT 2nd player 's truck is red . DT object of DT game is to advance to DT next level ( race ) with incurring DT least amount of damage as possible . DT levels consist of car crushing , mud bog , tractor pull , hill climb , and DT later levels are a combination of everything except DT sled pull , simply called a drag race . To advance to DT next event DT player must complete a " cross country " race collecting money , points , etc. without damaging DT truck .

text: Is bunion pain getting in DT way of your life ? Bunions can have a negative effect on your day to day life , making PRP hard to walk and wear shoes which are tight to your feet . DT surgery is undertaken by making a small cut in DT skin over your big toe , cutting or scraping away DT bunion and then returning DT toe bone to its correct position using metal screws or staples put under your skin . text: What ever happened to quality NN reporting in DT mainstream NN ? Why do so JJ journalists seem to simply accept press releases as fact ? Are qualifications no longer relevant when PRP comes to journalistic scrutiny of NN ? Perhaps EX ’s no longer any scrutiny ? Let ’s be clear : EX is NO Yeti ! DT NNS claiming EX is such a creature have no idea about NN or DT evidence WDT MD be needed to convince NNS IN a Yeti , or Bigfoot , or Yowie , or what ever PRP call PRP , exists ! This week I learned from Sydney ’s Daily Telegraph , DT ABC , DT UK ’s Mail and Telegraph newspapers and DT Huffington Post ( no less ) IN a Russian scientist is to be supported in his Bigfoot - hunting efforts by an international team specialising in human evolution . I checked my calendar to see if PRP was April 1 , and not October 6 , as I had ( mistakenly ) thought . No , October . This story must be real . Not again , I thought . DT 82 - NN - old Russian heading DT project , Igor Burstev – apparently “ Dr ” Burstev – has convinced himself , local authorities , and apparently plenty of journalists , IN DT Yeti is real . Burstev even claims DT Yeti is a relic population of Neandertals . And a number of sometimes quite respectable NN outlets have been sucked in with this nonsense . Who are these “ international NNS ” who are VBG to find DT Yeti ? PRP have been given no names , nor credentials , nor institutions PRP belong to . I suspect , UH so JJ of DT so - called NN - VBP deniers , PRP are frauds . Is EX a chance DT Yeti might exist ? Yes , EX ’s a chance , just as with so JJ phenomena PRP NNS VBP about . PRP ’s possible . From NN to NN , a JJ species of mammal , even primate , is described in some remote area largely unexplored by NNS . But based on DT evidence presented in favour of its existence , DT Yeti looks IN a very poor hoax to me . Why are EX no proper photographs of this creature ? Oh , of course – DT NNS who have seen PRP were too scared to look away and pick up their cameras in case DT Yeti disappeared from view . All of DT claimed photographs or video footage I have seen are completely bogus . I MD do a better job myself with a gorilla costume from a party shop , a good camera , and photo - editing software . Why do PRP always have ridiculously large footprints WDT look IN some off - course camel train passed through snow - swept Siberia ? A few facts : DT Neandertals , our closet evolutionary relative , with whom PRP shared an ancestor 400 - 500,000 NNS ago , went extinct 25 - 30,000 NNS ago . PRP had a body mass of around 75 kilograms ( on average ) and stood about 162 centimetres tall ( on average ) . PRP can estimate these things with good accuracy from their bones . I ’m about 75 kilograms , but a lot taller than 162 centimetres . Yet my foot is size eight , about average for an Australian male . Why DT big foot ? Lack of imagination by DT hoaxers , I suppose . PRP will never forget either DT six million Jews plus five million others who perished because of CD hateful vision , ” she VBD . “ Today , however , more than ever , individuals are using hate speech to foment clashes between civilizations in DT name of religion . Their goal is to radicalize young boys and girls , to VB them to see DT NN in black and white , good versus evil , and VB them to embrace a path of violence as DT only way forward . ” Both Ms. Gallach and Nassir Abdulaziz Al–Nasser , High Representative for DT UN Alliance of Civilizations ( UNAOC ) , DT symposium 's host , stressed IN DT “ loudspeakers for hate ” have been amplified exponentially with DT explosion of JJ means of communication beyond DT traditional NN , with Facebook and Twitter providing immediate worldwide access . “ PRP have a big problem on our hands , ” Ms. Gallach VBD . “ DT NN has witnessed this very recently in Paris , where , at last count , 130 NNS have died at DT hands of nine young men who heeded DT [ Islamic NNP in Iraq and DT Levant , or ISIL ] call for violence and succumbed to hate speech . ” She called for passage and enforcement of laws prohibiting incitement of hatred or violence , and DT use of communications to establish a counter - message . “ PRP must monitor social NN and quickly respond to hate speech , ” Ms. Gallach stressed . “ Of course , in an age when Facebook has over 1.5 billion monthly active users , or Twitter has over 300 million users , monitoring might be almost an impossible task , but PRP can achieve this with DT involvement of citizens of DT NN , who are VBG to be our crucial partners in combatting hate speech . ” Underscoring IN DT battle is a collective responsibility , not only for Member NNPS , but for everyone , including DT NN , she highlighted corporations as crucial partners with DT task of deleting content inciting violence or hatred . Mr. Al - Nasser RB noted DT role played by JJ NN . “ PRP see how radical groups have hijacked these JJ NN platforms and used [ them ] as an advocacy tool for their extremist ideologies , and inciting violence and hatred , ” he VBD . “ In doing so , PRP have assaulted not only individuals , but RB JJ values representing DT UN Universal Declaration of Human Rights . On DT other hand , PRP see those who RB use information technology to re-inforce stereotypes , stigmatization and demonization against certain race , faith , or sexual orientation . “ DT being VBN , our next goal should be winning DT battle of ideas , ” he stressed , citing DT use of hate speech against migrants and minority communities blaming them for a nation 's problems . text: CD of America ’s most famous criminals , Jesse James , is shot to death by fellow gang member Bob Ford , who betrayed James for reward money . For 16 NNS , Jesse and his brother , Frank , committed robberies and murders throughout DT Midwest . Detective magazines and pulp novels glamorized DT James gang , turning them into mythical Robin Hoods who were driven to crime by unethical landowners and bankers . In reality , Jesse James was a ruthless killer who stole only for himself . DT teenage James brothers joined up with southern guerrilla leaders when DT Civil War broke out . Both participated in massacres of settlers and troops affiliated with DT North . After DT war was over , DT quiet farming life of DT James brothers ’ youth no longer seemed enticing , and DT two turned to crime . Jesse ’s first bank robbery occurred on February 13 , 1866 , in Liberty , Missouri . Over DT next couple of NNS , DT James brothers became DT suspects in several bank robberies throughout western Missouri . However , locals were sympathetic to ex-southern guerrillas and vouched for DT brothers . Throughout DT late 1860s and early 1870s , DT James gang robbed only a couple banks a NN , otherwise keeping a low profile . In 1873 , DT James gang got into DT train robbery game . During CD such robbery , DT gang declined to take any money or valuables from southerners . DT train robberies brought out DT Pinkerton Detective Agency , employed to bring DT James gang to justice . However , DT Pinkerton operatives ’ botched attempt to kill James left a woman and her child injured and elicited JJ sympathy for Jesse and Frank James . DT James gang suffered a setback in 1876 when PRP raided DT town of Northfield , Minnesota . DT Younger brothers , cousins of DT James brothers , were shot and wounded during DT brazen midday robbery . After running off in a different direction from Jesse and Frank , DT Younger brothers were captured by a large posse and later sentenced to life in prison . Jesse and Frank , DT only members of DT gang to escape successfully , headed to Tennessee to hide out . After spending a few quiet NNS farming , Jesse organized a JJ gang . Charlie and Robert Ford were on DT fringe of DT JJ gang , but PRP disliked Jesse intensely and decided to kill him for DT reward money . On April 3 , while Jesse ’s mother made breakfast , DT JJ gang met to hear Jesse ’s plan for DT next robbery . When Jesse turned his back to adjust a picture on DT wall , Bob Ford shot him several times in DT back . His tombstone reads , “ Jesse W. James , Died April 3 , 1882 , Aged 34 NNS , 6 months , 28 days , Murdered by a traitor and a coward whose name is not worthy to appear here . ” READ MORE : 7 Things PRP MD Not VB About Jesse James

text: Pictures of a " Yeti footprint " DT Indian Army posted on social NN triggered a barrage of jokes on Tuesday . DT system WDT dominates our waking hours , commands our unthinking devotion , and drives PRP , IN orthodox followers of an exacting faith , to extraordinary , even absurd feats of exertion is not democracy , which often seems remote and fragile . PRP ’s meritocracy — DT system WDT claims to reward talent and effort with a top - notch education and a well - paid profession , its code of rigorous practice and generous blessings passed down from generation to generation . text: Mr Tim Clough qualified from DT Universities of St Andrews , Scotland and Manchester in 1992 . He holds a full NN Consultant post at Wrightington , Wigan and Leigh NHS Foundation Trust . He is on DT Specialist Register as an Orthopaedic Consultant . He is an Honorary Senior Lecturer at DT University of Salford . Mr Clough specialises in ankle , foot and knee surgery and sports injuries . He gained extensive training in these areas through an International Arthroscopy and Sports Medicine Fellowship in Canada and through a Foot and Ankle Fellowship at Wrightington . During his training , he won both DT British Orthopaedic Association ( BOA ) Sanofi Synthelabo Travelling Fellowship Prize in 2002 and DT British Orthopaedic Foot and Ankle Society Travelling Fellowship Prize in 2004 . He is currently Foot and Ankle surgeon for several professional Premiership and Championship football teams , Super League rugby teams and a local Premiership rugby union team . He has published articles on ankle and knee replacements , day case forefoot surgery and has presented at regional , national and international meetings . His current areas of research include DT clinical outcome of ankle replacement , surgical management of DT rheumatoid foot , clinical outcome of joint replacement surgery to DT big toe and newer treatment outcomes for chronic Achilles tendinopathy . Mr Clough is a keen teacher and is a Faculty member on DT MCh Orth course at Dundee , a Faculty member on DT MSc Orthopaedic course at DT University of Salford and organiser of DT ‘ Foot and Ankle ’ module for DT MSc Orthopaedic course .

DT pill and its digital companions , now FDA - approved as Abilify MyCite , are n't likely to make a big difference to Otsuka 's Abilify sales — certainly not immediately , given its plans for a limited initial launch . DT atypical antipsychotic drug is already available as a cheap generic , and doctors are already using an injectable , long - lasting version — Abilify Maintena — to manage patients who have problems sticking to a daily pill regimen . Payers MD be wary of DT costs . Then EX 's DT fear factor . DT pill and its companion smartphone app allow doctors — and anyone else DT patient designates , for DT matter — to track their dosing . DT video , shot by ferry boat operator Bobby Clark , was shown on Fox Television 's tabloid show A Current Affair . PRP 's believed DT program paid as much as $ 100,000 for DT pictures . But another Bigfoot watcher is a little more open to DT possibility DT tape is real . Matt Moneymaker , director of DT Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization , concludes DT blurry image on DT video is not a trick of DT light , not a bear and not a fabricated image . DT dark figure with arms and legs is " either a human or a sasquatch " but " is not clearly CD or DT other , " writes Moneymaker on his website . Clark filmed DT video at a river crossing north of DT community of Norway House on April 16 . Norway House is about 460 kilometres north of Winnipeg .

text: Ancient Aliens Are Racist and Other Lefty Insanity If PRP ’ve watched DT History Channel , PRP VBP IN “ ancient aliens ” probably built DT Pyramids and Stonehenge and maybe DT Hanging Gardens of Babylon ( and why MD n’t little green men have little green thumbs ? ) Of course , if PRP watch DT History Channel , PRP RB VBP IN Adolf Hitler MD have escaped Germany via U - boat and was spotted 1950 working as a volunteer starter at a Venezuelan golf course . text: Obama continues to push $ 66 billion for preschool , despite concerns ( BigGovernment.news ) A proposal for universal preschool in NNP Barack Obama ’s final budget MD add $ 66 billion to federal spending over DT next decade , despite recent findings in Tennessee WDT show such programs have minimal impact on achievement . This is DT third NN DT Obama administration has pushed Congress for an expanded federal - NN partnership for school for 4 - NN - olds , which proponents say MD help close DT performance gap for NNS from low - or moderate - income families . DT Congressional Budget Office noted DT $ 66 - billion price tag in a report , released March 29 , on DT NN ’s 2017 budget . But Ross Whitehurst , a clinical child psychologist and senior fellow with DT Brookings Institute , questions DT plan . “ For most kids , EX ’s no substantial benefit , and maybe some harm , from attending pre-K , ” he told AMI Newswire . Whitehurst refers to a NN out of Vanderbilt University last fall WDT found students in Tennessee ’s $ 213 - million preschool program ultimately performed worse than their non-preschool counterparts by DT end of second grade . DT Vanderbilt NN VBD participants in a preschool program were better prepared for , and performed better during , kindergarten than their counterparts , but IN DT benefits did n’t last . Whitehurst noted DT federal NN already has a “ mismash ” of programs directed at early learning WDT cost about $ 14 billion per NN , according to testimony he gave two NNS ago before a House committee . “ I do not oppose spending more , but EX are JJ aspects of DT administration ’s plan WDT I do n’t VB , ” he VBD . Although not an opponent of preschool programs , Whitehurst expressed concern IN DT latest proposal , virtually identical to DT ones before PRP , represented Washington “ taking over ” DT early childhood process , calling PRP a “ pretty big foot ” in DT door of federal control of what has been , to this point , a NN - driven program . • More : Once again , loud and clear : School funding not tied to educational outcomes and achievement Texas , for example , provides preschool to certain NNS , including those who are homeless , cared for by active duty service members , or unable to speak or comprehend English . DT proposed program MD actually cost about $ 120 billion over DT next 10 NNS , with NNS opting into DT program and chipping in 40 percent of DT costs , Whitehurst noted . Similar to DT Affordable Care Act ’s Medicare expansion provisions , DT Preschool for All bill MD require NNS to opt-in to DT program in order to receive federal funding . In its latest report , DT Congressional Budget Office gave lower overall estimates than DT Department of Education due , in part , to DT expectation IN some NNS MD initially reject DT program . In a memo on DT 2017 Budget , DT Obama Administration suggest costs MD be paid for , in part , through increased tobacco taxes . Although Whitehurst is skeptical of a universal program , he VBD studies do show preschool helps NNS from non-English - speaking homes learn English more quickly in preparation for kindergarten . PRP RB helps low - income families receive a form of free child care . He advocates programs WDT more directly target these groups , but VBD proponents of universal preschool worry targeted programs , particularly those for DT poor , MD not receive widespread political support . “ As I see PRP , I try to represent what research says , ” he VBD . “ PRP ’s not my goal to play DT political game , but to understand how much PRP do n’t VB , understand DT research limitations . ” Whitehurst VBD “ elevating ” preschool might be a bad idea for DT stated goal of reducing achievement gaps , when DT money MD VB to programs showing more promise in addressing DT goal . A National Bureau of NNP Research NN on 106 students in a Chicago - based math - tutoring program found 9th - graders , on average , were able to develop math skills in CD NN what DT average student developed in three NNS , closing DT equivalent of two - thirds of DT education gap between black and white students . According to Whitehurst , who spoke about DT program at a Brooking ’s Institute talk last week , DT Chicago program costs about $ 3,000 per student . “ If PRP gave me a choice between spending $ 3,000 to VB a bunch of kids — who are VBG to drop out because PRP ’re failing at math — up to speed , or spending $ 9,000 on a NN on pre-K for every child in general , I choose DT former , ” Whitehurst VBD . DT program is among DT largest items in an education budget proposed by Obama WDT , according to DT Congressional Budget Office , MD add $ 152 billion to DT deficit over DT next decade . text: Believers theorize IN he came down from Mt. Hood , DT 14,000 - foot blizzard - shrouded peak just outside Portland , Oregon . Massive , standing nearly nine feet tall and weighing all of 900 pounds , he strode down DT wooded ridges , north and east to DT 7,000 - foot level where DT spring snow lay wet and heavy in forests 50 miles from DT nearest road . At DT 4,000 - foot level , DT thick coniferous forests thinned and DT deep mountain gorges leveled out . PRP was late June , 1971 , and DT lower rivers raged with DT waters of DT melting snow pack . At DT 3,000 - foot level DT first growths of douglas fir and oak gave way to a few scrub oak , growing singly . From a high point on DT ridge WDT runs down from Mt. Hood called Seven Mile Hill , he MD see DT lights of DT Dalles , Oregon , where 11,000 NNS lived . Some who theorize about him VBP IN he came down to this narrow point in DT river where EX is little current because an island breaks DT swim to Washington and DT Cascade Range — where DT deer and huckleberries are plentiful in DT summer . East DT land opens to treeless rolling hills . Great high - tension towers converge on DT Chenowith Converter and scar DT land as far as DT eye can see . EX was no cover for him RB . But to swim DT river from here , four miles west of DT Dalles , he had only to cross two roads : DT old highway to Portland , NNP 30 , and DT JJ Interstate , 80N . Things had changed since he had last been down to DT river . In DT early daylight hours of this first day of June , 1971 , he stood in a small meadow above what had been a large foothill apple orchard . PRP was now filled with flat electrified platforms and called DT Pinewood Mobile Manor . Joe Mederios , maintenance man for DT trailer court , was watering flowers near his trailer DT morning . Directly across NNP 30 is a large fenced meadow . At about 150 yards a rocky ledge of perhaps 35 feet banks a higher meadow . Mederios caught a movement along DT ledge from a corner of his eye . He assumed PRP was George Johnson , DT owner of DT land , and went back to watering his flowers . But his mind was engaged in a curious and unconscious arithmetic . He had seen Johnson on DT land previously — PRP was n’t unusual — but this figure was too big … DT arms were too long … DT shoulders too broad . Mederios turned to DT ridge for a longer look . What he saw was a shaggy , gray figure he took to be at least ten feet tall . PRP had an oval face and a crest or dorsal ridge along DT top of its head . DT face was flat , brown and hairless . DT man turned back to his flowers and considered his situation . He was responsible to some Portland businessmen who MD be down to DT Dalles DT next day . If he were to report DT sighting , EX MD be deputies and curiosity - seekers tromping all over his carefully watered flowers about DT NN his bosses arrived . Mederios later told Sheriff ’s deputy Rich Carlson IN he did n’t report DT incident for fear he ’d “ be called a nut . ” DT next day , around noon , DT three businessmen met Mederios and were in DT midst of discussions in a trailer office fronting DT meadow when Mederios again saw an erect ape - JJ figure through a window . DT four men ran outside and watched from across DT road as PRP moved through a break in DT ridge and came into DT lower meadow where PRP walked among DT sparse scrub oak near DT rocks . DT four men and DT other creature stared at CD another for perhaps a minute , before PRP turned , went up through DT break in DT rocks and disappeared into DT upper meadow . This NN DT sighting was reported and deputy Carlson went out to investigate . From Carlson ’s report filed on June 2nd , ’ 71 : “ Mr. Mederios … described PRP as being about ten feet tall , greyish in color , real wide shoulders and arms WDT hung way down . He went on to say PRP looked IN an overgrown ape . He stated PRP was not a bear . DT creature was walking upright at DT NN of DT sighting . ” DT Portland men , solid citizens all , confirmed DT sighting and description . DT same night , about 9:30 , when DT last summer light was fading in DT meadow , a man named Rich Brown , a high - school music teacher , and his wife were returning from a choir practice he had been conducting . At DT entrance to DT trailer court , Brown ’s wife either shouted or screamed and pointed to a figure in DT lower meadow . Brown swung his car around and put DT headlights stark into DT meadow . He opened his car door and steadied DT rifle . He considered a shot at DT heart , then DT head . With DT scope cross -hairs squarely between DT thing ’s expressionless flat black eyes , he released DT safety . IN any good marksman , Brown squeezes DT trigger slowly . In DT moment between DT final squeeze and DT shot , Rich Brown , who had just come from a church , made a complicated moral decision . “ I MD n’t shoot PRP , ” he VBD later , “ because PRP looked more human than animal . ” Aside from Indian legends , which are virtually timeless , DT Bigfoot saga on DT North American Continent begins in 1811 when DT explorer David Thompson noted in his daily journal DT track of “ a large animal … DT whole is about 14 inches by eight inches wide , ” in DT Canadian Rockies by DT site of what is now Jasper , Alberta . Several months later Thompson found similar tracks which he followed for nearly 100 yards . “ Reports from DT old times , ” he noted offhandedly , “ had made DT head branches of this river and DT mountains in DT vicinity DT abode of apes or more very large animals . ” In July of 1884 , a Victoria , British Columbia , newspaper , DT Daily Colonist , published an account of DT capture of a gorilla - type animal DT miners called Jacko . About 4 ’ 7 ″ tall and weighing about 125 pounds , DT animal MD have been a young Bigfoot . No other mention can be found of Jacko in DT Daily Colonist . DT Seattle Times reported a series of bizarre great ape sightings around Mt. St. Lawrence near Kelso , Washington , in July of 1918 . In 1924 , a group of miners camped near Mt. St. Helen in Washington claimed a horde of giant ape - JJ creatures attacked them in DT middle of DT night . CD was shot and rolled into a deep canyon which is known today as Ape Canyon . RB in 1924 , a prospector named Albert Ostman claimed IN while camping near Vancouver he was picked up in his sleeping bag and carried 25 miles by a giant hairy ape . Footprints were left and local residents reported , PRP were 16 inches long and eight inches wide . DT stride length was about four feet . Mrs. Chapman VBD DT creature was about eight feet tall . Interviewed in DT Humboldt Times , Ray Wallace , a partner in DT logging firm , denied IN he had perpetrated a hoax . “ Who knows anyone foolish enough to ruin their own business , ” he VBD . After studying DT soil and DT depth of DT print , Tripp estimated DT probable creature ’s weight at 800 pounds . None of his casts showed impact ridges which MD have indicated IN PRP were made by some kind of mechanical stomping machine . Another series of prints , 1,089 in all , were discovered near Bossberg , Washington , in October of 1969 . DT tracks measured 17 ½ ” x 7 ″ . DT right foot seemed to be twisted inwards and calluses on DT outside of DT foot and DT extrapolated bone structure indicated DT creature who made DT prints had a clubfoot . Dr. Grover Krantz , a physical anthropologist at Washington NNP University , studied casts of DT Bossberg prints and concluded IN if DT tracks were hoaxed , DT fakers were “ absolute experts in human anatomy . ” Since DT ’ 58 Bluff Creek sightings , hundreds more have been recorded , some less credible than others . While Albert Ostman only claimed to have been kidnapped by Bigfeet , CD Helen Westring confessed , right on DT front page of DT National Bulletin ( July , 1969 ) , I WAS RAPED BY AN ABOMINABLE SNOWMAN . Seems IN while Helen was out hunting CD day in DT Minnesota woods she was attacked by a giant horny ape who stripped her of her flimsy clothes in a thrice and had his hairy way with her right RB on DT mute forest loam . EX are JJ men hunting Bigfoot on a more or less regular basis , and CD of DT most impressive is a 46 - NN - old , Dublin - born former big - game hunter named Peter Byrne . Financed by Ohio businessman Tom Page and several others who wish to remain anonymous , Byrne has CD paid assistant , two young volunteers , two International Scout jeeps , a pickup truck , a helicopter on 24 - hour notice , and a plethora of equipment including infrared night - scopes and sophisticated tranquilizer guns . Byrne , who does not take a salary from expedition funds but lives off his own income , has a Hemingwayesque history . In NNP War II he flew for DT RAF , and subsequently ended up as assistant manager of a tea plantation in Nepal . He once effected DT rescue of an Everest expedition stranded by an avalanche at DT 20,000 - foot level . For 15 NNS he led big - game hunts in Africa . In 1968 , with DT game thinning out ( more from poachers than hunters ) , Byrne wearied of leading bumbling clients through DT brush and pointing them at DT animals he had come to respect . He organized DT nonprofit International Wildlife Conservation Society . As executive director , Byrne spent two NNS creating two large tiger sanctuaries in Nepal . DT project was completed in November of 1970 . While in Nepal , Byrne had become fascinated with DT legend of DT Yeti ( DT perhaps mythical Abominable Snowman , cousin to DT perhaps mythical Bigfoot ) . He disputed DT findings of Sir Edmund Hillary ’s 1960 Yeti hunting expedition , insisting IN a month search did n’t constitute a real effort to find DT beast . DT Yeti scalp Hillary took from a Tibetan monastery had been analyzed as a goat - and antelope - hair fabrication , proving , to Hillary ’s satisfaction , IN none of DT sacred Yeti relics in any of DT monasteries were authentic . Byrne felt IN DT scalp Hillary found was a copy of an original he never saw . Byrne himself had visited half a dozen of DT monasteries and in CD secretly cut DT thumb from a mummified hand . He wired a mummified human thumb to DT palm and sent DT relic to NNS in Paris , then London , then DT NNP NNPS . In all NNS DT NNS came up with DT inconclusive conclusion IN DT thumb was not human , IN PRP was animal , and IN further , PRP was unclassifiable . In DT Himalayas , only two Europeans have claimed Yeti sightings . Byrne , fascinated with DT hypothetical creatures to a point just short of obsession , knew IN EX were hundreds of sightings in DT Pacific Northwest . In 1971 he organized DT present three - NN search . He has , to date , logged hundreds of thousands of miles on DT jeeps , interviewed hundreds of claimants , talked at length to DT Indians about their legends and knowledge of DT apes , and camped in DT woods in various sighting areas nearly a NN ’s worth of elapsed NN . Byrne regards as his strongest piece of evidence an 18 - second piece of film taken by CD Roger Patterson near Bluff Creek in DT early afternoon hours of October 7th , 1967 . DT camera steadies , pans right , and focuses in on an erect , apelike figure which appears to be about 30 feet away . Napier concludes his discussion of DT film by saying IN he wo n’t proclaim PRP a hoax almost solely because , “ I can not see DT zipper . ” Byrne respectfully disagrees . “ Napier is using human formulas to deal with an unknown quantity , ” he says . Byrne published DT results of a NN ’s investigation in DT prestigious Explorers Journal . His case for DT existence of DT Giant Apes ( which he calls Omah , after DT local Indians ) , briefly and inadequately summarized , is as follows : 1 ) . EX are hundreds of thousands of virtually unexplored and roadless wilderness areas in DT Pacific Northwest . DT habitat of DT Omah might be in DT steep , thickly wooded gorges of this region . 2 ) . EX have been few sightings , because IN most primates , DT Omah is wary of man . ( First reports of African gorillas in DT early 17th century were treated as folklore . A team of NNS have agreed to fly in at any NN at his expense . PRP MD land in Portland and helicopter to DT site . RB PRP MD take photos , measurements , urine , stool and blood samples . DT Omah MD then be set free . I asked if a tranquilizer capable of bringing down a beast WDT MD conceivably weigh up to 1,000 pounds MD n’t kill a man hoaxed up in a gorilla suit . “ No , ” Byrne says , and adds wryly : “ Unfortunately , DT safety margin is quite high . PRP hate DT . ” “ What am I VBG to do if EX is n’t any crap around ? ” “ Listen , ” Robertson VBD , “ if PRP ’re out in DT woods alone and PRP see him , EX ’ll be plenty of crap around . ” Flora Thompson is 74 NNS old , a Wy - am Indian who lives at Celilo Falls , DT prime salmon netting spot on DT Columbia River , which her tribe calls “ Wauna . ” Flora studied and learned DT legends of DT Wy - am from her late husband , DT great chief Tommy Thompson , who died at 108 in 1951 . She can tell about DT NN before men when all DT animals were NNS and were giants . Coyote was DT Changer . He dug a trench from DT great eastern lake to DT ocean so DT salmon MD swim upstream . In this way Coyote made DT NN fit for man . In DT Changing NNP , just after EX were men , EX was another beast . As Flora Thompson describes PRP , PRP is very much IN DT Omah in DT Patterson film . PRP was a female and its name was Tlat - ta - chee -ah . “ PRP use Tlat - ta - chee -ah as a scarecrow , ” Flora says . “ PRP tell DT bad NNS IN she will come to eat them if PRP do n’t behave . ” DT Wy - am are not DT only tribe WDT have legends about giant , ape - JJ creatures . JJ tribes call him Sasquatch . In British Columbia , DT Salish call him Stwanitie . DT Quamault of DT Olympic Peninsula call him Seeakwa . In Alberta he is called Tsonqua and Ghaga , and in Northern California , DT Hoopa call him Kadonkwa . In DT Central Pacific Northwest JJ tribes call him Omah . Peter Byrne in his investigation has talked to JJ of DT tribes in DT general sighting areas . Item : At twilight in a small mountain town in Northern California , a clerk in DT general store thought she saw a large , hair - covered animal she took to be Bigfoot . On DT first day of April to be exact . Excerpt from a conversation with DT Dalles deputy Rich Carlson : “ EX are always fellows who VBP out to shoot PRP . text: American " Doughboys " claw their way over DT top of their trenches and charge into " No Man 's Land . " A young Air Service lieutenant with DT name of Rickenbacker twists and turns his Spad pursuit airplane in mortal aerial combat with DT " Hun " at 10,000 feet . U.S. Navy warships plow through high seas to protect a convoy of transports traveling slowly across DT stormy Atlantic from DT deadly German U - boats . These scenes of NNP War I action , and thousands more IN them , exist today on silent black - and - white motion picture film . Contrary to some widely held beliefs , large , heavy , wooden boxes with crude brass - encased glass lenses , metal hand cranks , and ungainly tripods were , indeed , filming DT events of DT Great War . In fact , millions of feet of 35 mm film were exposed by all DT major combatants . Unfortunately , only a relatively small percentage of DT original footage can be found in DT NN today . Film decay and arbitrary disposal are factors linked to its rarity . For America , these films were shot on location , as history happened , by dedicated and courageous U.S. Army Signal Corps soldier - cameramen . DT films WDT found their way back with DT U.S. Army , along with a few from Britain , France , Italy , Canada , and Germany , are considered official records of DT U.S. NNP and are preserved at DT National Archives and Records Administration ( NARA ) as part of what is CD of DT NN 's largest film collections , with holdings of more than 360,000 reels of film . Most , but not all , of DT NNP War I titles are cataloged as part of DT Records of DT Office of DT Chief Signal Officer , Record Group ( RG ) 111 , located at DT National Archives at College Park , Maryland . Ever wonder how these historic films found their way to DT NARA ? This is a short story about DT origins and disposition of these classic war pictures and DT available finding aids for those interested in DT era . Three months after DT NNP NNPS declared war in April 1917 , DT U.S. Army Signal Corps was designated as DT agency responsible for obtaining photographic coverage of America 's participation in DT war . DT stated purpose of still and motion - picture film documentation was for use in propaganda and in scientific and military reconnaissance , but PRP was principally for DT production of a pictorial history of DT conflict . During July 1917 , DT Photographic Section was established within DT Signal Corps to provide and control all photographic activities within DT Army . In an effort to VB DT unit up and running as swiftly as possible , a photographic officer accompanied Gen. John J. " Black Jack " Pershing to Europe in order to VB DT methods and equipment of DT photographic departments of DT Allied armies . By DT end of DT month , a laboratory was secured in Paris , France , for developing and printing both motion and still pictures . This laboratory served until February 1918 , when photographic operations were transferred to a larger location in Vincennes . Starting with 25 men , DT Photographic Section attached to DT American Expeditionary Force ( AEF ) grew in strength to 92 officers and 498 enlisted men by DT NN of DT Armistice in November 1918 . An operational photographic unit consisted of CD motion - picture cameraman and CD still - picture photographer , with an appropriate number of assistants . CD photographic unit was assigned to each of DT American Army divisions as well as to other units attached to higher Army headquarters , special services , and JJ welfare organizations IN DT Red Cross and DT Salvation Army . Overall , AEF Signal Corps cameramen shot roughly 590,000 feet of film , while motion picture units located in DT NNP NNPS filmed about 280,000 feet of domestic scenes . A fairly complicated system was developed by DT Photographic Section in order to ensure accurate identification of DT film shot . Each cameraman was assigned a group of consecutive scene numbers . These numbers were perforated in DT leader film of each scene as PRP was developed at DT laboratory in Paris . At DT same NN , an index file was set up containing DT scene identification number and description furnished by DT cameraman . Laboratory personnel arranged DT scenes supplied by DT cameramen into 1,099 subjects ( collectively called DT AEF series ) in chronological order , fully edited and captioned , and shipped them to DT War Plans Division at DT Army War College in Carlisle , Pennsylvania . At DT War College DT captions were verified , and a detailed subject index was prepared . A similar procedure was used with DT footage taken in DT NNP NNPS , except IN these films were placed into DT " Miscellaneous " and " Domestic " series . During 1936 and 1937 DT AEF , Miscellaneous , and Domestic series films were culled and re-edited by DT Army to combine them into a single subject basis series . DT result was DT " Historical " series of films with catalog numbers between H - 1100 and H -1558 . At DT same NN , a JJ series of " Miscellaneous " films was established WDT contained DT photographic histories of DT numerous AEF divisions , special films IN " Flashes of Action , " and other subjects WDT did not properly fit into DT Historical series . Soon after DT National Archives was established in 1934 , federal agencies were directed to deposit their archival records RB . DT Army complied . As a result , DT newly re-edited Historical and Miscellaneous films were transferred to DT motion picture holdings of DT National Archives . Today , these celluloid - based moving images are divided into almost 500 titles , contained on about 1,000 large film reels , and consist of tens of thousands of individual scenes . To facilitate DT use of these films by NNP War I historians , researchers , documentary producers , and DT general NN , a landmark finding aid was compiled by a young National Archives archivist named K. Jack Bauer . His work was titled Special List Number 14 : List of NNP War I Signal Corps Films ( Record Group [ RG ] 111 ) . DT National Archives and Records Service , as PRP was known then , published PRP in 1957 . This 68 - page , 8 - by - 10 inch format , green - covered booklet became DT principal guide for RG 111 , and PRP has remained so for more than 50 NNS . PRP is still recommended by NARA staff for those interested in this NN period and is RB cited in DT 2,428 - page , three - volume , comprehensive Guide to Federal Records in DT National Archives of DT NNP NNPS ( 1995 ) . Since DT List has been out of print for well over 45 NNS , copies of this publication are very difficult to find . I became familiar with DT List while doing research for my book War Wings : Films of DT First Air War and found PRP to be an outstanding starting point for my in - depth research . Detecting a sense of renewed interest in DT NNP War I NN period by historians , DT general NN , and Hollywood , PRP seemed appropriate to find a way to republish this superb research tool . However , as I began to work on DT project , I found myself adding more and more information to DT film descriptions based on DT original 1920s scripts and catalog cards prepared in connection with DT Army re-edit of DT films during 1936 and 1937 . Further onsite research at DT National Archives ultimately more than doubled DT numbers of pages of information and added 58 titles to DT project . Published in 2007 , Battlefilm : U.S. Army Signal Corps Motion Pictures of DT Great War was DT result . Reel 3 : 26th Infantry troops occupy Boppard ; Generals McGlachlin , Marshall , and Col. Theodore Roosevelt , Jr. , pose for DT camera ; NNS watch 18th Infantry troops march to billets in a Coblenz school ; DT 5th and 6th Field Artillery enter Coblenz ; 1st Engineers advance near Wirges ; DT 2nd Field Signal Battalion men eat from rolling kitchens on a road to Neuhausel . • BASE SECTION NO . 1 ( ST . NAZAIRE ) , EMBARKATION OF TROOPS FOR DT U.S. , APR AND NNP , 1919 Reel 1 : 88th Division troops board DT Orizaba , Artemis , Dakotan , Texan , Aeolus , Mercury , Pocahontas , and Rijndam ; 15th Cavalry troops , DT Panama ; and 317th Machine Gun Battalion , DT Roanoke ; DT liner Matsonia , with 81st Division troops aboard , passes through DT locks ; 649th Aero Squadron members board DT Santa Paula ; and General Johnston and 91st Division troops , DT Calamares ; DT hospital ship Mercy passes through DT locks . Reel 2 : DT Santa Paula departs ; casual troops board DT Virginia ; General Wright poses on DT DeKalb ; meat is hoisted from DT ship 's hold ; DeKalb enters DT locks and steams to NN ; 113th and 138th Infantry troops board DT Aeolus ; 111th Infantry , DT Mercury ; 112th Infantry , DT Pocahontas ; 103rd Engineers , DT Finland ; 109th Infantry , DT freighter Maui ; General Price and 28th Division troops , DT Mongolia ; 110th Infantry , and DT Santa Oliver . Reel 3 : DT Iowan and DT Paysandu enter DT locks ; families of troops board DT Manchuria ; 105th Engineers and casual troops , DT Zeelandia ; 110th Infantry troops , DT Luckenbach . • AMERICA'S ANSWER RB VB as " America 's Answer to DT Hun " or " America 's Answer : Following DT Fleet to France . " This was CD of DT three major propaganda films produced by DT Committee on NNP Information during DT war . Reel 1 : NNP Wilson and General Pershing ; a destroyer - escorted convoy ; Engineers dredge a marsh and construct wharves at Brest , France ; troops disembark . With DT centennial of America 's involvement in NNP War I less than a decade away , PRP is important for all of PRP who share more than a casual interest in history to discover and explore all available historical resources . PRP is RB incumbent upon PRP , as PRP begin DT process of retelling , rewriting , and revisualizing DT First NNP War to generations of NNS with little knowledge of PRP , IN PRP include DT moving image element . DT films located in DT Records of DT Office of DT Chief Signal Officer document a fascinating visual story of DT 20th century 's first NNP War — on land , in DT ocean , and in DT air . text: If PRP have diabetes , here ’s a way to keep standing on your own two feet : check them every day — even if PRP feel fine — and see your doctor if PRP have a cut or blister WDT wo n’t heal . EX ’s a lot to manage if PRP have diabetes : checking your blood sugar , making healthy food , finding NN to be active , taking medicines , VBG to doctor ’s appointments . With all DT , your feet might be DT last thing on your mind . But daily care is CD of DT best ways to prevent foot complications . About half of all NNS with diabetes have some kind of diabetic neuropathyexternal icon ( nerve damage ) . PRP can have nerve damage in any part of your body , but nerves in your feet and legs are most often affected . Nerve damage can cause PRP to lose feeling in your feet . Some NNS with nerve damage have numbness , tingling , or pain , but others have no symptoms . Nerve damage can RB lower your ability to feel pain , heat , or cold . Living without pain sounds pretty good , but PRP comes at a high cost . Pain is DT body ’s way of telling PRP something ’s wrong so PRP can take care of yourself . If PRP do n’t feel pain in your feet , PRP MD not notice a cut , blister , sore , or other problem . Small problems can become serious if PRP are n’t treated early . MD PRP Have Nerve Damage ? Anyone with diabetes can develop nerve damage , but these factors increase your risk : • Blood sugar levels WDT are hard to manage • Having diabetes for a long NN , especially if your blood sugar is often higher than your target levels Nerve damage , along with poor blood flow — another diabetes complication — puts PRP at risk for developing a foot ulcer ( a sore or wound ) WDT MD VB infected and not heal well . If an infection does n’t VB better with treatment , your toe , foot , or part of your leg MD need to be amputated ( removed by surgery ) to prevent DT infection from spreading and to save your life . When PRP check your feet every day , PRP can catch problems early and VB them treated right away . Early treatment greatly reduces your risk of amputation . Check your feet every day for cuts , redness , swelling , sores , blisters , corns , calluses , or any other NN to DT skin or nails . Use a mirror if PRP ca n’t see DT bottom of your feet , or ask a family member to help . Wash your feet every day in warm ( not hot ) NN . Do n’t soak your feet . Dry your feet completely and apply lotion to DT top and bottom — but not between your toes , which MD lead to infection . Never VB barefoot . Always wear shoes and socks or slippers , even inside , to avoid injury . Check IN EX are n’t any pebbles or other objects inside your shoes and IN DT lining is smooth . Wear shoes WDT fit well . For DT best fit , try on JJ shoes at DT end of DT day when your feet tend to be largest . Break in your JJ shoes slowly — wear them for an hour or two a day at first until PRP ’re completely comfortable . Always wear socks with your shoes . Trim your toenails straight across and gently smooth any sharp edges with a nail file . Have your foot doctor ( podiatrist ) trim your toenails if PRP ca n’t see or reach your feet . Do n’t remove corns or calluses yourself , and especially do n’t use over - DT - counter products to remove them — PRP MD burn your skin . VB your feet checked at every NN care visit . RB , visit your foot doctor every NN ( more often if PRP have nerve damage ) for a complete exam , which will include checking for feeling and blood flow in your feet . Keep DT blood flowing . Put your feet up when PRP ’re sitting , and wiggle your toes for a few minutes several times throughout DT day . Choose feet - friendly activities IN walking , riding a bike , or swimming . Check with your doctor about which activities are best for PRP and any PRP should avoid . Be sure to ask your doctor what else PRP can do to keep your feet healthy . When to See Your Doctor If PRP experience any of these symptoms , do n’t wait for your next appointment . See your regular doctor or foot doctor right away : • Pain in your legs or cramping in your buttocks , thighs , or calves during physical activity . • Tingling , burning , or pain in your feet . • Loss of sense of touch or ability to feel heat or cold very well . • A NN in DT shape of your feet over NN . • Loss of hair on your toes , feet , and lower legs . • A NN in DT color and temperature of your feet . • Fungus infections such as athlete ’s foot between your toes . Most NNS with diabetes can prevent serious foot complications . Regular care at home and VBG to all doctor ’s appointments are your best bet for preventing foot problems ( and stopping small problems from becoming serious ones ) .

text: Calluses and corns are thickenings of DT outer layer of skin . PRP develop to protect skin from damage against prolonged rubbing , pressure , and other forms of irritation . Calluses and corns usually form on DT hands or feet . Callus . A callus is a thickening of skin exposed to prolonged rubbing . DT thickening is evenly distributed . On DT hands , a callus MD form on a finger due to repeated pressure or rubbing from a pen or pencil , or from playing a stringed instrument . Calluses can RB form at DT base of DT fingers from using gardening tools , playing tennis , chopping wood , or any activity in which PRP tightly grasp an object . On DT feet , calluses typically develop near DT base of DT toes , where PRP are caused by friction from DT inside of shoes . Some calluses are related to walking problems or foot abnormalities WDT place unusual stress on parts of DT foot during walking . Corns . A corn is a protective thickening of DT skin on DT top of DT foot , usually on a bony , knobby portion of a toe . Corns often develop because of irritation caused by tight shoes . At DT center of a corn is often a dense knot of skin called a core , which is located over DT area of greatest friction or pressure . text: WASHINGTON - For DT first NN in more than a decade , Native Americans have DT opportunity to question presidential candidates on issues of importance to Indian Country . “ This is our chance to tell candidates IN PRP can earn our votes , ” VBD organizer O.J. Semans , co-executive director of DT national Native American voting rights organization Four Directions . Nine presidential hopefuls , Sens. Bernie Sanders , Elizabeth Warren and Amy Klobuchar , former U.S. secretary of housing and urban development Julian Castro , former Maryland Rep. John Delaney , NNP York City Mayor Bill de Blasio , Montana Gov. , Democrat Steve Bullock , Navajo pastor Mark Charles and author Marianne Williamson say PRP will participate in DT Frank LaMere Native American Presidential Forum . DT two - day event opens Monday in Sioux City , Iowa . Organizers say invitations were extended to candidates from all major political parties , although so far only these nine candidates hoping to unseat NNP Donald NNP in DT 2020 election have confirmed their attendance . DT organizers RB say talks are continuing with several other campaigns . Mark Trahant , a member of DT Shoshone - Bannock Tribe and editor of Indian Country Today , will moderate a series of panels , giving tribal leaders and Native American youth a chance to air concerns and ask candidates questions on matters of particular importance to Native voters . Semans expressed delight IN JJ major NN organizations will be covering DT event . " For two days , all of DT NNP NNPS is VBG to VB PRP ’re here , ” Semans VBD . “ PRP did n’t VB wiped out , PRP are not extinct , and PRP have a political voice in which issues WDT until now have been set on DT back burner are now VBG to be able to be discussed . " Of DT hundreds of issues of importance to Native American voters , panelists will focus on two in particular , VBD Semans : DT Remove DT Stain Act , which Washington Rep. Denny Heck introduced in DT House in June as H.R. 3467 . If enacted , DT bill MD rescind DT 20 Medals of Honor awarded to members of DT 7th Cavalry who on December 29 , 1890 , murdered nearly 150 Lakota in DT Wounded Knee Massacre . DT Medal of Honor is America ’s highest military honor , given out to members of DT armed services who demonstrate outstanding bravery and valor . “ Our second priority issue for DT forum is missing and murdered indigenous women and NNS , ” VBD Semans . “ Women and NNS are sacred to our societies , and in order for PRP to maintain our societies and cultures , PRP must do what PRP were taught , which is to protect women and NNS , who PRP are losing in outrageous numbers . ” According to DT U.S. Justice Department , Native women are 10 times as likely to be murdered as DT national average , falling victim to domestic or drug - related violence , sexual assault or sex trafficking . DT National Indigenous Women ’s Resource Center has called on lawmakers to expand tribal jurisdiction over NNS of missing and murdered women and NNS ; allocate more resources for victim services ; improve data collection and expand tribal access to federal criminal databases , among other measures . “ Actually , underfunding is DT fundamental to all these issues , ” VBD Semans . “ PRP MD n’t have to be discussing funding for our transportation or infrastructure , PRP MD n’t have to have discussions on housing and NN care and law enforcement if DT federal NN fully honored DT treaties . ” In a related development , Sen. Elizabeth Warren announced Friday she will work with NNP Mexico Rep. Deb Haaland ( Pueblo of Laguna ) on legislative proposals addressing chronic federal underfunding of tribes , as well as barriers to tribal sovereignty . DT last NN Native Americans had a chance to speak directly to presidential candidates was in August 2007 at DT “ Prez on DT Rez ” forum on DT Morongo Reservation in California . Only three candidates , all Democrats for DT 2008 race , participated . Then - NNP Mexico Governor Bill Richardson , former Ohio Rep. Dennis Kucinich and former Alaska Sen. Mike Gravel took part . This week ’s forum is named for civil rights leader Frank LaMere , a citizen of DT Winnebago tribe in Nebraska . He died in June . Co-sponsors include DT Native Organizers Alliance , DT National Congress of American Indians and DT Native American Rights Fund .

text: Shirt Ordered For 3 - NN - Old From NNP Came With “ Fuck DT Pol*ce ” Caption Kelsey Dawn Williamson , a 23 NN old mom from Benton , Illinois , bought her daughter a t shirt from AliExpress.com , but ended up getting something a little bit different than she expected . Kelsey was expecting a child sized t shirt featuring characters from DT NNS ’s book “ Frog And Toad . ” DT shirt was just $ 5 in DT “ LadyBaby Store ” on AliExpress.com , so Kelsey decided to order PRP for her daughter Salem . EX was no text on DT image of DT shirt WDT was shown in DT LadyBaby store , and PRP was described as a “ Kids Two Frog Riding Design Baby Boys / Girl T Shirt Kids Funny Short Sleeve Tops NNPS Cute T Shirt . ” However , when Kelsey received DT shirt in DT mail , DT From and Toad image was on DT front , but PRP RB had large text WDT read , “ FUCK DT POLICE . ” Kelsey told Buzz Feed NN IN she was shocked , but not offended by DT shirt . She actually thought IN DT whole situation was kind of funny . “ I literally did not VB how to react so I just took a few moments to stare at PRP and try to process … Of all DT things PRP MD have added , why DT ? On a NNS ’s size shirt ? ” Kelsey VBD . Kelsey then decided to share DT amusing situation with her friends on social NN , so she put DT shirt on her daughter Salem and took a few pictures . Of course , DT child is way too young to read , so she had no clue what PRP VBD . Kelsey posted a photo to Facebook , showing Salem wearing DT shirt , with DT following caption : “ What I ordered VS what I received . I fucking love NNP . I can not stop screaming . WHO DOES THIS . ” PRP seems IN whoever made DT shirt took a Frog and Toad “ fuck DT police ” meme WDT had been circulating on Reddit for use in their design . However , PRP is not clear if PRP were able to read English or understand what DT message actually VBD . Kelsey VBD IN DT image quickly went viral after she shared PRP with her friends . “ I originally just shared DT t- shirt with only my friends until CD of them wanted to share PRP to their profile , so I made PRP JJ . I definitely was n’t expecting PRP to VB this far . PRP all happened so fast , ” DT young mother explained . Unfortunately , not everyone had a good sense of humor IN Kelsey did . Some NNS who got offended by DT shirt sent Kelsey mean and threatening messages . “ NNS were actually messaging me just to say mean things about her . A ton of NNS calling her fat , asking me what I feed her to make her so big , telling me DT shirt I bought was too small , ” she VBD . Some parents might have been angry or offended by getting an item IN this , but Kelsey sees PRP as a memorable experience WDT Salem will VB a laugh out of someday . “ I ’ve told [ Salem ] ‘ NNS really VBP your frog shirt ! ’ PRP ’s VBG in her baby box so PRP can bring PRP up when she ’s older , ” she VBD . Sadly , DT listing has since been removed from DT store , so DT shirt is no longer available for purchase . This is a very similar situation to when English speaking NNS VBP Chinese words tattooed on them without actually knowing DT true meaning behind DT symbols . Earlier this NN , pop star Ariana Grande made headlines after getting a misspelled Japanese tattoo . She intended DT tattoo to say “ 7 Rings ” which is RB DT name of her newest album . However , when she posted an image of DT tattoo to social NN , JJ NNS recognized IN EX was a misspelling in DT art , and DT tattoo actually VBD “ shichirin , ” which is a small Japanese barbecue grill . Grande later clarified IN DT original photo she posted was an incomplete version of DT tattoo WDT she took while DT work was in progress . Grande says IN DT pain was so intense because of DT location of DT tattoo , and IN DT artwork had to be done in two sessions . Shortly after DT controversy caused by her photo , DT pop star VBD IN she got DT tattoo completed .

text: * Final decision due soon on Big Foot project to north * Chevron shares edge up on bad day for sector ( Adds expected move on Big Foot , analyst , updates shares ) NNP YORK , Oct 21 ( Reuters ) - Chevron Corp ( CVX.N ) is moving forward with a big deepwater project in DT Gulf of Mexico , a sign of commitment to DT region as stricter regulations and higher costs loom following DT BP disaster . After an initial $ 7.5 billion investment , production is set to start in 2014 at DT Jack / St. Malo facility , with a capacity of 170,000 barrels per day ( bpd ) , Chevron VBD on Thursday . DT U.S. NN halted deepwater drilling in DT Gulf after DT BP Plc ( BP.L ) well rupture in April WDT caused DT worst - ever U.S. marine oil spill and killed 11 workers . During DT moratorium , DT NN reviewed industry safety procedures and has formulated some JJ regulations aimed at preventing another deadly blow - out . EX is still much uncertainty surrounding oil and gas exploration in DT Gulf . JJ regulations are not finalized , and analysts see higher costs and slower progress even for companies with budgets big enough to drill in deep NN . But Mohammad Rahman , at research firm Wood Mackenzie in Houston , VBD despite DT delays , operators MD press ahead . “ Everybody is aware of DT regulations and safety requirements VBG forward , but PRP are n’t hindered , ” he VBD . Chevron , DT second - largest U.S. oil company behind Exxon Mobil Corp ( XOM.N ) , VBD PRP MD develop DT Jack and St. Malo projects at a NN depth of 7,000 feet ( 2,100 metres ) , about 280 miles ( 450 km ) off DT Louisiana coast . Initial development of DT projects will require about $ 7.5 billion to construct three subsea centers WDT will tie back to a hub linking DT projects , which lie about 25 miles apart . This will be yet another big investment for Chevron in DT Gulf . DT San Ramon , California - based company is RB due to make a final investment decision on DT Big Foot project before DT end of this NN . DT project MD produce up to 63,000 bpd . Big Foot will be built in 5,300 feet ( 1,600 metres ) of NN , about 200 miles ( 320 km ) from NNP Orleans and 35 miles ( 55 km ) south of Chevron ’s Tahiti field , a 135,000 - bpd development WDT started up in NNP 2009 . In 2009 , Chevron ’s Gulf net daily production averaged 149,000 barrels of crude oil , 484 million cubic feet of natural gas and 14,000 barrels of natural gas liquids . DT Jack and St. Malo fields are estimated to hold 500 million recoverable oil - equivalent barrels . Since 2003 , seven exploration and appraisals wells have been drilled in DT fields , which are in DT Lower Tertiary trend — a geological formation WDT is below areas drillers have typically tapped . “ DT Lower Tertiary is recognized as a huge resource with DT potential for long life projects of up to 30 to 40 NNS and DT opportunity to enhance recoveries through technology , ” Chevron Vice Chairman George Kirkland VBD in a statement . In March , Chevron announced first oil from DT Perdido deepwater development , a similar project RB located in DT Lower Tertiary . Over DT next five to eight NNS , Wood Mackenzie sees DT Lower Tertiary adding 200,000 bpd of production in total , which compares with current deepwater Gulf output of about 1.8 million bpd of oil equivalent , including natural gas . Chevron has working interests of 50 percent in DT Jack field , 51 percent in DT St. Malo field , and 50.67 percent in DT host facility . Chevron ’s shares closed 23 cents higher on DT NNP York Stock Exchange , outperforming a sector WDT was dragged down by a 2 percent drop in oil prices . ( Reporting by Matt Daily and Joshua Schneyer in NNP York , Anna Driver in Houston and Braden Reddall in San Francisco ; Editing by Derek Caney , Maureen Bavdek , Gary Hill )

text: At DT NN of writing , Sepp Blatter is not in jail . Nor is he in an igloo or a space shuttle . No , His Holiness is exactly where he should be , still proudly astride his golden throne in Switzerland , contemplating ways to use another term as DT hallowed father of Fifa to deliver even more joy and peace to DT JJ footballing family . Amen . Uefa has decided not to boycott Friday ’s presidential elections in DT wake of DT FBI collaring a – what ’s DT right collective term here ? - brown envelope of Fifa executives ; and Britain ’s Tory NN , renowned for its intolerance of white collar chicanery , has called for Blatter to be replaced to help deodorise a sport WDT should be known for nothing other than DT excellence of players from teams such as Aston Ham and West Harlequins and , oh , PRP VBP , all those others sides with great batsmen . But EX are still NNS brave enough to stand up for DT doctrine of Blatter Infallbility . “ This is yet another blatant attempt [ by DT NNP NNPS ] to extend its jurisdiction to other NNS , ” stormed Vladimir Putin , who seemingly ranks suggestions of wrongdoing by Fifa alongside other fictional notions such as Big Foot , unicorns and Ukrainian sovereignty . “ PRP ’s a clear attempt not to allow Mr Blatter to be re-elected as NN of Fifa , which is a great violation of DT operating principles of international organisations , ” added Putin , without specifying whether due process should instead involve tanks and surface - to - air missiles . So IN PRP no longer have to wonder what DT head of DT Guinea Bissau Football Association makes of all this , Manuel Nascimento Lopes piped up today to reassert his deep faith in Blatter and denounce DT diabolical campaign against him . “ I ’m a Christian and this is blasphemy , ” Nascimento Lopes blurted to Insideworldfootball.com , seemingly deifying DT Swiss before hastily pointing out IN this god is not omniscient : “ NNS say Blatter must have known about this but do I VB other NNS ’s secrets ? ” • Follow DT Fifa congress opening ceremony live right here . QUOTE OF DT DAY “ DT club wishes to VB IN tomorrow ’s press conference concerns only footballing matters related to Napoli and not DT future of Benítez ” – Napoli club statement , 27 NNP . “ I MD VB to thank DT NN , DT club and all DT fans because after two NNS I ’m finishing my experience here with Napoli ” - Rafa Benitez , 28 NNP . “ Hang on a minute . PRP sounds IN David Lagercrantz [ yesterday ’s Fiver quote of DT day ] is actually DT NN ’s greatest ghostwriter and has nothing to apologise for if he managed to make Zlatan retrospectively concur IN his ‘ Zlatan quotes ’ were actually Zlatan quotes . I managed to do DT same for Mamady Sidibe when ghostwriting his book , but doing PRP for football ’s best and most humble gentleman does n’t feel IN such an achievement . Hats off , Mr Lagercrantz ! PS this is n’t a plug for Mamady Sidibe ’s autobiography . Although if PRP were , I ’d mention IN PRP ’s called DT Luckiest Man in Football and IN PRP ’s really good ” – Stephen Glennon . “ IN : Marten Allen ( Wednesday ’s Fiver letters ) . Chelsea fan here , I am more than fine with football being a stick of celery and I hope DT metaphor never changes ” — Damien Neva . “ IN Adrian Foster ’s letter about Xavi . Whilst I agree with DT sentiment can I just point out IN DT ‘ CD club man ’ is actually signing for another club ? Much IN Gerrard . And whilst Liverpool fans might presently tell PRP IN PRP does n’t count , PRP can bet PRP will if he wins DT USA ! USA ! USA ! League title ” – Stephen Yoxall . • Send your letters to the.boss@theguardian.com . And if PRP ’ve nothing better to do PRP can RB tweet DT Fiver . And do n’t forget , PRP ’s not DT rejection WDT kills PRP , PRP ’s DT hope . Alex Bruce has earned himself a JJ deal though , interestingly . Stevie Me will VB all those ‘ Hollywood ball ’ puns started on 11 July , when he is set to make his debut for LA Galaxy . STILL VB MORE ? Just how bad were our pre-season predictions ? About as bad as yours . SELL ! KEEP ! SELL ! KEEP ! SELL ! KEEP ! Who ’s VBG to be invited to sit next to Louis van Gaal in his big chair at Manchester NNP , and who ’s he VBG to drop into his big bin ? Jamie Jackson looks at DT Old Trafford squad . DT best of Bill O’Herlihy , Villa and Arsenal in DT FA Cup final and ‘ when kicking a wall goes slapstick ’ . PRP ’s our round - up of DT best in YouTube land . Goals of DT week , featuring Wesley Sneijder , James Rodríguez and a ttttttthhhhhhhhhhrrrrrrrriiiiiiiiiiiiiiiker from John Arne Riise . ‘ PRP ’ve done this , this , this and this , PRP ai n’t done badly in your life . ’ And PRP ’s UH : ‘ Yeah , I VBP , but I did n’t win DT FA Cup . ’ ” John Gregory talks to Stuart James . From Texas to Craven Cottage : Emerson Hyndman MD be America ’s next star , reckons Kristan Heneage . “ I left DT freezer open last night . In DT morning everything was ruined . DT ’s how I felt after this defeat . “ Klopp or not ? Test your knowledge of DT outgoing Dortmund manager ’s pearls of wisdom . text: You'd be forgiven for looking at a pigeon and straining to believe IN its ancestors were dinosaurs . This is a creature , after all , WDT descended from some of DT finest killing machines evolution has ever produced to now drink gutter NN and assault old NNS for bread crumbs . But millions of NNS before birds were bumming for handouts in parks , PRP had risen right to DT top of DT food chain . In fact , PRP filled DT vacated niches of their menacing theropod forebears IN Velociraptor . These are DT terror birds : scrappy , powerful critters WDT drove their enormous hooked beaks through small mammals as easily as DT guy who put a pickax through my crazy uncle 's skull in a bar fight WDT CD NN ( he survived , and no , I 'm not even kidding ) . DT 18 known species , DT tallest growing to a staggering 10 feet tall , did n’t bother with flying , instead opting to chase down all those creatures WDT had only just thrown their good - riddance - to - DT - massive - carnivorous - dinosaurs party . DT poor things woke up with a hangover , and DT hangover was DT terror bird . PRP was 60 million NNS ago in South America , which had not yet joined with its northern counterpart , where DT terror birds rose to power in isolation as apex predators . Even given their success , their fossils are fragmentary and extremely rare , according to paleontologist Luis Chiappe , who in 2007 described DT titanic , strangely boxy noggin of DT biggest terror bird ever : Kelenken , named after DT fearsome bird spirit of Patagonia ’s native Tehuelche NNS . “ PRP 's DT largest known skull for terror birds , ” he VBD . “ As a matter of fact , PRP ’s DT largest known bird skull , period . PRP ’s about two - and - a - half feet long , an enormous , colossal beast with a very big hook at DT end of DT beak IN an eagle . ” From fossils IN these , paleontologists reckon IN terror birds were no crumb - loving pigeons , and not just because EX was no bread back then . While a skull can’t tell PRP exactly how PRP killed , for Chiappe , this is clearly DT beak of a carnivore . “ I mean , PRP VBP IN a little parrot , a cockatoo , can take your finger out , ” he VBD . “ Imagine what a bird IN this MD have done , DT damage PRP MD have done with just a strike of this massive skull and beak . So DT 's obviously CD very easy way of imagining this is how these animals killed their prey . ” DT terror birds called forests their home , likely lying in wait to ambush DT JJ small mammals WDT proliferated in South America after DT fall of DT dinosaurs . But their skulls and beaks probably were n’t strong enough to tackle large prey , biomechanical studies have shown . With their massively developed legs , PRP MD have been more than capable of chasing down scampering critters : These were extremely nimble , swift predators , hitting speeds of perhaps 30 mph . ( This should n’t come as a surprise to anyone who has witnessed DT surprisingly frantic , not to mention hilarious , way IN ostriches run , UH giant 40 - mph feather dusters having panic attacks . ) At DT end of terror bird legs were talons , so PRP MD have been IN DT beasts fired an initial jab with their beaks , then stood on their prey and rapidly shivved PRP to death . Or perhaps chomped down on their quarry and shook PRP until its spine snapped . And PRP might RB look for clues in DT terror birds ’ living cousins , DT seriemas , for further speculation . These South American birds are only a couple of feet tall , but are nonetheless adept hunters , snagging lizards and rodents and such with their talons and bashing them on rocks to shatter their bones . PRP ’s even been suggested IN DT terror birds were n’t terrors at all . Instead , PRP were full - blown vegetarians , terroir birds , if PRP will . Last NN , German NNS announced DT results of a geochemical analysis of terror bird bones , finding IN their calcium isotope compositions aligned them more with herbivores than carnivores . But Chiappe dismisses DT notion IN such a powerfully built creature was anything but a predator . DT terror birds , he argues , sported truly massive heads relative to body size , much IN modern eagles and very much unlike modern omnivorous terrestrial birds IN emus and ostriches and cassowaries . “ I VBP IN personally PRP can come up with all these very rather innovative views , but I VBP IN PRP makes a lot of sense IN these animals were predators , ” he VBD . “ PRP ’s just DT same when someone came up with DT idea IN T. rex was a scavenger . I 'm sure PRP ate dead meals , but I 'm sure PRP killed . ” “ Maybe [ DT terror birds ’ ] bite force was not strong enough , ” he added , “ maybe PRP were limited to preying on certain animals , but DT does n't make them in my opinion a non-predatory bird . ” Whatever their diet , and whatever their methods of feeding , DT empire of DT terror birds entered a slow decline starting around 4.5 million NNS ago , when DT Central American isthmus formed , joining two heretofore self - contained continents . All those creatures WDT had evolved in isolation for millions of NNS now found themselves mingling and schmoozing and shaking hands – with their teeth . Terror birds made their way up into what is now DT southern NNP NNPS , while North America ’s top predators – bears and big cats – colonized South America . “ So PRP had to face JJ competition for DT same resources , ” VBD Chiappe , “ and DT combined with perhaps changes in NN PRP MD not have been able to cope with and DT MD have impacted their hunting strategies , probably drove them to extinction . ” And so PRP is IN EX ’s never been a bird , no matter how terrifying , IN a cat MD n’t somehow keep in check . In a way PRP was a lot IN DT eternal struggles of Sylvester and Tweety , only with , PRP VBP , more murder and fewer speech impediments . Browse DT full Absurd Creature of DT Week archive here . text: For NNS , those of PRP who have tried to warn DT American NN IN Big Brother monitors all Internet users were demonized , vilified and ridiculed . Now , DT mainstream NN has proven PRP correct . “ DT U.S. NN — and likely your own NN , for DT matter — is either watching your online activity every minute of DT day through automated methods and non-human eavesdropping techniques , or has DT ability to dip in as and when PRP deems necessary — sometimes with a warrant , sometimes without , ” ZDNet reported earlier this month . “ DT tin-foil hat really is n’t VBG to help . Take PRP off , PRP look silly . ” Where ’s DT proof IN DT NN has this capability ? PRP might recall a fellow by DT name of ( retired ) Gen. David Petraeus . He ’s been in DT NN lately . This four - star general - turned - CIA chief just resigned his post after NN broke IN he had engaged in an extra-marital affair with is biographer , herself a West Point graduate and former Army officer . What led to this shocking discovery was Petraeus ’ use , of all things , Google ’s online email service , Gmail . According to federal law , mind PRP , authorities are not legally permitted to electronically snoop around in your email box . “ DT NN ca n’t just wander through your emails just because PRP ’d VB to VB what PRP ’re thinking or doing , ” Stewart Baker , a former assistant secretary at DT Homeland Security Department who ’s now in private law practice , told DT Associated Press . “ But if DT NN is investigating a crime , PRP has a lot of authority to review NNS ’s emails . ” Or , in DT case of DT CIA , if DT agency wants to track a suspect ostensibly for “ national security ” purposes . Ditto DT NSA . DT wrangling of Petraeus ’ email account has certainly landed him in a NN of trouble , but his story has RB , once again , ignited a JJ DT debate over when , how and why governments and law enforcement agencies alike are able to access DT email accounts of ordinary citizens – even if PRP head up DT most powerful spy agency in DT NN . Granted , experts say “ DT little NNS ” need n’t worry much about having their online presence tracked . Agencies IN DT CIA generally tend to have bigger fish to fry , so to speak . But nevertheless , DT technology to pilfer email accounts at will obviously exists . “ Forget ECHELON , or signals intelligence , or DT interception of communications by black boxes installed covertly in data centers , ” writes Zack Whittaker for ZDNet . “ Intelligence agencies and law enforcement bodies can access – thanks to DT shift towards Web - based email services in DT cloud – but PRP ’s not as exciting or as Jack Bauer - esque as PRP MD VB or hope for . ” How DT top CIA official got busted When he set up his private Gmail account , Petraeus used a pseudonym and composed email messages but never sent them . PRP were instead saved as drafts . His lover , Paula Broadwell , MD then log in under DT same account , read DT drafts then reply to them in DT same manner – as a draft , without actually sending DT message . DT exchanges MD not be sent across DT networks through Google ’s data centers , which MD make PRP nearly impossible for DT NSA or any other ELINT ( electronic intelligence ) agency ( IN Britain ’s GCHQ or DT Israeli Mossad ) to “ read ” DT messages while PRP are in transit between accounts . Other sinister operators – terrorists , pedophiles and DT JJ – have been known to use DT same trick to avoid detection , ZDNet reported . “ But surely IP addresses are logged and noted ? When emails are sent and received , yes . But DT emails were saved in draft and therefore were not sent . However , Google MD still have a record of DT IP addresses of those who logged into DT account , ” DT report VBD . In DT end , DT FBI used a little - VBN law called DT Stored Communications Act , which is part of DT Electronic Communications Privacy Act , as DT basis for getting a warrant to view Petraeus ’ private Gmail account . And DT ’s how agents found DT stored messages WDT were never actually sent . “ Once PRP knew Ms. Broadwell was DT sender of DT threatening messages , DT FBI got a warrant WDT gave PRP covert access to DT anonymous email account , ” DT BBC ’s Mark Ward reported .
