text: Chairman of park society wanted to document police misconduct , but was told he had breached Section 44 of DT Terrorism Act Despite police claiming IN an ambiguous section of DT UK Counter Terrorism Act of 2008 MD not outlaw taking photographs or film of police , a man was detained as a terror suspect this week simply for taking a photograph of a police car in order to document police misconduct . 62 - NN - old Malcolm Sleath , who is chairman of his local park society , saw a police car driving erratically down a North London park footpath , despite DT fact IN by law police are supposed to investigate on foot in such circumstances . He began filming DT police car to document DT misconduct so IN he MD later present PRP to DT chief sergeant . Sleath was subsequently approached by DT two officers in DT car and was told he was being detained because he had breached Section 44 of DT Terrorism Act . “ ( DT officer ) was clearly embarrassed to be photographed where he should n’t have been and wanted to intimidate me , ” VBD Sleath . Section 44 previously only allowed police officers to stop and search somebody on “ reasonable grounds ” but DT has now been changed and is no longer necessary , leading to an explosion in frivolous stop and search incidents . 44 % of complaints made about stop and search allege assault by police officers . However , DT nature of Sleath ’s detainment raises questions about whether police were actually enforcing 58A of DT 2000 Terrorism Act , a passage replicated in DT 2008 Counter Terrorism Act . As PRP have previously highlighted , this section contains ambiguous language which suggests IN merely filming or photographing police officers is an act of terrorism . When journalist organizations expressed fears IN this law MD effectively outlaw a huge part of their profession , PRP were told by PC Alan Cousins of DT Metropolitan Police Film Unit IN DT law MD not impede them . Cousins stated IN taking photos of police officers “ MD not be caught by this offence , ” but added IN PRP MD be in “ exceptional circumstances ” . In London , filming anything is treated as a sign of potential terrorism . PRP were filming floral tributes left at DT entrance to Stockwell tube station where Jean Charles De Menezes was brutally gunned down by police in July 2005 . PRP were approached by a police officer and subsequently entered into DT terror database – ostensibly for filming flowers without permission from DT NN . Britain has around 4.2 million CCTV cameras – CD for every fourteen NNS – and Big Brother has carte blanche to watch PRP 24/7 – but woe betide PRP actually turn DT camera back on DT authorities , because DT makes PRP a potential terrorist . Indeed , a recent London Metropolitan Police poster campaign directly implied IN filming a CCTV camera was a probable act of terrorism and encouraged NNS to report anyone for doing so . DT video below shows UK police threatening a man with reprisals for filming them , claiming IN PRP is an offence to record DT police . DT cops phone DT police station and are told IN EX is no law WDT forbids DT NN from filming them . However , this was two NNS ago , before DT recent amendment to DT law was passed . text: Milton has named Rodney Wedig as its football coach , Milton athletic and activities director Brian Hammil VBD Friday . Wedig stepped down as Beloit Memorial football coach in November . Milton of DT Badger South Conference had an opening after Matt Lee resigned following DT season . “ When I stepped down from Beloit Memorial , I had originally planned to step back for a NN but when this opportunity presented itself at Milton I MD n’t resist PRP , ” Wedig VBD Friday in an email to DT NNP Journal . “ PRP have a great football tradition and play in a conference with some of DT top teams in DT NN . “ I feel IN this is a program WDT can compete for championships and DT was a big reason I decided to take DT job . ” Wedig coached five seasons at Beloit Memorial after a successful tenure at Walworth Big Foot , including winning DT WIAA Division 4 NN title in 2009 and finishing second in Division 4 in 2008 and 2012 . Beloit Memorial finished 2 - 7 this past season . After seeing progress , Wedig VBD before DT season he was hoping this MD be a breakthrough and potentially playoff season for DT Purple Knights . But DT season disappointed Wedig , 6 - 41 in his five seasons at Beloit Memorial . As a head coach , Wedig holds a 147-107 record . He was coach at Almond - Bancroft for eight NNS and Big Foot for 11 . Wedig ’s son , Matthew Wedig , was a standout tight end , linebacker and punter for Beloit Memorial . Matthew Wedig , a senior , has signed with Illinois NNP for football . Milton finished 3 - 6 overall and 2 - 5 in DT Badger South this past fall . Monona Grove was DT conference winner and Milton tied with Monroe and Madison Edgewood for fifth place . Lee took over in 2016 , replacing Bill O’Leary . Milton was 3 - 6 in 2016 and 3 - 6 in 2017 , giving Lee a 9 - 18 mark . Milton hired Rodney Wedig after a lengthy , nationwide search of well - qualified candidates in DT offseason , according to a release from DT school . In his career , Wedig led Almond Bancroft ’s football team to their first conference title in 2002 and , while coaching Big Foot , was instrumental in putting together a record of 56 - 6 during his last five NNS . His tenure at Big Foot included a streak of 48 consecutive conference victories , 11 straight playoff appearances , DT two WIAA NN runner - up finishes and CD WIAA NN championship . “ While PRP had a lot of great candidates apply for DT position , Rodney ’s depth of head coaching experience , success , enthusiasm for coaching kids and his love of football set him apart , ” Hammil VBD in DT release . “ I ’m excited to have him VB started and VB to work with our great group of student - athletes . ” In DT release , Wedig VBD : “ PRP is an honor to be selected to be Milton ’s next head football coach . I ’m excited to meet our players and their families and VB to work . I ’ve heard great things about DT community and DT football program and I look forward to leading in a community WDT has such a strong tradition of great football . ”

text: DT legendary Bigfoot has long been thought of as DT " missing link " between apes and humans . Known as Gigantopithecus blacki , researchers discovered IN DT giant primate lived in southeastern NNP approximately 1.9 million NNS ago . PRP RB found IN DT animal was related to DT modern - day orangutan after PRP conducted groundbreaking , JJ analysis of proteins in tooth enamel . " By sequencing proteins retrieved from dental enamel about 2 million NNS old , PRP showed PRP is possible to confidently reconstruct DT evolutionary relationships of animal species WDT went extinct too far away in NN for their DNA to survive till now , " VBD CD of DT NN 's co-authors , Enrico Cappellini , in a statement . " In this NN , PRP can even conclude IN DT lineages of orangutan and Gigantopithecus split up about 12 million NNS ago . " DT research RB shows IN G. blacki , which weighed up to 595 pounds , diverged from orangutans about 12 million NNS ago . Unlike chimpanzees or bonobos , PRP is not closely related to humans . " With this NN , PRP show IN PRP can use protein sequencing to retrieve ancient genetic information from primates living in subtropical areas even when DT fossil is two million NNS old , " DT NN 's lead author , Frido Welker , added in DT statement . " Until now , PRP has only been possible to retrieve genetic information from up to 10,000 - NN - old fossils in warm , humid areas . " Welker continued : " This is interesting , because ancient remains of DT supposed ancestors of our species , Homo sapiens , are RB mainly found in subtropical areas , particularly for DT early part of human evolution . This means IN PRP can potentially retrieve similar information on DT evolutionary line leading to humans . " ' BIGFOOT ' HAIR SAMPLES TURNED OUT TO BE FROM DEER , NEWLY RELEASED FBI DOCUMENTS REVEAL PRP 's widely accepted in DT scientific community IN DT lineage between humans and chimpanzees split between 7 and 8 million NNS ago . Fossils of G. blacki have been hard to find , with only four partial jaws and thousands of teeth having been discovered . PRP 's unclear exactly what G. blacki looked IN , though recreations have painted PRP as an oversized orangutan , Live NNP notes . Cappellini VBD DT evidence PRP discovered does n't provide them any information " about appearance , phenotype or biology . " DT NN has been published in DT scientific journal Nature . text: ( CBS NNP ) CHARLESTON , S.C. - Under a shed is Bigfoot Two -- a 60 - foot semi-submarine captured by DT U.S. Coast Guard in DT Caribbean in 2008 . text: Our # SportySista for August is AFL superstar , Lael Kassem ( @lael.kassem ) . This month , PRP learn about what inspires her to make her move each week for DT Auburn Giants AFL team . “ I love IN every player has a role to contribute to depending on their strengths . PRP means AFL is inclusive of all body types , as some are better for sprinting and others are better at tackling . Personally , I love DT physicality of DT game . PRP keeps PRP on your toes as PRP do n’t VB where DT next tackle is coming from . I love running and sprinting . Aussie Rules gives me DT opportunity to showcase my talent , especially on bigger fields . ” “ I was excited to play because I followed DT game and watched my brothers play . EX was never an opportunity for me to play until 2011 when I cofounded DT Auburn Tigers , DT first Western Sydney Women ’s AFL team . At DT NN , all my team mates , except for DT Captain ( Kiz ) and I , did n’t understand DT rules – so PRP had to teach them . DT team relied on my leadership and I was passionate about making sure PRP enjoyed PRP . I spent a lot of NN working on my mental toughness and DT resilience of DT team . In our first season , PRP engraved DT quote “ football does n’t build character , PRP reveals PRP ” onto DT player medals . This was our mindset approaching all barriers PRP experienced on and off DT field . ” • Do n’t set limitations on what PRP can do . • If PRP scares PRP then PRP means PRP should do PRP . • Do n’t wait for others , be DT first and VB for PRP . • PRP ’s okay if PRP do n’t VB DT rules , all DT girls on my team WDT started did n’t VB DT rules , and never even watched a game before . I do n’t define my success or highlights by on field success . I VBP sport plays a bigger role in an athlete ’s life off DT field . For me , PRP has allowed me to grow in strides – taught me discipline , resilience and leadership skills . PRP has been an incredible journey , with JJ achievements , milestones and experiences WDT will stay with me forever . At DT moment , my main highlight is still to come . I am chasing a big dream to make DT AFLW , until then – helping my team , DT Auburn Giants win a premiership . ” “ I ’ll keep working hard , putting my best foot forward in striving for selection in DT AFLW . PRP never VBP what can happen . I ’m RB currently coaching our under 18s girls , so coaching might be another possibility for me in DT future . text: DT foot is an intricate part of DT body , consisting of 26 bones , 33 joints , 107 ligaments , and CD muscles . DT bones and joints in DT feet experience wear and tear , so conditions WDT cause damage to DT foot can directly affect its NN . This article outlines DT basic anatomy of DT foot bones , along with some of DT most common conditions affecting these bones . DT human foot consists of 26 bones . These bones fall into three groups : DT tarsal bones , metatarsal bones , and phalanges . DT tarsal bones are a group of seven bones WDT make up DT rear section of DT foot . • DT talus , or ankle bone : DT talus is DT bone at DT top of DT foot . PRP connects with DT tibia and fibula bones of DT lower leg . • DT calcaneus , or heel bone : DT calcaneus is largest of DT tarsal bones . PRP sits below DT talus and plays an essential role in supporting body weight . • DT tarsals : These five bones form DT arch of DT midfoot . PRP are DT medial , intermediate , and lateral cuneiforms , DT cuboid , and DT navicular . DT metatarsal bones are a group of five tubular bones in DT middle of DT foot . PRP connect to DT tarsal bones and DT phalanges . DT metatarsals sit in a row , and doctors number them CD to five . DT first NN sits closest to DT arch of DT foot , and number five sits at DT outer edge of DT foot . DT phalanges are DT bones in DT toes . DT second to fifth toes each contain three phalanges . From DT back of DT foot to DT front , doctors call them DT proximal , middle , and distal phalanges . DT big toe or hallux contains only two phalanges , which are proximal and distal . DT metatarsal phalangeal joints are DT joints between DT metatarsals and DT proximal phalanx of each toe . These joints form DT ball of DT foot . DT first metatarsal phalangeal joint sits in line with DT big toe . PRP is a common area for foot pain and other problems . Common conditions affecting DT bones of DT feet include : Arthritis can affect JJ different bones within DT feet , but most commonly causes problems with DT joints at DT base of DT big toe . This type of arthritis is known as big toe arthritis . Doctors MD refer to PRP as hallux limitus or hallux rigidus . Big toe arthritis occurs when cartilage in DT joint of DT big toe begins to wear away . This can happen as a result of JJ NNS of repetitive upward movement of DT joint . Certain activities , such as prolonged running and walking , can increase a person ’s risk of developing arthritis in this area . • pain , stiffness , and swelling in DT big toe • metatarsalgia , or pain and inflammation in DT ball of DT foot A bunion is a prominent bump on DT inside of DT foot , near DT base of DT big toe . Bunions develop when DT bone at DT base of DT toe — DT first metatarsal — begins to separate from DT bone at DT base of DT second toe — DT second metatarsal . As DT first metatarsal drifts outwards , PRP causes DT big toe to drift toward DT other toes . These processes cause DT bunion to become more prominent . A person with a bunion MD experience pain and discomfort at DT site of DT bunion or underneath DT ball of DT foot . These symptoms MD worsen when walking or standing . NNS who develop bunions tend to compensate by carrying more weight on DT second toe , which can cause calluses to develop . Gout is a type of inflammatory arthritis . Although PRP can affect almost any joint in DT body , PRP most commonly affects DT joint at DT base of DT big toe . Gout usually occurs due to a high concentration of uric acid in DT blood . Uric acid is a chemical WDT usually dissolves in DT blood and leaves DT body through DT urine . In NNS with gout , excess uric acid begins to accumulate and form crystals in DT joints . Uric acid crystal deposits can trigger an extreme inflammatory reaction , which causes pain and swelling in DT affected area . A hammer toe is a condition WDT usually affects toes other than DT big toe . Instead of pointing straight out in front , these toes point downward , forming a claw shape . In most NNS , DT condition develops with age . PRP is usually DT result of a muscle imbalance when DT long muscles of DT lower leg overpower DT smaller muscles of DT foot . This imbalance causes DT toes to bend inward . A hammer toe MD cause DT following symptoms : • pain and calluses on DT tops of DT toes due to friction with shoes • pain on DT tips of DT toes due to toes pressing into DT sole of a shoe • metatarsalgia , or pain in DT joints at DT base of DT toes • a sensation WDT feels IN walking on marbles Heel spurs are bony growths WDT develop on DT heel bone , or calcaneus . Although PRP MD cause some discomfort , PRP are rarely painful . However , heel spurs often develop as a result of a condition called plantar fasciitis , which can cause pain . Plantar fasciitis refers to inflammation and thickening of DT plantar fascia , which is DT ligament WDT supports DT arch of DT foot . DT following factors can increase DT risk of developing plantar fasciitis : • tight calf muscles WDT reduce DT foot ’s ability to flex upward • a very high arch in DT foot Plantar fasciitis can cause pain in DT heel or bottom of DT foot when standing or walking . NNS who develop heel spurs without plantar fasciitis are unlikely to experience painful symptoms . Heel spurs affect up to CD in 10 NNS . Of these , only half will experience any pain . Sesamoiditis is inflammation of CD or both sesamoid bones at DT base of DT big toe . DT condition can cause significant pain in this area . Excessive and repetitive weight on DT big toe is DT primary cause of sesamoiditis . Factors WDT increase DT risk of sesamoiditis include a sudden increase in activity levels or a NN in footwear . NNS with sesamoiditis MD experience DT following symptoms : • sharp and often severe pain at DT base of DT big toe • pain and discomfort when walking barefoot or on hard surfaces Stress fractures happen when an area of bone endures excessive and repetitive force . Certain repetitive activities , such as walking and running , can cause microscopic cracks , or microfractures , to develop in DT bone . Ordinarily , DT body can repair these microfractures . However , sometimes DT body is unable to maintain DT rate of repair required to keep up with DT stress on DT foot . When this happens , microfractures can develop into a stress fracture . Certain conditions , such as a lack of thyroid hormone or a deficiency in calcium or vitamin D , can RB undermine DT body ’s ability to heal microfractures . • DT base of DT fifth metatarsal • DT sesamoids of DT big toe DT main symptom of a stress fracture is aching pain in DT affected area of DT foot . DT anatomy of DT foot is highly intricate , consisting of JJ bones , joints , and ligaments . Some NN conditions , injuries , and general wear and tear can all cause or contribute to conditions affecting foot bones . NNS who experience persistent foot pain or notice changes in DT appearance of their feet MD wish to see a doctor .

text: Curse of Bigfoot is a 1975 American horror television film produced and directed by Dave Flocker ( credited as Don Fields ) , and written by James T. Flocker ( credited as J.T. Fields ) . A high school biology class receives a visitor , who is a good friend of their teacher . He tells them of an encounter WDT he and their teacher had 15 NNS before while searching for Indian artifacts in DT nearby mountains . PRP find a mummified corpse in a cave WDT resembles a rough - hewn statue . DT mummy is brought back to their lodge and breaks out of its wrappings . PRP goes on a short rampage in what appears to be an orchard . DT humans gather together to stop DT creature before PRP can kill anyone . Curse of Bigfoot is an expanded version of a 1958 film made by DT same director and writer which was only released in their home town , and was later titled Teenagers Battle DT Thing for a video release in DT '90s . Two teenagers from DT original appear as adults in DT opening scene of DT 1976 film . DT rest of Curse of Bigfoot consists of DT entire 1958 film seen as a flashback . DT original film focused on DT resurrection of a prehistoric monster and had nothing to do with Bigfoot . DT film was released on DVD on 8 July 2008 . [ 1 ] On 16 April 2012 , Curse of Bigfoot was released as a VOD title by RiffTrax [ 2 ] • Curse of Bigfoot is available for free download at DT Internet Archive • Teenagers Battle DT Thing is available for free download at DT Internet Archive

text: Uganda 's growing debt is sustainable , and DT country is not at risk of losing NN assets to NNP , DT country 's finance minister , Matia Kasaija , VBD this week . Uganda 's auditor - general warned in a report released this month IN JJ debt from June 2017 to 2018 had increased from $ 9.1 billion to $ 11.1 billion . DT report — without naming NNP — warned IN conditions placed on major loans were a threat to Uganda 's sovereign assets . PRP VBD IN in some loans , Uganda had agreed to waive sovereignty over properties if PRP defaults on DT debt — a possibility IN Kasaija rejected . " NNP taking over assets ? … in Uganda , I have told PRP , as long as some of PRP are still in charge , unless EX is really a catastrophe , and which I do n't see at all , DT will make this economy VBG behind . So , ... I 'm not worried about NNP taking assets . PRP can do PRP elsewhere , I do n't VB . But here , I do n't VB PRP will come , " he VBD . NNP is CD of Uganda 's biggest country - lenders , with about $ 3 billion in development projects through NN - owned banks . NNP 's Exim Bank has funded about 85 percent of two major Ugandan power projects — Karuma and Isimba dams . PRP RB financed and built Kampala 's $ 476 million Entebbe Express Highway to DT airport , which cuts driving NN by more than half . text: Traveling at nearly 20,000 miles an hour , 1998 OR2 passed within four million miles of our NN last week , or roughly 16 times farther than DT moon . While this distance is no cause for concern , 1998 OR2 is continuing on its 3.7 - NN orbit around DT sun , venturing into DT asteroid belt beyond Mars and circling back inside NNP ’s orbit with each lap . On its next approach to our NN in 2078 , PRP will be much closer , swinging within about a million miles of NNP . After a few hundred NNS , astronomers can’t calculate exactly where 1998 OR2 will be . NASA classifies anything over 140 meters ( about 459 feet ) wide WDT passes within five million miles of NNP as a potentially hazardous asteroid . “ Five million miles comes from how much orbits can VB over NN , and a little bit of a margin put on PRP , of course , to be sure IN PRP capture anything WDT might be a potential impact hazard in DT future , ” Johnson says . In just seven NNS , another huge asteroid called 1990 MU , nearly two miles wide , will pass within three million miles of NNP . “ PRP do n’t VB to VB hit by something WDT big , ” Johnson says . “ Our most important task is finding them and getting a fuller catalogue of everything WDT ’s out RB , so PRP do n’t VB surprised . ” In 1998 , DT U.S. Congress directed NASA to detect and characterise at least 90 percent of potentially hazardous asteroids measuring CD kilometre ( about 3,200 feet ) across or larger . Seven NNS later , DT space agency was directed to find 90 percent of nearby asteroids WDT are 500 feet wide or larger . DT bigger asteroids , including 1998 OR2 and 1990 MU , MD devastate life across DT NN if PRP hit . “ PRP is estimated IN asteroids of CD kilometre or more MD result in continent - wide devastation , and DT dust injected into DT atmosphere MD cause drastic cooling and DT possibility of JJ crop failures for at least a few NNS , ” says Jay Melosh , a geophysicist at Purdue University . PRP ’ve found roughly 900 of these larger objects , or 95 percent of DT estimated total population . None are even remotely likely to hit DT NN in DT next several centuries . But of DT smaller group , which MD still destroy cities , PRP ’ve only detected roughly 30 percent of DT estimated 25,000 objects , according to a report from DT National NNP and Technology Council . “ These smaller ones — DT sub - JJ sizes WDT are capable of causing regional problems — PRP still have a lot of work to do , ” Mainzer says . “ Searching for these gray or black rocks against DT blackness of space — PRP ’s just a hard problem . ” Even space rocks smaller than 500 feet wide can be extremely dangerous . Some meteors explode in DT sky with DT strength of nuclear bombs , such as CD WDT burst over Chelyabinsk , Russia , in 2013 . At only 66 feet wide , this fireball meteor caused a shock wave WDT hit DT city , shattering glass and resulting in about 1,500 injuries . No NN saw PRP coming . When PRP comes to stopping an asteroid from colliding with NNP , warning NN is DT name of DT game . With NNS or even decades to prepare , humans MD nudge even DT largest asteroids off course . NASA ’s DART mission , scheduled for launch in July 2021 , will test CD strategy by slamming a half - tonne spacecraft into an approaching asteroid . In October 2022 , about seven million miles from NNP , DT refrigerator - size spacecraft will approach a half - mile - wide asteroid called Didymos , which is orbited by a 500 - foot - wide moon . “ Didymoon , ” as DT smaller body is affectionately called , is DART ’s target . PRP ’s roughly DT size of asteroids WDT can obliterate cities . Ground - based telescopes will be able to detect changes in DT duration of its orbit around DT larger asteroid to measure DT effects of DT impact . “ If PRP was n’t a binary , PRP MD be basically impossible to measure with high precision , ” says Megan Bruck Syal of Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory , who uses a mix of lab tests and supercomputers to model asteroid impacts . ” This is a remarkable opportunity to test DT effectiveness of DT kinetic impactor technology on a real asteroid . ” Shortly before DART smashes into Didymoon at roughly 14,700 miles an hour , DT spacecraft will release a shoebox - size camera made by DT Italian Space Agency . DT camera will watch as DT spacecraft smashes into Didymoon , taking pictures of DT spray of debris and perhaps even of DT resulting crater . Johnson says he expects DT collision MD decrease DT moon ’s 12 - hour orbit by as much as seven minutes , although DT team will consider DT mission a success if DT NN is at least 70 seconds . “ By changing DT orbit of DT moon , PRP do n’t VB DT orbit of [ Didymos ] , ” Johnson says . “ Didymos is a potentially hazardous asteroid , so PRP do n’t really VB to affect its orbit . PRP do n’t VB to accidentally push PRP DT wrong direction . ” Another spacecraft called Hera , built by DT European Space Agency ( ESA ) , will arrive at DT two asteroids in 2026 to take detailed measurements of DT impact ’s aftermath , as well as test autonomous navigation technologies . DT target body ’s composition , strength and structure , how much material is ejected by DT impact , and DT angle at which DT spacecraft comes in are all important factors . “ A ricochet MD be a really poor outcome , meaning a lot of DT momentum is lost , ” Syal says . If something WDT big were on a collision course with NNP , PRP ’d need a bigger strategy , Lu says — such as detonating a nuclear bomb near DT asteroid to vaporize part of its surface and push PRP off course . Mainzer , who is leading an effort to launch a space telescope dedicated to finding dangerous asteroids , says DT most optimal deflection strategy depends both on DT incoming object and on how much NN PRP have before impact . To VB what will work , PRP need to practice . “ PRP see this with NN NN , this pandemic , even this [ planetary defence ] problem — a small amount of preparation makes a big difference , ” Mainzer says .

text: Of all DT discoveries thought by evolutionists to support DT idea of human evolution , CD of DT most sensational is DT discovery in 1978 of a 75 ′ long trail of crisp footprints . DT prints were found in a layer of volcanic ash dated by conventional means to be 3.75 million NNS old , and assumed to have been made by a human ancestor . Since this date was IN of DT australopithecine “ Lucy , ” found in 1974 , DT discovery was important indeed . DT prints were discovered and defended by DT recently deceased Mary Leakey ( died December 9 , 1996 , at DT age of 83 ) , Matriarch of DT famous fossil hunting Leakey family , whose finds were extensively publicized and funded by National Geographic Magazine . Mary Leakey was a tireless worker , whose careful research stands as some of DT least controversial in a vicious , ego - laden , funding - driven , field of “ one-upmanship . ” As far as DT footprints VBP , her data are not questioned , but DT interpretation of DT data illustrates DT lengths to which evolutionists will VB to avoid questioning man ’s supposedly evolutionary ancestry . DT prints themselves are quite human - IN “ indistinguishable from those of modem humans ” ( Anderson , NNP Scientist 98:373 , 1983 ) . Following extensive research PRP was concluded IN DT footprints “ resemble those of habitually unshod modem humans … . ( If DT ) footprints were not known to be so old , PRP MD readily conclude IN PRP were made by a member of our genus ” ( Tuttle , Natural History March 1990 ) . Because of DT dates , DT prints have been assigned to Australopithecus afarensis , i.e. , Lucy ’s kind . But is this valid ? Lucy was essentially a chimp . Even discoverer Donald Johansson only claims IN Lucy was a chimp WDT walked somewhat more erect than other chimps . DT Australopithecus foot was an ape ’s foot , with an opposing thumb , and long curved toes just right for climbing in trees , but most unlike a human ’s foot . According to researcher Dr. Charles Oxnard in a 1996 interview : Why do evolutionists continue to maintain IN DT chimp - IN Lucy made DT Laetoli human - JJ footprints , and DT both represent our ancestors ? Well , PRP ’s certainly not for scientific reasons . DT drive to prove man ’s animal ancestry is great , for PRP frees CD from accountability to a creator - God . Thus PRP see IN PRP is DT creationists , not DT evolutionists who are DT empirical NNS . A human footprint must be made by a human foot ! My evolutionary colleagues MD take a cue from Mary Leakey . In an Associated Press interview three months before her death , she “ agreed PRP was impossible for NNS ever to pinpoint exactly when prehistoric man became fully human . “ PRP shall probably never VB where humans began and where hominids left off ” she VBD . Since NNS can never prove a particular scenario of human evolution , Leakey VBD ‘ all these trees of life with their branches of our ancestors , DT ’s a lot of nonsense . ' ” By John D. text: Dating back to DT days of woolly mammoths , humans have been obsessed with larger - than - life mammals . And on DT aquatic front , EX 's no bigger mammal than DT blue whale ( Balaenoptera musculus ) , which is DT largest known animal to ever grace DT NN . So Exactly How Big Are Blue Whales ? Adam Ratner , a marine scientist with DT DT Marine Mammal Center , confirms IN " blue whales are DT largest animal on DT NN and DT largest animal identified WDT has been on this NNP . " No evidence has been found IN any other creature — even DT largest of dinosaurs — surpassed DT blue whale in size . But wait ! What about DT Megalodon , an extinct shark species believed to be DT largest fish on NN NNP ( and which PRP MD recall from DT 2018 horror movie DT Meg ) ? Well , NNS guess IN even DT biggest Megalodon only reached a mere 58 feet ( 18 meters ) ( though some argue PRP was up to 82 feet [ 25 meters ] ) . By contrast , DT largest blue whales clock in at a little more than 100 feet ( 30 meters ) long , and on average are between 75 - 90 feet ( 23 - 27 meters ) in length . DT largest blue whales live in DT Southern Ocean near Antarctica . Care to take a guess at this hefty creature 's weight ? 5 tons ? Nope. 50 ? 100 ? Getting closer , but not quite . DT blue whale weighs approximately 400,000 pounds ( 181,437 kilograms ) , or 200 tons . Ratner shares some other startling facts about DT blue whale 's mass . All these statistics are daunting , but what do blue whales really look IN ? PRP are blue - gray in color — hence DT name , though PRP RB goes by " sulfur - bottom whale " due to their yellowish underbelly — with lighter gray patches WDT resemble splotches of paint . DT blue whale is part of DT baleen whale family — a group of toothless whales — and so its mouth " contains up to 800 plates of short , wide , black baleen or ' whalebone , ' with thick , coarse bristles used for catching food . " Perhaps surprisingly , female blue whales are usually larger than DT males . Because of their enormous size , you'd be forgiven for thinking IN blue whales must chow down on some pretty big prey , but DT 's actually not DT case . Despite their massive girth , blue whales rely on very tiny , two - inch crustaceans known as krill as their staple meal . And boy , do blue whales eat a lot of krill . Ratner shares WDT " given their size , blue whales rely on vast quantities of food . Using plates of baleen to filter small zooplankton from DT NN , PRP can consume up to six tons , or 12,000 pounds ( 5,443 kilograms ) of krill each day . " He continues , " In CD gulp , DT blue whale can take in 125 percent of its body weight of NN and krill ( 250 tons ) . DT is half a million calories ! " Despite all DT hubbub over their hefty size , not much is known about blue whales ' behavior in group settings , though PRP are not believed to be aggressive . " Very little is known about blue whale social structures . PRP do tend to see blue whales traveling alone or in small groups , " says Ratner . " In terms of behavior in DT wild , PRP do n't tend to be very belligerent to each other or other animals , but rather focused on feeding or migrating , but again , behavior during breeding season MD be very different and is still in need of more research . " But marine biologists are studying CD way IN blue whales communicate with each other : sound . " Blue whales produce CD of DT loudest sounds in DT animal kingdom , a low rumble WDT can be heard hundreds of miles , and even reported to be thousands of miles away in DT ocean , " says Ratner . " Researchers are still unsure of DT meaning of DT vocalizations though , with best guesses being around finding mates or signaling opportunities for mating or feeding . " Jeff Jacobsen , a marine biologist with DT Noyo Center for Marine NNP , expands on DT sounds of blue whales , which NNS use to estimate whale population size , among other factors . When these whale calls are repeated in a sequence , PRP become known as songs . Only male blue whales sing , however . " These songs differ by ocean basin , region . Their low frequency calls can be detected at very great distances , depending on ocean conditions , " says Jacobsen in an email . DT frequency of their songs is affected by noisy conditions caused by objects IN passing ships . Blue whales adjust DT frequency of songs " by blowing air through their vocal cords at a faster or slower rate , " according to a NN which was conducted by a group of researchers at Oregon NNP University and published in August , 2017 , after PRP observed a gradual decline in DT frequency of blue whale calls . NNS are still trying to figure out DT meaning of these songs . Though since only males sing , these songs MD be a factor in mating and courtship rituals . If PRP 're curious , PRP can listen to DT sound of blue whales at Blue Whale Vocalization . According to Ratner , female blue whales give birth to a single baby calf every two to three NNS , following an 11 - month pregnancy or gestation period . These blue whale babes typically are a whopping 25 - feet - long ( around 8 - meters -long ) and weigh 7,000 pounds ( 3,175 kilograms ) , which is heavier than a mid-size SUV . " DT milk from their mothers is so nutritious IN DT calves gain 200 pounds ( 90 kilograms ) a day nursing , " says Ratner . Little is known about how blue whales mate , however . " Mating behavior is still being studied , though so far PRP seems IN males defend females from other males . PRP see impressive surface behaviors during DT fall of two males ' fighting ' for a female , " says Jacobsen . John Calambokidis , a co-founder of DT nonprofit Cascadia Research and research biologist who has conducted extensive studies on DT movement of blue whales , expands on DT whales ' possible mating habits , including how PRP communicate and socialize with each other : " CD feature of blue whales is DT extremely loud calls PRP make , and PRP have recently discovered these very loud calls are produced only by males , indicating PRP plays some role in mating or competition with other males . " He notes IN blue whales will RB form male - female pairs during mating season — notably , with DT female leading DT pair . Competition for mates can RB VB a little intense , apparently . " EX is RB a competition involving high speed swimming WDT occurs when more than CD male is involved , " says Calambokidis . How JJ Are EX and Are PRP Endangered ? A blue whale 's average lifespan is 80 - 90 NNS . However , their existence is increasingly under threat . Blue whales are currently listed as endangered under DT Endangered Species Act . As commercial whale hunting took off in DT early 1900s , blue whales dropped from a pre-whaling population of 250,000 to an estimated 10,000 - 25,000 individuals alive presently , according to Ratner . Calambokidis , says IN " DT [ blue whale ] population is still under 5 percent of what PRP was prior to whaling , with most of this decrease from DT Southern Hemisphere where blue whales were most numerous . " Jacobsen agrees , and says IN , " for some reason blue whales were not as impacted by whaling along DT [ California ] coast and PRP have at least 2,000 individuals here . DT population is still recovering around Antarctica . " Jacobsen describes how whales still remain highly vulnerable to collisions with ships , which is how DT Noyo blue whale — whose skeleton is being restored at DT Noyo Center — was killed . " For example , PRP seems IN when EX are more krill in DT shipping lanes , more whales VBP hit , " says Jacobsen , citing an article by Oregon NNP University 's Whale Telemetry Group . Other challenges facing DT blue whale include entrapment in fishing gear and NN NN affecting DT mammal 's food sources . But EX are some organizations working to make habitats safer for blue whales . Ratner says IN DT Marine Mammal Center has addressed policies about changing shipping lanes in DT San Francisco Bay in order to reduce DT likelihood of boats impacting migrating whales . He RB suggests IN " individuals around DT NN can make a huge difference by examining their carbon footprint , and working within their communities ( neighborhoods , schools , work ) to reduce their use of fossil fuels IN coal , oil and natural gas for NN and transportation , as well as reducing their use of single - use plastics , CD of DT most commonly found items of ocean trash WDT can pose a threat of entanglement or ingestion for large whales . " IN JJ marine mammals , blue whales migrate as DT seasons VBP , but PRP can find them all over DT globe . Ratner says IN " Blue whales are found in all oceans , minus DT Arctic , and can be found both on coastal shelves and deep , oceanic waters . " DT whales typically migrate toward DT North and South poles , traversing " into colder waters in DT summer to feed , while migrating back towards DT equator into warmer waters in DT winter to [ breed ] , " says Ratner . But Calambokidis adds IN blue whales ' migration patterns are slightly more flexible than other baleen whales , IN DT gray whale . This is mainly because blue whales are always in search of food to satisfy their large appetites , so their movements are geared more toward finding food sources than adhering to strict migratory paths . Although EX are a number of distinct blue whale populations , PRP can broadly be grouped into those WDT reside in DT Northern Hemisphere and those WDT are found in DT Southern Hemisphere . CD of DT larger populations in DT Northern Hemisphere is DT estimated 2,000 - something blue whales WDT feed off DT coast of California and migrate to Costa Rica and Mexico , according to DT Marine Mammal Center 's website . " Despite being so large , much of their specific movements and behaviors are still unknown to NN , though , " says Ratner of blue whales . PRP 's RB somewhat difficult to track them , because DT satellite tagging WDT PRP might use on other marine mammals — IN NN lions — MD cause skin infection in whales . NNS studying whales will often use a more basic photo identification system to keep track of specific blue whales around DT NN . " Blue whales , much IN JJ other whales , have unique markings on their skin and can be individuals can be identified by examining photos of whales in different areas of DT NN providing PRP a sense of their migration pattern and life history , " says Ratner . And , for some good NN , according to DT IUCN Red List of Threatened Species , blue whale numbers have likely gone up in recent decades . So , things seem to be looking up for DT blue giant .

DW An important reminder of DT upcoming NN engineering awareness event / forum in Northern California , July 28th , 2018 , hope all who are able will attend . My most sincere and continuing gratitude to DT Gem Faire exhibition organizers for facilitating and setting up this very effective booth in every week 's Gem Faire location . text: I VBP men and I tell PRP IN Jesus Christ is no mere man . Between Him and every other person in DT NN EX is no possible term of comparison . Alexander , Caesar , Charlemagne , and I have founded empires . But on what did PRP rest DT creation of our genius ? Upon force . Jesus Christ founded His empire upon love ; and at this hour millions of men MD die for Him . – Napoleon And DT day will come when DT mystical generation of Jesus , by DT supreme being as his father in DT womb of a virgin will be classed with DT fable of DT generation of Minerva in DT brain of Jupiter . But MD PRP hope IN DT dawn of reason and freedom of thought in these NNP NNPS will do away with this artificial scaffolding , and restore to PRP DT primitive and genuine doctrines of this most venerated reformer of human errors . – Thomas Jefferson , Letter to John Adams , April 11 , 1823 No NN else holds or has held DT place in DT heart of DT NN which Jesus holds . Other gods have been as devoutly worshipped ; no other man has been so devoutly loved . -- John Knox Even those who have renounced Christianity and attack PRP , in their inmost being still follow DT Christian ideal , for hitherto neither their subtlety nor DT ardour of their hearts has been able to create a higher ideal of man and of virtue than DT ideal given by Christ of old . -- Fyodor Dostoyevsky A man who was completely innocent , offered himself as a sacrifice for DT good of others , including his enemies , and became DT ransom of DT NN . PRP was a perfect act . -- Mahatma Gandhi Jesus of Nazareth , without money and arms , conquered more millions than Alexander DT Great , Caesar , Mohammed , and Napoleon ; without NN and learning , he shed more light on things human and divine than all philosophers and scholars combined ; without DT eloquence of school , he spoke such words of life as were never spoken before or since , and produced effects which lie beyond DT reach of orator or poet ; without writing a single line , he set more pens in motion , and furnished themes for more sermons , orations , discussions , learned volumes , works of art , and songs of praise than DT whole army of great men of ancient and modern times . – Philip Schaff I am an historian , I am not a believer , but I must confess as a historian IN this penniless preacher from Nazareth is irrevocably DT very center of history . Jesus Christ is easily DT most dominant figure in all history . -- H.G. Wells As DT centuries pass , DT evidence is accumulating IN , measured by His effect on history , Jesus is DT most influential life ever lived on this NN . - Historian Kenneth Scott Latourette Here is a man who was born in an obscure village , DT Child of a peasant woman . He worked in a carpenter shop until He was thirty , and then for three NNS He was an itinerant preacher . He never wrote a book . He never held an office . He never owned a home . He never had a family . He never went to college . He never put His foot inside a big city . He never traveled two hundred miles from DT place where He was born . He never did CD of DT things WDT usually accompany greatness . He had no credentials but Himself . He had nothing to do with this NN except DT naked power of His Divine manhood . While still a young man , DT tide of popular opinion turned against Him . He was turned over to His enemies . He went through DT mockery of a trial . He was nailed to a Cross between two thieves . His executioners gambled for DT only piece of property He had on NN while He was dying — and DT was His coat . When He was dead He was taken down and laid in a borrowed grave through DT pity of a friend . Such was His human life — He rises from DT dead . Nineteen wide centuries have come and gone and today He is DT Centerpiece of DT human race and DT Leader of DT column of progress . I am within DT mark when I say IN all DT armies WDT ever marched , and all DT navies WDT ever were built , and all DT parliaments WDT ever sat , and all DT kings WDT ever reigned , put together , have not affected DT life of man upon this NN as powerfully as has DT CD Solitary Life . - James C. Hefley Socrates taught for 40 NNS , Plato for 50 , Aristotle for 40 , and Jesus for only 3 . Yet DT influence of Christ 's 3 - NN ministry infinitely transcends DT impact left by DT combined 130 NNS of teaching from these men who were among DT greatest philosophers of all antiquity . – Unknown I have read in Plato and Cicero sayings WDT are very wise and very beautiful ; but I never read in either of them : " Come unto me all ye DT labour and are heavy laden . " - Augustine Buddha never claimed to be God. Moses never claimed to be Jehovah . Mohammed never claimed to be Allah . Yet Jesus Christ claimed to be DT true and living God. Buddha simply VBD , " I am a teacher in search of DT truth . " Jesus VBD , " I am DT Truth . " Confucius VBD , " I never claimed to be holy . " Jesus VBD , " Who convicts me of sin ? " Mohammed VBD , " Unless God throws his cloak of mercy over me , I have no hope . " Jesus VBD , " Unless PRP believe in me , PRP will die in your sins . " - Unknown Fundamentally , our Lord 's message was Himself . He did not come merely to preach a Gospel ; He himself is DT Gospel . He did not come merely to give bread ; He VBD , " I am DT bread . " He did not come merely to shed light ; He VBD , " I am DT light . " He did not come merely to show DT door ; He VBD , " I am DT door . " He did not come merely to name a shepherd ; He VBD , " I am DT shepherd . " He did not come merely to point DT way ; He VBD , " I am DT way , DT truth , and DT life . " -- J. No myth is filled with such life . -- Albert Einstein An unsurpassed master of DT art of laying bare DT inmost core of spiritual truth . - Geza Vermes Jesus was DT greatest religious genius WDT ever lived . - Ernest Renan EX is something so pure and frank and noble about Him DT to doubt His sincerity MD be IN doubting DT brightness of DT sun . - Charles Edward Jefferson Jesus Christ is to me DT outstanding personality of all NN , all history , both as Son of God and as Son of Man . Everything he ever VBD or did has value for PRP today and DT is something PRP can say of no other man , dead or alive . EX is no easy middle ground to stroll upon . Gordon Only Christ MD have conceived Christ . - Joseph Parker In Jesus , God wills to be true God not only in DT height but RB in DT depth – in DT depth of human creatureliness , sinfulness and mortality . - Karl Barth PRP was this same Jesus , DT Christ who , among JJ other remarkable things , VBD and repeated something which , proceeding from any other being MD have condemned him at once as either a bloated egotist or a dangerously unbalanced person ... when He VBD He himself MD rise again from DT dead , DT third day after He was crucified , He VBD something WDT only a fool MD dare say , if he expected longer DT devotion of any disciples — unless He was sure He was VBG to rise . No founder of any NN religion known to men ever dared say a thing IN DT ! -- Wilbur Smith I accept DT resurrection of Easter Sunday not as an invention of DT community of disciples , but as a historical event . If DT resurrection of Jesus from DT dead on DT Easter Sunday were a JJ event which had been made known ... not only to DT 530 Jewish witnesses but to DT entire population , all Jews MD have become followers of Jesus . - Pinchas Lapide , Orthodox Jewish scholar , Germany ( born 1922 ) Because Christianity ’s influence is so pervasive throughout much of DT NN , PRP is easy to forget how radical its beliefs once were . Jesus ’ resurrection forever changed Christians ’ view of death . Therefore , JJ Christians survived DT plague . - “ 2000 NNPS of Jesus ” by Kenneth L. Woodward , NEWSWEEK , March 29 , 1999 , p. 55 . Despite our efforts to keep him out , God intrudes . DT life of Jesus is bracketed by two impossibilities : " a virgin 's womb and an empty tomb " . Jesus entered our NN through a door marked , " No Entrance " and left through a door marked " No Exit . Such is my consciousness of sin and inability WDT I must have a superhuman Saviour . -- Daniel Webster Our problem is this : PRP usually discover him within some denominational or Christian ghetto . text: After more than seven NNS of war , which have brought death and destruction , pain and suffering , and every form of terrorism imaginable to DT Syrian NNS , DT war is finally entering its final stage . DT much - anticipated battle of Idlib will commence soon . DT plan to liberate every inch of Syria , which has been stated numerous times by NNP Bashar Al Assad , is underway . RT NNS , “ Syrian forces are gearing up to take DT last terrorist stronghold . DT NNP is boosting its military presence , and Russia is warning of a false - flag chemical attack . RT looks at DT alignment of forces ahead of DT battle for Idlib . American warships , cruise missile delivery systems , strategic bombers and other hardware have arrived in DT Mediterranean and in DT Persian Gulf earlier this week . Washington is denying IN any buildup is taking place , but Moscow says DT assets are being gathered for a massive strike against DT Syrian NN . ” DT Syrian NNS have been through unimaginable circumstances , brought on by a western manufactured insurrection , both on DT ground and in DT NN . PRP MD VB , IN bringing this war to an end , and allowing Syrians to rebuild their lives , MD be an objective shared by all humanitarians and activists , but unfortunately , DT is far from DT case . Propagandists who pose as humanitarians and activists , while ironically supporting terrorist aligned militant groups , have once again amplified their coordinated NN efforts to spread misinformation ahead of DT final big battle in Syria . Journalist and book author Brandon Turbeville writes , “ As mainstream NN doubles down in its coordinated propaganda against DT Syrian NN and in support of direct Western military intervention , DT alternative NN has been VBG up against unprecedented censorship on DT part of DT social NN and Internet corporate giants at DT same NN . For DT reason , PRP is becoming harder and harder to find accurate sources of information regarding Syria as well as all other topics in a general Internet search . While readers of DT alt NN before Google ’s purge and censorfest took place have largely remained , DT amount of NNS being exposed to JJ information and an alternative to NN and corporate propaganda has been drastically reduced . ” In order to stay CD step ahead of DT game , Sputnik goes on to say , “ Damascus has handed documents to DT UN , to prove IN al - Nusra Front * terrorists plan to conduct a chemical weapons attack in DT northwestern Syrian province of Idlib and point DT finger at DT country 's NN , according to Syria 's UN envoy Bashar Jaafari . ” Kester Ratcliff a “ Former Project Researcher at University of Bristol ” who studies “ Top Programme Evolutionary Biology MSc at RUG Groningen ” and has previously studied “ Animal Behaviour and Welfare NNP at University of Bristol ” , according to his Facebook page , has created what he calls a “ references directory on 151 JJ figures who have expressed support and / or whitewashed DT Assad regime , with examples and references . ” He stated , “ DT purpose of this list is to facilitate finding DT references to see and to show NNS who genuinely do n’t VB what is true and who to trust about Syria why DT NNS on this list should not be trusted as sources . ” Let ’s take a moment to digest DT last quite bold sentence . DT NNS he cherry picked for his directory should not be trusted according to Ratcliff . Ratcliff dedicated a substantial amount of NN and effort to smearing Vanessa Beeley who has extensive experience working on - DT - ground in Syria . In his directory he VBZ “ PRP is my honest opinion IN she is manifestly an agent of DT Assad regime , IN she should be added to DT lists of sanctioned persons under DT UK and DT EU sanctions on Syria , and IN she should be arrested if she enters DT UK or any EU Member NNP ’s territorial jurisdiction and charged with direct and publicly broadcast incitement of DT crime against humanity of widespread and systematic attacks on humanitarian workers in an armed conflict zone , under Article 7 ( 1 ) ( k ) of DT Rome Statute of DT International Criminal Court . She responded to Ratcliff ’s tweet , with DT question on everyone ’s mind “ Who are PRP ? ” In 1978 , a popular English rock band by DT name of “ DT Who ” released a song titled Who Are PRP ? CD of DT lines is , “ I remember throwing punches around and preaching from my chair ” . What oddly perfect description of Ratcliff , who makes accusations against NNS he has never met , talked to , or even interacted with , all from DT comfort of his chair . Others on social NN asked questions such as what expertise does Ratcliff bring to DT table ? How qualified is he to tell a broad audience who is trustworthy and who is not when PRP comes to DT Syrian conflict ? I am paraphrasing but DT point is DT same . PRP might imagine , IN this self - proclaimed “ political thinker ” ( per his Medium bio ) must have a background WDT qualifies him to give an opinion on journalists , political commentators , and other JJ figures who have contributed written or oral material during DT course of over seven NNS of a western manufactured insurrection in Syria . However , DT questions certainly outnumber DT answers in this case . What PRP can gather is IN Ratcliff has never stepped foot in Syria , and relies on second - hand information , such as DT from refugees whom he met and coached during his NN in Greece . DT ever - evolving man of JJ interests Ratcliff gives PRP more insight into who he is in DT few articles he has written and published on various sites . In an essay published by Medium titled “ Suffering and DT Construction of Authority ” Ratcliff wrote about his mother " I had a mentally ill and abusive mother , grew up as effectively her sole carer . During my teenage NNS , DT most fundamental issue PRP fought about and DT most frequently was IN she demanded I should ‘ respect her authority ’ merely because of her conventional position as my parent , which I MD not do because she was actually completely untrustworthy , unreliable and , literally , insane , and in fact I had to practically care for her IN a parent MD , when I was a child . Practically our roles were reversed , but she insisted on DT ‘ authority ’ conventionally attached to her position . Needless to say , I absolutely refused . ” Ratcliff goes on to say , “ DT developmental experience made me extra sensitive , vigilant and radically opposed to all forms of authoritarianism in every area of human life . ‘ Authoritarianism ’ is DT idea of ‘ authority ’ existing for its own sake , inherently possessing its authority , in an alienated way , rather than PRP being a characteristic of a relationship , in which authority is given and received ( inter - subjectively ) for certain mutually beneficial purposes . " PRP can read more about his views on authority in his essay on Medium where his bio reads : EvoBio MSc student at RUG in Groningen , refugee solidarity volunteer , activist , political thinker . Ratcliff shares with PRP DT next chapter of his life in DT same essay , He wrote about his Buddhist monk experience for Buddha Channel in an article titled Kester Ratcliff — ” Monastic lineages and DT Vinaya : Which is Buddhist ? ” ” I used to be a monk for six and half NNS in DT Thai Forest Tradition , my name then was Bhikkhu Santi . As well as a lot of meditation , in those six NNS I RB did a lot of NN and particularly Vinaya , and especially DT two main neglected areas - DT Bhikkhuni Vinaya and DT communal legal procedures ( adhikarana - samatha - dhammas ) . Ratcliff shares an interestingly similar perspective about DT abbots , as DT of his mother in DT same article . Ratcliff writes about his experience as a monk and how his journey led him to join DT Quakers in an article on his website titled “ Mulesika - Seeking DT Roots ” . - Ratcliff wrote an article titled Systemic legal issues for refugees in Europe and affected by Europe globally in which he VBZ this is “ A list of in - depth sources with connecting notes about DT major systemic legal problems confronting refugees as PRP try to reach a place of safety . DT major issues are in order of encounter from a refugee ’s point of view . ” - On Ratcliff ’s Facebook profile PRP VBZ IN he manages a group called Visas for Asylum or Safe Passage to EU . - Ratcliff writes about his work with HIAS on his blog Silence of Eternity : Specifically what I plan to do in Chios next week and DT week after : • Help physically set up DT information tent – I ’m not sure whether to take my power tools as well as my legal textbooks , but I have both here ; • Try to set up a psychosocially safe , private and dignified environment in which to ask NNS to recall what happened to make them flee their homes and NNS ; • Discuss with them through DT Guide I ’ve prepared on how to prepare for asylum interviews , clarify their answers with them , and write down their statements ready for them to take in with them to their interviews ( this should assist both DT refugees and EASO / DT Greek Asylum Service , making DT process both fairer and more efficient for everyone ) . • If EX ’s enough NN , practice mock interviews with NNS . • Connect NNS whose NNS I can’t deal with as a non-lawyer to DT network of pro bono refugee legal aid lawyers I ’m in contact with now , across NGOs . • VB a more detailed realistic sense of what ’s needed and what works , to feed into DT design of DT HIAS Greece legal aid programme . ” - Ratcliff wrote a comment in response to an article written by DT Sun titled “ SYRIA CRIME WAVE : Hundreds of Syrians in UK arrested over string of offences including rape and child abuse , in which he stated DT sole purpose of sharing this article and Ratcliff ’s comment is to show IN his calls for NNS to be convicted and imprisoned are nothing JJ . In response to an article titled “ Spiritual influence ” and elections Ratcliff wrote “ ... text: Big NN in DT diabetes device NN as PRP relates to future closed loop tech ! No , this does n't mean Bigfoot will continue to make or sell DT Snap pump , or even IN Bigfoot will be involved in servicing any existing pumps out RB . text: Reaching DT moon was a giant leap for mankind — and for DT businesses behind DT project . DT Apollo program ’s total cost was about $ 25.4 billion , about $ 152 billion in today ’s dollars . DT money flowed to giants IN Boeing ( CD of DT makers of DT Saturn V rocket ) , established brands IN Velcro ( whose fasteners kept things in place in space ) and some unexpected companies IN Hammond Organ ( a keyboard manufacturer WDT created mechanical timers and clocks for DT Apollo spacecraft ) . CD of DT most remarkable things about DT Moon landing was how short a NN PRP took . NNP Kennedy proposed NASA MD land a person on DT moon , and a short eight NNS later , PRP did . DT meant IN PRP accelerated technology development far faster than MD have happened otherwise , says Ella Atkins , an Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers senior member . “ DT rapid prototyping and deployment MD have been unprecedented without DT kind of program . ” DT experience gained by companies IN Honeywell and Motorola helped push industries IN avionics and communications decades into DT future . Apollo did n’t just advance technology . PRP advanced DT way business was done . In an article in DT February 1968 issue of Forbes , NASA manager George Mueller explained how he restructured DT large , complex Apollo program into smaller “ packages , ” each with its own manager . DT organizational setup made PRP easier to keep DT project running smoothly , and based on its experience , Boeing copied DT setup when PRP developed DT 747 . Experience with Apollo RB led its contractors to develop JJ kinds of businesses . Black & Decker ( now Stanley Black & Decker ) , for example , took its experience building tools for DT Apollo program into some of DT battery - powered consumer products WDT underlies its $ 14 billion in annual revenue . Plantronics ( now Poly ) uses DT headsets PRP manufactured for DT Apollo mission as DT design basis for headsets PRP makes today for applications ranging from aviation to gaming . Perhaps Malcolm Forbes VBD PRP best , writing in 1968 IN “ our future breakthroughs in knowledge will come from DT exciting disciplines necessary to solve DT problems WDT arise in trying to reach DT Moon and beyond . ” Hundreds of companies helped construct DT Apollo spacecraft WDT sent Neil Armstrong , Buzz Aldrin and Michael Collins to DT Moon . Here are a few highlights of what PRP did . All of DT figures here are in contemporary dollars . For a sense of what these figures MD be today , multiply them by about seven . LEFT : Saturn V SA - 506 at DT moment of ignition . ( NASA ) RIGHT : Lunar Module " Eagle " composite . ( ED HENGEVELD / NASA ) DT total cost of Project Apollo from 1960 to 1973 . Cost of DT Saturn V rocket WDT launched astronauts to DT Moon . Cost of DT command module in which Collins orbited DT moon while Armstrong and Aldrin landed . Cost of DT lunar module , known as DT Eagle . LEFT : Aldrin 's boot print in DT lunar soil . ( NASA ) RIGHT : Neil Armstrong collects lunar soil . ( NASA ) Speed DT astronauts were traveling when DT Apollo spacecraft fired rocket engines from NNP orbit to send them to DT Moon . NN WDT passed between liftoff on NNP to Neil Armstrong first setting foot on DT Moon . Weight of DT rocks and soil WDT Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin brought back from DT lunar surface . Approximate value of those rocks , based on DT reported valuation for Moon rocks in a criminal case against three NASA interns who had stolen Moon rocks stored in a safe at DT Johnson Space Center lab in Houston . DT three thieves were captured by DT FBI thanks to a sting operation with DT help of a Belgian rock collector and eventually pleaded guilty . LEFT : DT huge , 363 - foot tall Apollo 11 space vehicle is launched on July 16 , 1969 ( NASA ) . RIGHT : Flight controllers Charles Duke ( Capcom ) , Jim Lovell ( backup CDR ) and Fred Haise ( backup LMP ) during DT lunar module descent . ( NASA ) Combined surface area in DT Apollo spacecraft covered with Velcro fasteners . NASA was CD of Velcro ’s early big customers , and its fasteners were used to secure objects in DT spacecraft so PRP MD n’t float around . A special metallic version was RB built by Velcro to secure heat shields to DT spacecraft . Amount NASA spent on private sector service contracts to its facilities in 1968 . Around 28,500 private contractors were working at NASA facilities DT NN . Amount spent by CD of Apollo ’s contractors — North American Rockwell ’s Space Division ( which later became part of Boeing ) — on subcontractors for development during DT Apollo program . Number of reflecting mirrors built for DT Laser Ranging Retroreflector by manufacturers Heraeus and Bendix Corporation . DT retroreflector uses a laser to precisely measure DT distance from DT NNP to DT Moon down to a millimeter . PRP ’s still taking measurements today , which are used to keep GPS satellites synchronized and accurate so PRP do n’t VB lost on your way to a lunch date . Percentage of integrated circuits in DT country WDT were being manufactured specifically for DT computers for DT Apollo program at its peak . Integrated circuits were fairly JJ then , but Apollo spurred on this technology , which computers today depend on . Misson Control in Houston watches Neil Armstrong set foot on DT moon via televised communications . ( NASA ) Value of a NASA contract to Motorola , which built DT data uplink and digital systems for DT Apollo program . PRP was a Motorola - built transponder WDT sent Neil Armstrong ’s “ CD giant leap ” to listeners at home , and DT technology MD form DT basis of DT telecommunications equipment DT company still manufactures today .

text: What did Josslyn Hay , a senior British colonial official , VBP about WW2 WDT required DT British secret service to launch a MAJOR operation to kill him ? text: Something very sinister and creepy is happening in DT deep , dark forests of DT NNP NNPS National Park System ( NPS ) . Large numbers of NNS have gone missing with no trace – only to be found dead , sometimes weeks later , far from their last known location , often at a higher elevation , and sometimes , in inaccessible places . Retired police officer David Paulides broke DT story on these strange disappearances from JJ NNP national parks . He details some extremely bizarre events WDT are not being covered by mainstream NN . DT NNS of missing persons in or near DT boundary of DT NPA are so numerous IN DT author first published a book titled “ Missing 411 . ” As Paulides continued investigating accounts of NNS gone missing in North America , he then released “ Missing 411 — Eastern NNP NNPS : Unexplained Disappearances of North Americans WDT Have Never Been Solved , ” followed by “ Missing 411 ” books for DT “ Western NNP and Canada , ” “ North American and Beyond , ” “ DT Devil ’s in DT Details , ” “ Hunters , ” and “ A Sobering Coincidence . ” With all this material on such an intriguing subject , small wonder IN PRP made a movie with DT same name : “ Missing 411 . ” Paulides , earned graduate and post - graduate degrees at DT University of San Francisco . A proud father who values family bonds , his first career featured 20 NNS experience in California law enforcement . After retiring from DT San Jose Police Department , Paulides then accepted “ a job offer in technology making much more money ” where he used his forensic skills to conduct due diligence for partnership development and acquisitions . In 2009 , while doing research for a funded , scientific NN to prove or disprove DT existence of Bigfoot , two off - duty national park rangers contacted Paulides in DT middle of DT night with information PRP felt was important he hear . Each ranger had worked at several parks in DT span of their park service careers , and both had been part of JJ search and rescue missions for lost visitors . DT rangers were concerned because “ PRP believed EX was an inordinate amount of missing NNS and DT park service was not conducting follow - up investigations , was n’t tracking missing NNS and did n’t appear to understand DT issues behind DT disappearances . ” After an initial missing - person report flurry report MD die down in DT local NN , DT park service performed no further inquiries , letting these NNS die and grow cold . This is odd , in and of itself , since a contingent of federally - trained park service law enforcement special agents are tasked to investigate crimes committed in DT parks . PRP patrol , and are in charge of , 189 locations . However , DT rangers who confided in Paulides knew IN DT NNS PRP had tried to find had not fallen into creeks or off cliffs – PRP had vanished with no trace . DT rangers asked Paulides to take a deep dive into this puzzling matter , which he did DT following morning . Paulides called some of his law enforcement sources . He asked them to see if EX had actually been numerous disappearances at DT locations indicated by DT rangers , and to see if DT numbers of NNS reported missing added up . DT quick reply confirmed unquestionably IN “ a ton ” of NNS had indeed disappeared from those very locations . text: At DT White House and in a series of conference calls Monday , Democrats wrestled with DT CD question WDT preoccupies DT party after Donald NNP ’s stunning victory : What to do about DT Obama coalition ? Neither NNP Barack Obama nor Hillary NNP explicitly framed PRP DT way in their private and JJ conversations with party members Monday . But DT looming question colored their remarks to shell - shocked operatives and activists , and PRP serves as DT backdrop for DT brewing battle over DT chairmanship of DT Democratic National Committee — a fight WDT some Democrats are terrified will devolve into a three - month factional war over DT party ’s identity , rather than a difference of opinion over party tactics . Speaking in terms of a Democratic Party at a crossroads during his NN conference Monday , Obama VBD he MD try not to “ big - foot ” DT party ’s conversation about DT future . Later , in a conference call with Democratic activists , he did n’t address any second - guessing of his or NNP ’s strategy and again stopped short of dictating DT path forward . DT recently defeated NNP took much DT same approach in her own private discussion with House Democrats on Monday , speaking vaguely of DT road ahead but stopping short of offering specific directions . “ Two things PRP ca n’t afford to be is discouraged or divided , ” she VBD , according to a Democrat on DT call . “ PRP ca n’t be distracted or diverted in DT fights ahead . ” Yet DT issue of whether to re-engage DT young voters and minorities who elected Obama to two terms but did n’t turn out for NNP , or reach out to DT disaffected white working - class voters who swung to NNP , is too pressing to be avoided . In DT wake of NNP ’s shocking defeat , EX is widespread skepticism among Democrats about whether DT voters who elected Obama will be enough to carry DT White House for any future Democrat after an election in which NNP lost by wide margins among white voters and in rural areas where NNP proved devastatingly popular . “ PRP ’ve started to lose touch with white voters . PRP ’re still DT majority out RB , and PRP ca n’t claim to be a big - tent party if PRP lose touch with working - class voters , whether PRP ’re black , white , blue or red , ” VBD DNC member Boyd Brown of South Carolina . “ When PRP have Nancy Pelosi , Hillary NNP , Chuck Schumer making DT sale for PRP , DT dog do n’t hunt . PRP ’s NN to reshuffle DT deck and VB some younger folks in RB with some more diverse backgrounds . PRP ’s NN for a leadership shakeup . ” After party members are done surveying Democrats ’ hollowed - out down - ballot landscape , and with DT national party on DT precipice of an all - out brawl for DT central committee ’s chairmanship , everything is suddenly on DT table as Democrats try to determine whether DT party chose DT wrong messenger , DT wrong message or DT wrong audience . Some are convinced IN a tighter focus on a simple JJ message MD be an important start . “ Everything is so fresh ; PRP ’s been less than a week to analyze what PRP have here . I just VBP [ zeroing in on jobs ] is what DT NNS of my NN expect from me , ” VBD Rhode Island Gov. Gina Raimondo , a Democrat serving in her first term . “ When I ’m out and about talking to NNS , asking , ‘ What ’s on your mind , what are PRP concerned about , what can PRP do to make your life better ? ’ DT ’s DT No. 1 , No. 2 , No. 3 thing . text: I was thrilled to be on hand at DT Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute ( STRI ) in Panama when staff scientist Carlos Jaramillo and others published their amazing find of DT NN 's largest snake — 42 feet long and weighing 2,500 pounds ( previous records were 33 feet and 403 pounds ) . Actually , 28 of these giant snakes have been found . Since I am a geological engineer , PRP was even more interesting for me to tour Jaramillo 's most recent project at DT Panama Canal . Massive JJ excavations to allow DT NN 's biggest ships to pass through via a third , larger set of locks have exposed geological formations WDT date back 17 million NNS and given Jaramillo an opportunity to help solve a puzzle : how and when DT land bridge connecting North and South America formed . Jaramillo 's group collects newly uncovered fossils and compares them with fossils found in North America from DT same NN period . DT comparisons should shed light on DT formation of DT Isthmus of Panama , which began about 20 million NNS ago ; DT closure of DT isthmus some three million NNS ago launched two of our NN 's great experiments in biodiversity . DT first , DT Great American Interchange , began when DT fauna and flora of North America invaded South America and vice versa across DT newly formed land bridge . DT second began when DT isthmus formed a barrier , dividing marine organisms into Caribbean and eastern Pacific populations . During my visit to STRI , I RB took in DT cacophonous whoops of howler monkeys and rode high above DT forest canopy in a research gondola held aloft by a construction crane ; I observed butterfly aerobatics and working ant colonies . STRI 's focus is Barro Colorado Island , located in DT canal 's Gatun Lake ; its 1,316 plant species , 381 bird species and 115 mammal species are among DT NN 's most intensively studied . Institute NNS are illuminating how forests capture carbon from DT atmosphere , studying DT NN of coral reefs and documenting invasive species . This and other STRI NN will inform exhibits at DT Smithsonian - affiliated Museum of Biodiversity ( BioMuseo ) next to STRI labs at DT Pacific end of DT canal . Designed by Frank Gehry , DT JJ museum will open next NN , just in NN to celebrate DT Smithsonian 's 100 - NN partnership with Panama . Those among PRP less interested in geology might still be wondering about DT snakes . Not to worry . PRP preferred eating crocodiles and giant turtles . And DT discovery was of snake fossils ( mostly backbones ) in DT remote jungles of Colombia ; DT snakes , called Titanoboas , lived some 60 million NNS ago . G. Wayne Clough is Secretary of DT Smithsonian Institution .
