text: UK garage , RB known as UKG , is a genre of electronic music which originated in England in DT early 1990s . DT genre blends styles such as garage house , R&B , jungle and dance - pop . PRP usually features a percussive , shuffled 4/ 4 breakbeat rhythm with syncopated hi-hats , cymbals and snares , and sometimes includes irregular kick drum patterns . Garage tracks RB commonly feature ' chopped up ' and NN - stretched or pitch - shifted vocal samples complementing DT underlying rhythmic structure at a tempo usually around 130 BPM . UK garage gave rise to subgenres such as speed garage and 2 - step , and was then largely subsumed into other styles of music and production in DT mid-2000s , including bassline , grime and dubstep . DT decline of UK garage during DT mid-2000s saw DT birth of UK funky , which is closely related . DT evolution of house music in DT NNP Kingdom in DT mid-1990s led to DT term , as previously coined by DT Paradise Garage DJs , being applied to a JJ form of music RB known speed garage . Its originator is widely recognised to be Todd Edwards , DT American house and garage producer , RB known as Todd " DT God " Edwards [ citation needed ] . In DT early nineties , Edwards began to start remixing more soulful house records and incorporating more NN - shifts and vocal samples than normal house records , whilst still living in DT NNP . However , PRP was not until DJ EZ , DT North London DJ , acquired CD of Edwards ' tracks and played PRP at a faster tempo in a nightclub in Greenwich , IN DT music genre really took off . In DT late nineties , DT term " UK garage " was settled upon by DT scene . This style is now frequently combined with other forms of music IN soul , rap , reggae , ragga and R&B , all broadly filed under DT description of urban music . DT pronunciation of UK garage uses GARR - ij , rather than gə-rahzh . [ 1 ] Artists such as Craig David , Grant Nelson , MJ Cole , Artful Dodger , Jaimeson , So Solid Crew , Heartless Crew , DT Streets , Shanks & Bigfoot , DJ Luck & MC Neat , Sunship ( Ceri Evans ) , Oxide and Neutrino and numerous others have made garage music mainstream in DT UK , whilst Dizzee Rascal , Wiley and Kano 's arrival raised DT profile of grime , an offshoot of garage . Cole once stated , " London is a multicultural city ... PRP 's IN a melting pot of young NNS , and DT 's reflected in DT music of UK garage " . [ 2 ] Notable female singers who have had DT genre incorporated into their songs include Lisa Maffia , Ms. Dynamite , Kele Le Roc , Shola Ama , Sweet Female Attitude and Mis-Teeq . In DT NNP Kingdom , where jungle was very popular at DT NN , garage was played in a second room at jungle events . After jungle 's peak in cultural significance , PRP had turned towards a harsher , more techstep influenced sound , driving away dancers , predominantly women . Escaping DT 170 bpm jungle basslines , DT garage rooms had a much more sensual and soulful sound at 130 b pm . [ 3 ] DJs started to speed up garage tracks to make them more suitable for DT jungle audience in DT UK . DT NN started to call this tempo-altered type of garage music " speed garage " , 4x4 and 2 - step 's predecessor . DJs MD usually play dub versions ( arrangements without vocals ) of garage tracks , because pitch - shifting vocals MD sometimes render DT music unrecognizable ( although sped up and NN - stretched vocals were an important part of DT early jungle sound , and later played a key role in speed garage ) . DT absence of vocals left space in DT music for MCs , who started rhyming to DT records . Since then , MCs have become CD of DT vital aspects of speed and UK garage parties and records . Early promoters of speed garage included DT Dreem Teem and Tuff Jam , and pirate radio stations such as London Underground , Magic FM , Upfront FM , and Freek FM . During its initial phase , DT speed garage scene was RB known as " DT Sunday Scene " , as initially speed garage promoters MD only hire venues on Sunday evenings ( venue owners preferred to save Friday and Saturday nights for more popular musical styles ) . Labels whose outputs MD become synonymous with DT emerging speed garage sound included Confetti , JJ Demand , 500 Rekords , Spread Love and VIP . Speed garage already incorporated JJ aspects of today 's UK garage sound IN sub - bass lines , ragga vocals , spin backs and reversed drums . What changed over NN , until DT so - called 2 - step sound emerged , was DT addition of further funky elements IN contemporary R&B styled vocals , more shuffled beats and a different drum pattern . DT most radical NN from speed garage to 2 - step was DT removal of DT 2nd and 4th bass kick from each bar . Although tracks with only two kick drum beats to a bar are perceived as being slower than DT traditional four - to - DT - floor beat , DT listener 's interest is maintained by DT introduction of syncopating bass lines and DT percussive use of other instruments such as pads and strings . Speed garage tracks were characterised by a sped - up house - style beat , complemented by DT rolling snares and reverse - warped basslines WDT were popular with drum and bass producers of DT NN . Among those credited with honing DT speed garage sound , Todd Edwards is often cited as a seminal influence on DT UK garage sound . DT producer from NNP Jersey introduced a JJ way of working with vocals . Instead of having full verses and choruses , he picked out vocal phrases and played them IN an instrument , using sampling technology . [ 4 ] Often , individual syllables were reversed or pitch - shifted . This type of vocal treatment is still a key characteristic of DT UK garage style . Armand Van Helden 's speed garage remix of Sneaker Pimps ' " Spin Spin Sugar " in 1997 further popularized DT genre which is sometimes credited with breaking speed garage into DT mainstream . Huge club hits in 1997 came from speed garage duos Double 99 , 187 Lockdown and Industry Standard . DT former two both scored UK Top 20 hits in 1997 and 1998 ; Double 99's " RipGroove " reached # 14 in its second release and 187 Lockdown 's " Gunman " and " Kung - Fu " reached # 16 and # 9 , respectively . Industry Standard scored a Top 40 hit with " Vol. 1 ( What PRP VBP What PRP Need ) " peaking at # 34 in January 1998 , [5 ] and DT 1997 XL Recordings release of Somore featuring Damon Trueitt 's " I Refuse ( What PRP VBP ) " reached # 21 RB in January 1998 , [ 6 ] containing mixes by Industry Standard , Ramsey & Fen , R.I.P. Productions and Serious Danger . DT UK's counterpart to Todd Edwards was MJ Cole , a classically trained oboe and piano player , who had a string of chart and underground hits in DT late 1990s and early 2000s , most notably with " Sincere " and " Crazy Love " . MJ Cole has RB won a BBC " Young Musician of DT NNP " award . [ 7 ] Arguably CD of DT earliest examples of a 2 - step track is DT 1997 hit " Never Gonna Let PRP VB " by Tina Moore , which peaked at # 7 on DT UK chart . Roy Davis Jr. was RB influential in DT UK garage scene , with DT huge club hit " Gabriel " featuring Peven Everett , released in 1997 on XL Recordings and reaching # 22 on DT UK chart . Lovestation released their version of " Teardrops " which reached # 14 in 1998 . Doolally , DT former name of Shanks & Bigfoot , scored a # 20 hit in 1998 with " Straight from DT Heart " . A re-release of this song DT following NN fared even better , peaking at # 9 , due to DT success of their # 1 single " Sweet JJ Chocolate " . Jess Jackson was responsible for JJ garage records but CD which stood out was " Hobson 's Choice " . DT B - side of this record changed DT UK garage scene from funky and soulful to dark and bassy . Another example of DT evolution in 2 - step was DT release of " Troublesome " in 1999 by Shy Cookie and DJ Luck , in which non-sampled 2 - step beats were merged with a full ragga vocal ( performed by ragga artist Troublesome ) . Timbaland , a popular contemporary R&B producer in America , was DT major innovator behind contemporary R&B at DT NN , from which UK rave culture borrowed heavily . DT use of rhythmic patterns as melodic hooks is shared by both contemporary R&B and jungle , making PRP very appealing to DT significantly ex-junglist UK garage scene . This style of Timbaland 's R&B possesses a breakbeat aesthetic : breakup of DT flow of four - to - DT - floor rhythm , hesitations into DT groove , and teasing and tantalizing gaps . As much as these R&B influences can be heard in early UK garage , DT genre offered more complex drum beats , with heavy syncopation ( swing ) and a more energetic feel due to a higher tempo ( normally between 130 and 138 BPM ) . However , in tracks IN " Twentyfourseven " by Artful Dodger , a slower and simpler R&B infused drum pattern can be heard . This was to allow for these tracks to be aimed at a more commercial scene rather than for DT dance floor . Garage producers then proceeded to churn out UK versions of NNP contemporary R&B hits , notably with Brandy and Monica 's " DT Boy Is Mine " . DT Architechs sped up DT vocals through NN - stretching and added sound effects to increase DT competitive nature . " B& M Remix " eventually sold twenty thousand copies as a bootleg . [ 3 ] RB borrowed from NNP contemporary R&B is DT use of " vocal NN " , DT technique of digitally altering vocal samples with devices such as DT Autotuner . What results is a posthuman mix between person and technology . [ 3 ] With DT continued support of pirate radio stations such as Rinse FM , NNP FM , Deja Vu , and Flex FM , DT soaring popularity of UK garage saw 1999 take DT genre into DT mainstream , breaking into DT music charts . Production duos Shanks & Bigfoot and Artful Dodger were very successful with DT tracks " Sweet JJ Chocolate " and " Re- Rewind " , respectively . After DT platinum - selling success of " Sweet JJ Chocolate " , DT floodgates had opened . Although " Re- Rewind " was denied a # 1 position by Cliff Richard and his song " DT Millennium Prayer " , PRP was RB a platinum seller , CD of DT garage scene 's first and last . PRP became anthems for DT 2 - step scene , and got onto BBC's Top of DT Pops . Other huge hits in 1999 include DT # 1 house / garage anthem " PRP Don't VB Me " by Armand Van Helden . Although not UK garage , Mr. Oizo's # 1 single " Flat Beat " received extensive airplay on pirate radio stations upon release , thus leading to numerous UK garage / 2 - step remixes of DT track . Da Click ( Pied Piper , MC Creed , PSG , Unknown MC and singer Valerie M ) had a # 14 hit with " Good Rhymes " . Garage trio DT Dreem Teem had a # 15 hit with " Buddy X 99 " , a garage remix of Neneh Cherry 's 1992 song " Buddy X " . DJ Luck & MC Neat RB had a chart hit with " A Little Bit of Luck " in late 1999 into early 2000 . JJ more UK garage acts followed into DT JJ millennium by releasing commercially successful singles , thus making UK garage and 2 - step a stable fixture on DT UK charts for DT next couple of NNS . Debut singles of various UK garage artists were hitting DT number CD spot on DT UK charts . Craig David 's debut solo single " Fill Me In " , a mix of R&B and 2 - step , with single formats containing various garage remixes of DT track , hit # 1 in April 2000 . A month later , Oxide & Neutrino 's " Bound 4 Da Reload ( Casualty ) " reached DT top of DT charts . Other hits in 2000 include Artful Dodger 's " Movin ' Too Fast " ( # 2 ) , " Woman Trouble " ( # 6 ) and " Please Don't Turn Me On " ( # 4 ) , Sweet Female Attitude 's " Flowers " ( # 2 ) , True Steppers ' " Buggin " ( # 6 ) and " Out of Your Mind " ( # 2 ) , N'n 'G featuring Kallaghan and MC Neat 's " Right Before My Eyes " ( # 12 ) , DJ Dee Kline 's " I Don't Smoke " ( #11 ) , B - 15 Project 's " Girls IN NNP " ( # 7 ) , DJ Luck & MC Neat 's " Masterblaster 2000 " ( # 5 ) and " Ain't No Stoppin ' PRP " ( # 8 ) , Shanks & Bigfoot 's " Sing - A - Long " ( # 12 ) , MJ Cole 's " Crazy Love " ( #10 ) and " Sincere " ( #13 ) , DT latter a re-release , having been originally released in 1998 ; Scott & Leon 's " PRP Used to Hold Me " ( # CD ) , Wookie 's " Battle " ( #10 ) , Lonyo's " Summer of Love " ( # 8 ) , Tru Faith & Dub NNP 's " Freak IN Me " ( # 12 ) , Architechs ' " Body Groove " ( # 3 ) , Oxide & Neutrino 's " No Good 4 Me " ( # 6 ) and Baby D's " Let Me Be Your Fantasy " ( # 16 ) , a garage remix by Trick or Treat featuring MC Tails . Another huge hit in 2000 was DT Timo Maas remix of DT song " Dooms Night " ( # 8 ) by German producer Azzido Da Bass , which was heavily associated with UK garage at DT NN , having become a major club hit and appearing on several UK garage compilations . PRP was RB remixed by garage duo Stanton Warriors . [ 7 ] 2001 gave DJ Pied Piper and DT Masters of Ceremonies their CD and only number CD hit record with " Do PRP Really VB PRP ? " . Two months later in August 2001 , South London collective So Solid Crew hit DT top spot with their second single " 21 Seconds " . DT end of 2001 saw yet another 2 - step anthem reach DT top of DT UK charts for Daniel Bedingfield , with his debut single " Gotta VB Thru This " . Other chart hits in 2001 include DT Sunship mixes of Mis-Teeq 's " Why " ( # 8 ) , " All I VBP " ( # 2 ) and " NNP Night Stand " ( # 5 ) , Artful Dodger 's " VB About Me " ( #11 ) , " TwentyFourSeven " ( # 6 ) and " PRP Ain't Enough " with DT Dreem Teem ( # 20 ) , Genius Cru's " Boom Selection " ( # 12 ) , Liberty 's " Thinking PRP Over " ( # 5 ) , Sticky featuring Ms. Dynamite 's " Booo ! " ( # 12 ) , Oxide & Neutrino 's " Up Middle Finger " ( # 7 ) , " Devil 's Nightmare " ( # 16 ) and " Rap Dis " / " Only Wanna VB U Cos Ure Famous " ( # 12 ) , DJ Luck & MC Neat 's " Piano Loco " ( # 12 ) and " I'm All About PRP " ( # 18 ) , DT Streets ' " Has PRP Come to This ? " ( # 18 ) , Wideboys ' " Sambuca " ( #15 ) , and So Solid Crew 's " PRP Don't VBP " ( # 3 ) . 2002 saw an evolution as 2 - step moved away from its funky and soul - oriented sound into a darker direction called " grime " , now a genre in its own right . During this period , traditional UK garage was pushed back underground amongst DT bad publicity emanating from DT tougher side of DT genre , and publicised violence surrounding members of DT So Solid Crew . Nonetheless , several UK garage songs did appear on DT charts from 2002 to 2004 , including Distant Soundz ' version of " NNP After NNP " ( # 20 ) , So Solid Crew 's " Haters " ( #8 ) and " Ride wid PRP " ( #19 ) , Mis-Teeq 's " B with Me " ( # 5 ) , Heartless Crew 's " DT Heartless Theme " ( # 21 ) , Pay As U Go's " Champagne Dance " ( #13 ) , Jaimeson 's " True " ( # 4 ) , Mr Reds vs DJ Skribble 's " Everybody Come On ( Can U Feel PRP ) " ( #13 ) , and 3 of a Kind 's " Baby Cakes " which was a number CD hit in August 2004 . Notable early grime artists around 2001 –03 include Ruff Sqwad , More Fire Crew , Dizzee Rascal ( who released his debut album Boy in da Corner in 2003 ) , Roll Deep and Wiley . During this NN , EX was RB a strong division of class in UK garage . In DT heyday of garage , DT late 1990s , PRP was a highly aspirational genre . When NNS went to DT club to hear garage , PRP dressed very nice . Clubs IN Twice as Nice enforced a dress code . Having a formal dress code took DT importance placed on nice clothes from a style to exclusionary . DT dress code in clubs IN Twice as Nice were meant to " encourage NNS to make an effort " and " keep trouble out . " But when DT dress code of no tennis shoes , jeans , or baseball caps only kept white college students out , DT club installed a metal detector , because " gangstas VBP to dress expensive , " but theoretically MD still carry a gun . [ 3 ] Eventually , when groups IN So Solid Crew attracted more urban , lower - class audiences to raves because of their lyrics over DT garage tracks , garage began to transition to grime because previous audiences were less likely to listen , so radios and clubs stopped giving garage opportunities . [ 8 ] In 2007 , several DJs helped promote and revive UK garage 's popularity , with producers creating JJ UK garage , RB known as " JJ skool " UK garage or " bassline " . DT end of 2007 saw " JJ skool " UK garage push to DT mainstream again with notable tracks such as T2's " Heartbroken " and H " Two " O's " What 's PRP Gonna Be " both reaching DT mainstream charts . DT revival was galvanised by DJ EZ releasing Pure Garage Rewind : Back to DT Old Skool , which contained three CDs of " old skool " UK garage and a fourth CD with fresh " JJ skool " UK garage . Early 2011 saw DT start of a gradual resurgence of 2 - step garage . [ 9 ] Producers such as Wookie , MJ Cole , Zed Bias and Mark Hill ( formerly CD half of Artful Dodger ) made a return to DT scene , by producing tracks with more of a 2 - step feel . Electronic music duos Disclosure and AlunaGeorge , both successful throughout 2012 and 2013 , often use elements of UK garage in their music , and arguably , some of their biggest hits including " PRP & Me " and " PRP Are Chosen " respectively , are entirely 2 - step with an updated cleaner sound . Shortly following this , " original " style garage had made a return in a big way , with producers such as Moony , DJD and Tuff Culture paving DT way . CD of DT genre 's pioneering labels , NNP Cream Records , responsible for anthems such as " RipGroove " , True Steppers ' " Out of Your Mind " , Kele Le Roc 's " My Love " and more , opened up their permanent roster for DT first NN to include DJs outside of DT legendary trio WDT launched DT label . AJ Tracey 's song " Ladbroke Grove " initially debuted at number 48 on DT UK Singles Chart in February 2019 , then eventually peaked at number three in October 2019 following its release as a single . In September 2019 , DT British Phonographic Industry certified DT song as Platinum for exceeding chart sales of 600,000 . PRP was CD of DT best - selling songs of 2019 . [ 10 ] Other hits in DT 2010s include Toddla T's " Take PRP Back " , All About She 's " Higher ( Free ) " , Naughty Boy 's " La La La " , Shift K3Y 's " Touch " , Chase & Status ' " Blk & Blu " , M.O's " Dance On My Own " , Disclosure 's " Omen " and Craig David 's " When DT Bassline Drops " and " CD More NNP " . DT dark garage sound WDT was being produced by DT likes of Wookie , Zed Bias , Shy Cookie , El - B and Artwork ( of DND ) in DT late 1990s MD set DT groundwork for both grime and a genre called dubstep . Developing in parallel to grime , dubstep MD take a mostly instrumental stripped down form of dark garage and with PRP bring in production values and influences from dub reggae . Some UK garage / dubstep / grime / bassline producers have moved to a different sound called UK funky , which takes production values from JJ different shades of soulful house music with elements of UK garage and blends them at a standard house music tempo , and soca with tribal style percussion from afrobeat . A contemporary offshoot of dubstep heavily influenced by UK garage is future garage .

text: NNP YORK ( AP ) — A superstorm WDT sent NN rushing onto city streets has left a large swath of DT lower part of Manhattan without power . text: Acromegaly is a hormonal disorder WDT develops when your pituitary gland produces too much growth hormone during adulthood . When this happens , your bones increase in size , including those of your hands , feet and face . Acromegaly usually affects middle - aged adults . Acromegaly usually affects middle - aged adults , though PRP can develop at any age . In NNS who are still growing , too much growth hormone can cause a condition called gigantism . These NNS have exaggerated bone growth and an abnormal increase in height . Because acromegaly is uncommon and physical changes occur gradually , DT condition sometimes takes a long NN to recognize . If PRP 's not treated promptly , acromegaly can lead to serious illness and MD even become life - threatening . But available treatments can reduce your risk of complications and significantly improve characteristics of DT condition , including DT enlargement of your features . A common sign of acromegaly is enlarged hands and feet . NNS with this disorder often notice IN PRP are n't able to put on rings WDT used to fit and IN their shoe size has progressively increased . Acromegaly MD RB cause gradual changes in DT shape of your face , such as a protruding lower jaw and brow , an enlarged nose , thickened lips , and wider spacing between your teeth . Because acromegaly tends to progress slowly , early signs MD not be obvious for NNS . Sometimes , NNS notice DT condition only by comparing old photographs with newer ones . Acromegaly MD produce DT following signs and symptoms , which can vary from CD person to another : • Severe snoring due to obstruction of DT upper airway • Enlarged organs , such as DT heart When to see a doctor If PRP have signs and symptoms associated with acromegaly , contact your doctor for an evaluation . Acromegaly usually develops slowly . Even your family members MD not initially notice DT gradual physical changes WDT occur with this disorder , but early diagnosis is important so IN PRP can start getting proper care . Acromegaly can lead to serious complications if PRP 's not treated . Acromegaly is caused by DT pituitary gland overproducing growth hormone ( GH ) over NN . DT pituitary gland , a small gland situated at DT base of your brain behind DT bridge of your nose , produces a number of hormones . GH plays an important role in managing your physical growth . When GH is secreted into your bloodstream , PRP triggers your liver to produce a hormone called insulin - JJ growth factor - I ( IGF - I ) . In turn , IGF - I stimulates DT growth of bones and other tissues . If your pituitary gland makes too much GH , excessive amounts of IGF - I can result . Too much IGF - I can cause abnormal growth of your soft tissues and skeleton and other signs and symptoms characteristic of acromegaly and gigantism . In adults , a tumor is DT most common cause of too much GH production : • Pituitary tumors . Most NNS of acromegaly are caused by a noncancerous ( benign ) tumor ( adenoma ) of DT pituitary gland . DT tumor secretes excessive amounts of growth hormone , causing JJ of DT signs and symptoms of acromegaly . Some of DT symptoms of acromegaly , such as headaches and impaired vision , are due to DT tumor mass pressing on nearby brain tissues . • Nonpituitary tumors . In a few NNS with acromegaly , tumors in other parts of DT body , such as DT lungs or pancreas , cause DT disorder . Sometimes , these tumors secrete GH . In other NNS , DT tumors produce a hormone called growth hormone - releasing hormone ( GH - RH ) , which stimulates DT pituitary gland to make more GH . Progression of acromegaly can result in major NN problems . Complications MD include : • Cardiovascular NN , particularly enlargement of DT heart ( cardiomyopathy ) • Precancerous growths ( polyps ) on DT lining of your colon • Sleep apnea , a condition in which breathing repeatedly stops and starts during sleep Early treatment of acromegaly can prevent these complications from developing or becoming worse . Untreated , acromegaly and its complications can lead to premature death .

text: Birds vary greatly in foot size and shape relating to locomotion , feeding , and reproduction ( Elphick , Dunning , Jack , & Sibley , 2001 ; Kochan , 1994 ; Proctor & Lynch , 1993 ) . Legs and feet of birds play important roles in walking ( most species ) , running ( ostriches , grouse , turkeys ) , climbing ( woodpeckers , nuthatches , tree‐creepers ) , swimming and steering underwater ( ducks , grebes , loons ) , perching ( as on a branch ) or clinging ( Elphick et al. , 2001 ; Kochan , 1994 ; Proctor & Lynch , 1993 ) . Other functions include carrying ( IN ospreys Pandion haliaetus holding fish ) and flight ‐related locomotion ( Elphick et al. , 2001 ; Kochan , 1994 ; Proctor & Lynch , 1993 ) . Feeding and related functions of feet include capture and killing of prey and pulling apart food ( with help from DT bill ) . Some grebes MD even run on NN for mate acquisition ( Clifton , Hedrick , & Biewener , 2015 ) . Webbed feet are characteristic features of bird species living in aquatic habitats ( Elphick et al. , 2001 ; Kochan , 1994 ; Proctor & Lynch , 1993 ) . NN ducks rely on both webbed feet and wings for diving , sweeping their webbed feet backwards ( Richman & Lovvorn , 2008 ) . Loons Gavia immer swim by paddling their feet laterally as in grebes and cormorants ( Clifton & Biewener , 2018 ) . Eiders use both wing and foot propulsion during descent . DT power face of foot strokes coincides with DT transition between upstroke and downstroke of DT wings ( Heath , Gilchrist , & Ydenberg , 2006 ) . DT delta shape of their webbed feet is able to generate propulsive forces from drag at DT start of DT stroke of DT feet to DT lift later in DT stroke ( Johansson & Norberg , 2003 ) . Some NN ducks use both feet and wings to swim ( Richman & Lovvorn , 2008 ) . DT use of both feet and wings increased bottom duration by 59 % compared to dives with feet only with potential consequences for ingestion rate ( Richman & Lovvorn , 2008 ) . Webbed feet are often large , and PRP show considerable variation in size among individuals ( A. P. Møller pers. obs. ) , raising DT question what is DT basis for such variation . Surprisingly , EX is no publication dealing with DT consequences of intraspecific variation in size of webbed feet , and this deficit prompted our NN . If large feet are beneficial , PRP assume IN a larger foot size is associated with a larger locomotor apparatus such as a larger wing area and a larger heart . Although EX is a genetic basis for DT size of webbed feet ( Ganan , Macias , Basco , Merino , & Hurle , 1998 ) , and DT varied and important roles WDT feet play across bird species , EX is currently a significant lack of understanding of DT functional significance of foot size . Eiders are well ‐known capital breeders ( relying on stored food throughout DT incubation period ) WDT build up body reserves during winter for subsequent breeding in spring and early summer ( Meijer & Drent , 1999 ) . Female eiders arrive during spring entering colonies and producing a clutch of 4– 5 eggs WDT are incubated for about 26 days . DT female sits on DT nest during this period without feeding . Therefore , females must build up sufficient body reserves for breeding at DT wintering grounds and off DT breeding grounds ( Hobson , Jaatinen , & Öst , 2015 ) . During winter , eiders are located off shore in large flocks feeding on benthos at 4 – 8 m depth , with a range of 0 – 20 m ( Petersen et al. , 2010 ) . In DT prebreeding period , PRP stay near DT shore feeding in shallow NN . Studies in DT Wadden NNP have shown IN DT number of eiders increases with mussel stocks , and individuals feeding on mussels have superior body condition than those taking other types of prey , which makes PRP attractive for eiders to feed on mussel beds ( Laursen , Asferg , Frikke , & Sunde , 2009 ; Laursen & Frikke , 2008 ; Nehls & Ketzenberg , 2002 ) . Blue mussels ( Mytilus edulis ) can affect feeding condition of eiders by increasing flesh content and by increasing DT size of mussel stocks ( Laursen , Møller , Haugaard , Öst , & Vainio , 2019 . DT objectives of this NN were to test ( a ) whether intraspecific variation in DT size of webbed feet is related to DT size of DT locomotor apparatus as reflected by wings and its underlying muscular basis in heart and breast muscle ; ( b ) whether DT diet is related to DT area of DT webbed feet , and hence whether DT size of DT liver as a storage organ increases with DT area of DT webbed feet . Vitamin E is DT main fat ‐soluble antioxidant stored in DT liver ( Møller , Laursen , & Karadas , 2019 ) . Larger webbed feet MD imply greater diving ability and hence a reduction in DT amount of stored vitamin E ( Møller et al. , 2019 ) . Finally , ( c ) if birds with larger webbed feet acquire more food per unit NN , this should result in a reduction in DT duration of DT molting period which again MD result in a reduction in DT duration of exposure to predators such as white ‐tailed NN eagle Haliaeetus albicilla WDT is DT main cause of mortality . Viain , Guillemette , and Savard ( 2015 ) showed IN eiders had lower flight muscle reduction than foot ‐propelled diving ducks during molt , apparently as a means of maintenance of DT ability to escape from predators . PRP tested whether DT size of DT uropygial gland WDT is involved in feather maintenance and anti‐microbial activity increases with DT area of webbed feet . Because effects of larger webbed feet MD be confounded by effects of body size , PRP included DT first principal component as a measure of skeletal body size in DT statistical analyses . PRP used a sample of 233 eiders ( Somateria mollissima ) shot during 2015 – 2018 in Danish waters during winter ( January ‐ February ; N = 182 ) and at prebreeding grounds at Åland , Finland in DT central part of DT Baltic NNP ( April–May ; N = 51 ) to test these predictions .

text: Genetic testing confirms DT legendary Bigfoot is a human relative WDT arose some 15,000 NNS ago — at least according to a press release issued by a company called DNA Diagnostics detailing supposed work by a Texas veterinarian . DT release and alleged NN by Melba S. Ketchum RB suggests such cryptids had sex with modern human females WDT resulted in hairy hominin hybrids -- but DT scientific community is dubious about her claim . " A team of NNS can verify IN their five - NN long DNA NN , currently under peer - review , confirms DT existence of a novel hominin hybrid species , commonly called ' Bigfoot ' or ' Sasquatch , ' living in North America , " DT release reads . " Researchers ' extensive DNA sequencing suggests IN DT legendary Sasquatch is a human relative WDT arose approximately 15,000 NNS ago . " For her NN , Ketchum obtained three " whole nuclear genomes from purported Sasquatch samples . DT genome sequencing shows IN Sasquatch mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens , but Sasquatch nuDNA is a novel , unknown hominin related to Homo sapiens and other primate species . " ( Mitochondrial DNA , or mtDNA , is DT DNA WDT resides in DT cell 's NN - producing structures , and is typically passed down from mothers , while nuclear DNA , nuDNA , resides in DT cells ' nuclei and is passed down from both parents to offspring . ) " Our data indicate IN DT North American Sasquatch is a hybrid species , DT result of males of an unknown hominin species crossing with female Homo sapiens , " DT statement reads . [ Infographic : Tracking Belief in Bigfoot ] So where 's DT evidence ? Well , EX is none . Not yet , anyway : Ketchum 's research has not appeared in any peer - reviewed scientific journal , and EX 's no indication when DT might happen . If DT data are good and DT NN is sound , any reputable NN journal MD jump at DT chance to be DT first to publish this groundbreaking information . Until then , Ketchum has refused to let anyone else see her evidence . Of course DT history of Bigfoot is rife with exaggerated and premature claims about proof of DT creature 's existence . For decades , various types of evidence have been offered as final , definitive proof , ranging from Bigfoot hair to blood to dead bodies . Without exception , DT evidence has always been hoaxed , misidentification or inconclusive . Because Ketchum has released no information at all about her findings ( nor have PRP been examined by outside experts ) , PRP 's impossible to evaluate DT validity of her conclusions . But an important clue can be found in her statement IN " Sasquatch mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens . " If DT mitochontrial DNA is identical to Homo sapiens ( i.e. , modern humans ) , then this suggests CD of two options . DT first , endorsed by Ketchum , is IN Bigfoot ancestors had sex with women about 15,000 NNS ago and created a half - human hybrid species currently hiding across North America . [ Rumor or Reality : DT Creatures of Cryptozoology ] EX is , however , another , simpler interpretation of such results : DT samples were contaminated . Whatever DT sample originally was — Bigfoot , bear , human or something else — PRP 's possible IN DT NNS who collected and handled DT specimens accidentally introduced their DNA into DT sample , which can easily occur with something as innocent as a spit , sneeze or cough . No NN outside of Ketchum 's team knows how this alleged Bigfoot DNA was collected , from where or by whom . PRP MD have been collected by DT NN 's top forensics experts , or by a pair of amateur Bigfoot buffs with no evidence - gathering training . How did DT team definitively determine IN DT samples were from a Bigfoot ? Did PRP take a blood or saliva sample from a living Bigfoot ? If so , how did PRP VB DT close , and why did n't PRP simply capture PRP or photograph PRP ? If DT samples were found in DT wild , how do PRP VB PRP was n't left by another animal — or possibly even a hunter , hiker or camper who left human genetic material ? Previous alleged Bigfoot samples subjected to DNA analysis have been deemed " unknown " or " unidentified . " However , " unknown " or " unidentified " results do not mean " Bigfoot . " EX are JJ reasons why a DNA sample might come back unknown , including IN PRP was contaminated or too degraded by environmental conditions . Or PRP MD simply mean IN DT animal PRP came from was not among DT reference samples WDT DT laboratory used for comparison . EX is no reference sample of Bigfoot DNA to compare PRP with , so by definition , EX can not be a conclusive match . Ketchum RB issued a statementrequesting IN DT U.S. NN immediately recognize Bigfoot as " an indigenous NNS and immediately protect their human and Constitutional rights against those who MD see in their physical and cultural differences a ' license ' to hunt , trap , or kill them . " Since no Bigfoot has ever been hunted , trapped or killed , PRP 's not clear IN DT creatures — if PRP exist — require any special federal protection . Ketchum's is not DT only genetics - based project intended to find Bigfoot . Earlier this NN , researchers from Oxford University and DT Lausanne Museum of Zoology announced PRP were collecting samples of alleged Bigfoot and Yeti hair for genetic identification . Oxford geneticist Bryan Sykes collected materials from DT NN from NNP through September , and is currently conducting DNA analysis . Once DT results are in , he plans to submit his results to a peer - reviewed scientific journal . If Ketchum has DT definitive proof she claims , DT NN will soon VB about PRP , and Bigfoot will be proven once and for all . On DT other hand , if DT evidence never appears , or is inconclusive and flawed , DT search will continue . text: Nelson : How About A Bailout For America ’s Family Farms ? Country music icon says just $ 1 billion out of $ 700 billion MD VB real economy back on track Country music icon Willie Nelson has a message for Hank Paulson and Ben Bernanke in DT wake of DT recent $ 700 billion dollar plus Wall Street bailout – how about a bailout for DT desperate and struggling family farmers of America WDT are nearing extinction ? “ I have written a letter as NN of Farm Aid to whoever controls DT money WDT PRP MD VB to have $ 1 billion dollars from DT 700 … .$ 1 billion dollars is I VBP all PRP ’ll need to turn DT economy around if PRP start out taking care of our family farmers , ” Nelson told DT Alex Jones Show . “ PRP MD put 10 million farmers back on DT land , making a living out RB raising food and fuel …. and IN $ 1 billion dollars I VBP MD VB a long way to changing our negative attitudes WDT PRP have and DT confidence in ourselves and in our country right now , ” VBD Nelson , adding IN all foreclosures on farms should be halted immediately . “ I VBP IN if PRP invested DT $ 1 billion with our family farmers , PRP MD begin to turn PRP around , ” stressed DT country music star , later joking IN $ 100 billion MD be an even better amount . Nelson has been a multi- decade activist and vocal proponent for Farm Aid , and recently performed alongside Neil Young at DT highly successful 2008 Farm Aid concert which was held at DT Comcast Center in Mansfield , MA , having helped organize DT first Farm Aid concert in 1985 . Farm Aid is a nonprofit organization whose mission is to keep family farmers on their land and support locally sourced , humanely - raised and organic food in DT face of a gargantuan attempt on behalf of big agribusiness to squeeze DT family farmer out of existence . DT letter IN Nelson and fellow Farm Aid directors John Mellencamp , Neil Young and Dave Matthews sent to Congress points out , “ When farms thrive , Main Street businesses and local communities thrive . Far from Wall Street , family farmers are creating real wealth , producing real value , growing from seeds and sunlight a product WDT nourishes PRP both physically and economically . Supporting diverse decentralized family farming will do far more for DT stability and vitality of our country than a handful of JJ agribusiness corporations MD ever do . ” “ DT proposed $ 700 billion bailout asks taxpayers to foot DT bill without giving them DT opportunity to share in any gains . A $ 1 billion investment in family farm agriculture MD enrich PRP all , because PRP are all shareholders of DT family farm . DT return on investment in DT family farm includes thriving local economies , nutritious food for better NN , a safer and more secure food supply , a cleaner environment and more renewable NN . ” Nelson pointed out IN when 8 - 10 million family farmers were on DT land in America at DT end of DT second NN war DT economy was strong because , “ Agriculture is DT bottom rung on DT JJ ladder , ” adding IN DT farmers became a target because PRP were a political problem . “ Let ’s put out DT fire now , PRP ’ll figure out who started PRP later and DT ’s pretty much what PRP have to do , PRP have to stop DT fire and stop DT bleeding , and I VBP DT best way to do DT is still from DT ground up , VB back to our family farmer , he ’s DT NN WDT started taking care of PRP in DT beginning so let ’s let him do PRP again , ” Nelson concluded . I VBP this because White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders VBD as much Tuesday : “ I do n’t VB anyone can argue PRP ’s probably CD of DT most successful first NNS in office . ” Since nobody can argue PRP , I ’m not VBG to try . Good NN — PRP was just reported IN EX were Zero deaths in 2017 , DT best and safest NN on record ! ” DT ’s fantastic ! What ’s even more amazing is DT report NNP is citing was for JJ air travel , meaning DT JJ actions he did not take to increase commercial aviation safety in America RB helped travelers in every other country in DT NN ! And here in America , PRP went from zero commercial airline deaths in 2014 , 2015 and 2016 to an even - more - impressive zero commercial airline deaths in 2017 ! DT ’s what I call strong leadership . Speaking of which , did PRP VB our supremely confident NN has increased DT size of America ’s famously non-existent Nuclear Button , making PRP bigger than North Korea ’s Nuclear Button ? Well , he has . Late Tuesday , NNP sent DT following trouser - soiling tweet : “ North Korean Leader Kim Jong Un just stated IN DT ‘ Nuclear Button is on his desk at all times . ’ Will someone from his depleted and food starved regime please inform him IN I too have a Nuclear Button , but PRP is a much bigger & more powerful NN than his , and my Button works ! ” WOO - HOOO ! At long last , PRP have an extremely secure and manly NN unafraid to boast about DT great size and power of our national desk - mounted nuke button , which I ’m sure is really a thing despite no credible evidence to suggest PRP exists . Of course DT NN has n’t tweeted about all his accomplishments . He ’s far too humble and fantastic , and RB too busy accomplishing more than any NN in history . But PRP can easily identify DT JJ things PRP should be thanking NNP NNP for by applying this simple two - part rule : 1 ) If PRP happened any NN after Inauguration Day 2017 and PRP was good , NNP NNP is responsible for PRP . 2 ) On DT off chance PRP ’s something not good , NNP NNP is responsible for PRP only if PRP can be framed in a way WDT makes PRP seem good . For example , DT Chicago area had its coldest NNP NNP ’s Day high temperature on record and by Saturday DT city will likely tie a decades - old record for consecutive days below 20 degrees . Donald NNP is clearly responsible for these wonderfully cold temperatures and for helping Chicago break records ! PRP never saw cold - weather records broken under NNP Barack Obama , and if Crooked Hillary NNP had been elected , PRP MD likely be 80 degrees and sunny in Chicago right now . NNP ’s conviction IN JJ NN is a hoax has forced temperatures to drop , giving Chicagoans DT enviable status of “ record breakers . ” Another important improvement over past administrations : DT total number of verified Bigfoot - related deaths in 2017 fell to zero , a comforting and substantial improvement over DT less - impressive zero Bigfoot - related deaths WDT occurred during all other American presidents ’ first NNS . So what do PRP have after only CD short NN of DT single greatest presidential administration in DT history of presidential greatness ? PRP have Chicago being made great again with record - breaking cold weather and a precipitous drop in DT number of NNS killed by Sasquatch . PRP have a booming economy , with DT S&P 500 up an unprecedented and certainly record - breaking 18 percent in NNP ’s first 11 month ’s in office , compared with DT S&P 500 VBG up a mere 36.9 percent during Obama ’s first 11 months . ( Any suggestion IN 36.9 is a larger number than 18 is FAKE NN . ) DT bottom line is this : I do n’t VB anyone can argue with how well everything is VBG in America . I imagine PRP ’ll soon see a NNP tweet celebrating this fantastic NN : “ Since taking office I have been very strict on human beings breathing . Good NN — PRP was just reported IN all living human beings were breathing in 2017 . I am amazing and this is all thanks to me ! # MAGA . ” What to read next : NNP ’s misguided ideas about Chicago crime » NNP does n’t have some master plan . text: Recent systematic reviews have highlighted DT lack of quality information with respect to DT epidemiology of equine laminitis , including data on prevalence , inciting causes and risk factors ( Wylie et al 2011a , b ) . DT reported NN frequency has ranged from 1.5 % to 34 % in different studies , with factors such as sample size and type ( e.g. ponies vs. horses ) , underlying laminitis etiology , case definition , modes of diagnosis , NN , and feeding / management practices likely contributing to this wide variation in frequency of laminitis ( Wylie et al. 20011a ) . Hinckley and Henderson ( 1996 ) surveyed veterinarians and horse owners to estimate DT number of acute and chronic laminitis NNS in a population of approximately 113 000 horses and reported about 1700 NNS of both acute and chronic laminitis with an overall prevalence of 3 % . Approximately 61 % of DT laminitis NNS occurred in horses kept at pasture ( Hinckley & Henderson 1996 ) . DT NNP NNPS Department of Agriculture ( USDA ) survey reported IN 13 % of horse operations had had at least CD case of laminitis during DT previous 12 months with 1 % of horses affected at any CD NN ( based on owner responses ) . Laminitis was identified as DT most common cause of foot lameness , accounting for up to 16 % of all lameness NNS . Additionally , nutritionally - associated laminitis accounted for more than 50 % of DT NNS , with 46 % attributed to pasture grazing and 7 % to grain overload ( Kane et al 2000 , USDA 2000 ) . A retrospective NN in DT south of England reported DT prevalence , incidence and seasonality of laminitis in a population of about 1000 horses / ponies kept on a single farm and maintained at pasture ( Menzies - Gow et al 2010a ) . Over a 6 - NN period , 23.5 % of DT population had at least CD episode of veterinary diagnosed laminitis ; DT highest prevalence ( 2.6 % ) and incidence ( 16 NNS / 1000 animals ) of laminitis occurred in NNP . A positive association was found between hours of sunshine and DT prevalence and incidence of laminitis , but EX were no associations with rainfall or monthly temperature . DT association between hours of sunshine and incident laminitis was presumed to reflect altered nutritional intake ( i.e. , increased consumption of nonstructural carbohydrates during periods of bright sunshine WDT promote plant photosynthesis and carbohydrate accumulation ) rather than DT direct effect of exposure of horses to sunlight . Other studies have reported an increased risk of laminitis during DT spring and summer months ( Dorn et al 1975 , Hinckley & Henderson 1996 , USDA 2000 ) although evidence of seasonality is inconsistent ( Polzer & Slater 1997 , Wyllie et al 2011 b ) . Menzies - Gow et al ( 2010a ) RB observed IN approximately CD - third of animals diagnosed with laminitis had at least CD more episode during DT NN period . Moreover , about 24 % of these animals had a repeated episode in DT same NN as DT original diagnosis . These observations confirm DT clinical impression IN some animals are prone to repeated episodes of laminitis ( Buckley et al 2007 ) and focus attention on DT possibility IN EX are phenotypic or genetic factors associated with susceptibility . With regards to genetic factors , laminitis in a foal attributable to disruption of a single molecule of DT hemidesmosome adhesion complex was believed to be DT result of an inherited recessive defect WDT lead to failure in expression of DT protein plectin ( French & Pollitt 2004 ) . Additionally , Belgian foals with mechanobullous NN ( epidermolysis bullosa ) are at an increased risk of laminitis ( Frame et al 1988 ) . In DT NN by Menzies - Gow et al ( 2010a ) , univariate analysis revealed IN animals ≥ 14.3 hands in height were at reduced risk of laminitis while females , light animals ( < 400 kg ) and animals with a weight - to - height ratio < 7.51 kg / in were at higher risk . Female gender RB was a significant risk factor in multivariate analysis , a finding in agreement with several other studies ( Dorn et al 1975 , Alford et al 2001 , Slater et al 1995 ) . DT reason for DT apparent increased laminitis risk in mares is not known . DT height and weight associations with laminitis lend support to DT clinical impression IN ponies are at higher risk as compared to horses , although in multivariate analysis weight but not height was revealed as a significant risk factor ( Menzies - Gow et al 2010a ) . In a prospective NN of pasture - associated laminitis , DT majority of affected animals ( 89 of 107 NNS ) were overweight / obese ( Menzies - Gow et al 2010 b ) . Additionally , overweight animals were at increased risk of severe clinical signs and were less likely to survive . These findings are consistent with earlier reports WDT identified obesity as a risk factor for laminitis ( Alford et al 2001 ) . Increased load bearing by DT feet is CD potential explanation for DT increased risk of laminitis in overweight / obese animals . Several studies have characterized metabolic risk factors for pasture - associated laminitis in ponies ( Treiber et al 2005 , 2006 , Bailey et al 2007 , 2008 , Carter et al 2009 ) . In an inbred herd of Welsh and Dartmoor ponies , laminitis risk was associated with DT clustering of hyperinsulinemia , obesity and hypertriglyceridemia – this phenotype was termed “ prelaminitic metabolic syndrome ( PLMS ) ” ( Treiber et al 2006 ) . DT PLMS criteria predicted 11 of 13 NNS of clinical laminitis observed in NNP of DT same NN , with an odds ratio of 10.4 ( i.e. ponies with this phenotype were at approximately 10 - times higher risk for laminitis ) . Pedigree analysis suggested a dominant mode of inheritance of DT PLMS phenotype , supporting DT possibility of a genetic basis for laminitis predisposition ( Treiber et al 2006 ) . A subsequent NN of this pony population demonstrated IN DT presence of obesity ( generalized or regional , i.e. , cresty neck ) , hyperinsulinemia ( insulin > 32 mU / l when sampled on winter pasture ) or hyperleptinemia ( > 7.3 ng / ml ) were useful predictors of laminitis episodes when ponies were exposed to high carbohydrate pasture ( Carter et al 2009 ) . A NN of out - bred ponies in DT UK RB revealed an association between apparent insulin resistance ( IR ) and predisposition to pasture laminitis , and provided evidence of hypertension in DT high risk ponies ( Bailey et al 2008 ) . Interestingly , expression of this metabolic phenotype was only noted in summer but not winter , suggesting interaction with environmental factors such as consumption of summer pasture forage ( Bailey et al 2008 ) . As mentioned , EMS rather than PLMS has been broadly adopted to describe horses and ponies with an insulin resistant phenotype and associated predisposition to laminitis . These animals are often overweight or obese ( or have localized large fat deposits , e.g. , a “ cresty neck ” ) and exhibit abnormal insulin dynamics , either resting hyperinsulinemia or an exaggerated increase in insulin concentration in response to oral or intravenous glucose challenges ( Frank et al 2010 , Frank 2011 ) . In addition to pony breeds , Morgan Horses , domesticated Spanish mustangs , European warmbloods and American saddlebreds are thought to be at increased risk for development of EMS ; however , currently EX is insufficient evidence to support or refute this belief . PRP should be emphasized IN non -obese animals WDT MD or MD not show IR RB can experience recurrent laminitis .

text: • Four NNS account for more than half of all TB NNS : California , Texas , NNP York and Florida . By DT 1960s , tuberculosis ( TB ) had been almost totally eradicated in DT NNP NNPS . But 50 NNS later , according to a March 20 Reuters article , “ Half a million NNS fell sick with dangerous superbug strains of TB in 2012 , but fewer than CD in four were diagnosed . ” DT NNP NNP Organization has called drug- resistant tuberculosis ( DRTB ) a “ JJ NN crisis , ” predicting IN worldwide two million NNS MD be infected by next NN . If TB was on DT outs , why is PRP coming back now in more virulent strains ? DT culprit ? A massive unregulated flow of lawbreakers crossing our southern border from Mexico and Latin America has led to a resurgence of fatal airborne diseases IN TB WDT attack DT lungs . Cities in DT U.S. such as Los Angeles and Jacksonville , Florida have seen dramatic rises in TB . DT situation has become so dire IN in DT City of Angels , police officers are now advised to wear surgical masks when dealing with illegal aliens . On March 20 , this reporter contacted Salina Smith , a spokesperson for DT Atlanta - based Centers for NNP Control and Prevention , to inquire as to why TB is again plaguing our shores . “ Despite declines among other demographics , DRTB has taken a heavy toll in DT U.S. along racial and ethnic lines , not to mention DT homeless and those infected with HIV , ” VBD Ms. Smith . “ Geographically , four NNS account for more than half of all TB NNS : California , Texas , NNP York and Florida . ” Continuing with specifics , Ms. Smith stated : “ Hispanics and blacks have rates seven - times higher than whites , whereas Asians now exhibit TB rates 26 - times higher than whites . Overall , foreign - born residents are 13 - times more likely to have TB than are U.S. - born citizens . ” Considering IN working - class taxpayers will be forced to foot DT bill for illegals and foreign - born patients , Ms. Smith was asked about DT costs for medicating patients with TB . “ Treating typical TB comes in at $ 17,000 , while costs associated with DRTB rise to $ 134,000 , ” she VBD . “ In NNS of extreme DRTB , PRP ’re looking at $ 430,000 in hospital fees . ” On March 20 , this reporter RB interviewed legendary author , activist and founder of DT conservative - oriented Eagle Forum , Phyllis Schlafly . Having herself written on this subject , Mrs. Schlafly told this newspaper : “ PRP ’s outrageous what ’s happening at our southern border . Why is n’t this administration keeping diseased NNS out ? PRP used to be DT rule at Ellis Island IN if someone was n’t healthy , PRP were sent back home . ” When questioned about this administration ’s open - border policy , Mrs. Schlafly replied : “ Obama does n’t pay attention to DT law . DT American NNS overwhelmingly VBP our borders secured , but I genuinely VBP Obama wants to destroy this nation . ” Mrs. Schlafly added : “ Just imagine how JJ innocent NNS on DT streets and in hospitals are being infected by illegal immigrants . Letting illegals into this country is CD of Obama ’s highest priorities . PRP ’s shocking . ” Lastly , on March 20 , this reporter RB reached out to Sandra Murillo , press officer for Doctors Without Borders . Voicing an undeniable urgency , Ms. Murillo explained : “ PRP ’re calling for immediate action to stop DRTB . This means doctors , pharmaceutical companies and researchers . ” Unfortunately , DT Obama administration ’s refusal to enforce immigration laws while advocating amnesty for upwards of 20 million illegal aliens — JJ afflicted with bacterial infections — will only cause TB rates among these populations to skyrocket . Victor Thorn is a hard - hitting researcher , journalist and author of over 50 books .

text: To achieve hotspot ignition , inertial confinement fusion ( ICF ) implosions must achieve high hotspot internal NN WDT is inertially confined by a dense shell of DT fuel . To accomplish this , implosions are designed to achieve high peak implosion velocity , good NN coupling between DT hotspot and imploding shell , and high areal - density at stagnation . However , experiments have shown IN achieving these simultaneously is extremely challenging , partly because of inherent tradeoffs between these three interrelated requirements . DT Bigfoot approach is to intentionally trade off high convergence , and therefore areal - density , in favor of high implosion velocity and good coupling between DT hotspot and shell . This is done by intentionally colliding DT shocks in DT DT NN layer . This results in a short laser pulse which improves hohlraum symmetry and predictability while DT reduced compression improves hydrodynamic stability . DT results of this campaign will be reviewed and include demonstrated low - mode symmetry control at two different hohlraum geometries ( 5.75 mm and 5.4 mm diameters ) and at two different target scales ( 5.4 mm and 6.0 mm hohlraum diameters ) spanning 300 - 430 TW in laser power and 0.8 - 1.7 MJ in laser NN . Results of DT 10 % scaling between these designs for DT hohlraum and capsule will be presented . Hydrodynamic instability growth from engineering features IN DT capsule fill tube are currently thought to be a significant perturbation to DT target performance and a major factor in reducing its performance compared to calculations . Evidence supporting this hypothesis as well as plans VBG forward will be presented . Ongoing experiments are attempting to measure DT impact on target performance from increase in target scale , and DT preliminary results will RB be discussed . This work was performed under DT auspices of DT U.S. Department of NNP by Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory under Contract DE - AC52-07NA27344 .

text: Enter DT measurement of DT archival materials . Write a simple statement WDT gives DT number of measurement units followed by DT units of measure used . Do not use full sentences . text: What are DT treatment options ? Because molluscum contagiosum is self - limited in healthy individuals , treatment MD be unnecessary . Nonetheless , issues such as lesion visibility , underlying atopic NN , and DT desire to prevent transmission MD prompt therapy . Treatment for molluscum is usually recommended if lesions are in DT genital area ( on or near DT penis , vulva , vagina , or anus ) . If lesions are found in this area PRP is a good idea to visit your healthcare provider as EX is a possibility IN PRP MD have another NN spread by sexual contact . Be aware IN some treatments available through DT internet MD not be effective and MD even be harmful . Physical removal of lesions MD include cryotherapy ( freezing DT lesion with liquid nitrogen ) , curettage ( DT piercing of DT core and scraping of caseous or cheesy material ) , and laser therapy . These options are rapid and require a trained NN care provider , MD require local anesthesia , and can result in post - procedural pain , irritation , and scarring . PRP is not a good idea to try and remove lesions or DT fluid inside of lesions yourself . By removing lesions or lesion fluid by yourself PRP MD unintentionally autoinoculate other parts of DT body or risk spreading PRP to others . By scratching or scraping DT skin PRP MD cause a bacterial infection . Gradual removal of lesions MD be achieved by oral therapy . This technique is often desirable for pediatric patients because PRP is generally less painful and MD be performed by parents at home in a less threatening environment . Oral cimetidine has been used as an alternative treatment for small NNS who are either afraid of DT pain associated with cryotherapy , curettage , and laser therapy or because DT possibility of scarring is to be avoided . While cimetidine is safe , painless , and well tolerated , facial mollusca do not respond as well as lesions elsewhere on DT body . Podophyllotoxin cream ( 0.5 % ) is reliable as a home therapy for men but is not recommended for pregnant women because of presumed toxicity to DT fetus . Each lesion must be treated individually as DT therapeutic effect is localized . Other options for topical therapy include iodine and salicylic acid , potassium hydroxide , tretinoin , cantharidin ( a blistering agent usually applied in an office setting ) , and imiquimod ( T cell modifier ) . Imiquimod has not been proven effective for DT treatment of molluscum contagiosum in NNS and is not recommended for NNS due to possible adverse events . These treatments must be prescribed by a NN care professional . Most therapies are effective in immunocompetent patients ; however , patients with HIV / AIDS or other immunosuppressing conditions often do not respond to traditional treatments . In addition , these treatments are largely ineffective in achieving long - term control in HIV patients . Low CD4 cell counts have been linked to widespread facial mollusca and therefore have become a marker for severe HIV NN . Thus far , therapies targeted at boosting DT immune system have proven DT most effective therapy for molluscum contagiosum in immunocompromised persons . In extreme NNS , intralesional interferon has been used to treat facial lesions in these patients . However , DT severe and unpleasant side effects of interferon , such as influenza - IN symptoms , site tenderness , depression , and lethargy , make PRP a less - than - desirable treatment . Furthermore , interferon therapy proved most effective in otherwise healthy persons . Radiation therapy is RB of little benefit .

text: So far , Gilead Sciences ' Kite Pharma has been buying from contractors DT viral vector material needed for its chimeric antigen receptor T - cell ( CAR - T ) treatment Yescarta . Gilead swept up Kite and Yescarta in a $ 12 billion deal in 2017 . PRP generated $ 264 million last NN but has trailed Novartis ' Kymriah , which won DT first - ever cell therapy approval . text: Most observers MD agree IN DT NNP NNPS has directly or indirectly contributed to DT creation of most of DT international terrorist groups WDT have been in DT NN for DT past thirty NNS . DT narrative of how Osama bin Laden and what was to become al - Qaeda were initially supported by DT U.S. , Pakistan and Saudi Arabia to drive DT Red Army out of Afghanistan is well known . Washington did so with little regard for broader agendas , including removing DT NNP NNPS out of DT Middle East and regime changing DT existing secular and religious Arab NNS in DT region . When DT American supported Holy Warrior Mujahidin were successful beyond their dreams and succeeded in forcing DT Soviets to withdraw during 1998 - 9 , a weak Moscow - supported Mohammad Najibullah regime stayed in power , only to be defeated in 1992 by DT Taliban , who were CD component of DT Islamist groups WDT were being supported by DT U.S. and its partners . DT Taliban soon demonstrated IN PRP too were not willing to be tools of either Islamabad or Washington and eventually provided al - Qaeda and bin Laden with a home , DT casus belli WDT led to DT U.S. attack on Afghanistan after 9/11 . DT U.S. occupation of Iraq followed , based on a similar pretext , i.e. IN Saddam Hussein was in league with terrorists and was preparing weapons of mass destruction WDT threatened DT NNP NNPS . DT deliberate dismantling of Iraqi NN mechanisms coupled with a collapse in its civil society resulting in extreme sectarianism led JJ Sunni Iraqis to join DT next emerging terrorist group , DT Islamic NNP ( IS ) , RB called DT Islamic NNP in Iraq and Syria ( ISIS ) or Daesh . IS was as surely DT product of DT American interventionist tactics in Iraq as were al - Qaeda and DT Taliban earlier in Afghanistan . IS ’s appeal was largely due to its recreation of a territorial NN , which PRP dubbed DT JJ Caliphate . PRP is now facing final defeat at its last remaining enclaves in Iraq and Syria . Soon , PRP will only be a dark memory in those two NNS , a legacy of ruined cities , mass executions , cultural vandalism and torture . PRP is not known if DT Islamic NNP ’s leader Abu Bakr al - Baghdadi is still alive , but DT group , which proved to be particularly astute in its handling of internet generated propaganda , will certainly live on through radical websites and to an extent through its foreign supporters returning to their home NNS to carry out terrorist acts . EX were RB be places in Africa and Asia where IS will continue to have a physical presence on DT ground , to include Sinai and Libya . But , generally speaking , DT group will cease to exist , even though PRP can anticipate IN EX will be successor organizations WDT will benefit from DT IS example and follow a similar pattern to attract recruits . What has changed , however , is DT manner in which IS was defeated . DT NNP NNPS helped create al - Qaeda and DT Taliban and then played a major role in attempting to destroy them after PRP ceased to be useful . Washington did indeed play a part in DT fighting against IS but PRP was generally in support of others IN DT Iraqi Army or Kurdish militias and PRP did not VB seriously engaged due to misgivings about previous interventions and incompatible demands for regime NN in Damascus . So IS was defeated by a coalition of Muslim NNS supported by limited but effective Russian air and NN power , not by some arrangement cobbled together by DT NNP NNPS . Now , DT NNP NNPS , which has lost what little leverage PRP had to participate at DT head table in any discussions to come to a final settlement of DT Syrian crisis is desperately seeking to remain relevant by leaving its troops in DT area and operating through surrogates . But DT big loser in DT defeat of IS will likely be Israel . DT Netanyahu NN , whose overall strategy has been to weaken all of its neighbors by bringing about their fragmentation along sectarian and tribal lines , has assisted both IS and al - Qaeda fighters in Syria against DT country ’s legitimate NN and has repeatedly attacked Syrian Army forces . PRP has been actively supporting Kurdish separatism in Iraq while urging DT NNP NNPS to attack Iran and is now colluding with Saudi Arabia to use both military and JJ force to compel DT Lebanese NN to remove DT political arm of Hezbollah from DT country ’s NN and to disarm DT group . This has created a crescent of battle - tested governments running from DT Caspian NNP to DT Mediterranean – Libya , Syria , Iraq and Iran - which now have particularly good reasons to hate DT Israelis and their meddling in DT region . PRP MD be overreach to suggest IN DT four governments in question will act in unison against Israel because each has particular national interests WDT will drive its policies , but PRP certainly will not make any effort to be accommodating to either Israel or to DT NNP NNPS . DT four nations are VBN by DT experience of their war against IS , by their largely Shi’a populations , and by their appreciation of DT Iranian effort WDT contributed so greatly to their successes on DT battlefield . Once again , DT NNP NNPS has intervened in a conflict in DT Middle East WDT was none of its business and , regarding which , no genuine interests were involved . And behind DT scenes , Israel was encouraging DT unrest for its own reasons . Washington can again walk away from DT mess WDT PRP has created , but will PRP ? Recent comments from Secretary of Defense James Mattis and from Nikki Haley at DT U.N. WDT DT U.S. will keep troops in Syria and will " fight for justice " MD suggest IN DT adults have again left DT room . But someday DT NNP NNPS will either have a reality check or run out of manpower and money and will VB . Israel will have to stick around and is likely to find itself in a really unfriendly neighborhood .

text: DT banking elite VBP what ’s coming to them near term , and PRP have been preparing for multiple scenarios . CD of their original plans is to establish an AI - based population control system dubbed as Technocratic Dictatorship where everyone is hooked up to DT control grid through digitized currency and mass surveillance system , until NNP ’s Huawei came along and arrested their 5G development . Now , PRP are not saying IN EX ’s no possibility IN all of these are just part of an elaborate drama , and NNP is just coasting along with DT imperialists , for whatever power sharing structure PRP MD benefit them .
