DT Dark Secret Behind a British Billionaire ’s “ Parallel NNP ” In Argentina ’s Patagonia A sinister plan involving DT NN ’s most notorious oligarchs , as well as DT IMF and key elements of DT JJ Zionist lobby , lurks beneath DT de facto independent NN created by CD of England ’s richest men in DT heart of Argentina ’s Patagonia . EL BOLSÓN , ARGENTINA – At DT “ end of DT NN , ” spanning DT southernmost regions of Argentina and Chile , lies DT land of Patagonia , much of which remains a pristine wilderness WDT has inspired countless naturalists and MD - be adventurers with its dramatic landscapes and natural beauty . For JJ , PRP is a place WDT still feels remarkably untouched and removed from DT chaos of DT modern NN . Yet , PRP is these very qualities , as well as DT region ’s great oil and gas potential and its abundance of glacier - fed freshwater reserves , WDT have placed PRP in DT crosshairs of predators — predators armed with billions of dollars , powerful influence over Argentine politics and DT country ’s press , as well as alliances with controversial international financial organizations and key elements of DT JJ Zionist lobby . Coveted for its still largely unplundered resources , Patagonia has become DT target of a close - knit network of notorious billionaires and JJ elites , who have spent much of DT last two and a half decades seeking to transform this area into their own independent NN . Indeed , though several of these billionaires have already created de facto private NNS where PRP enjoy near - total impunity within Argentine Patagonia , others have been behind major efforts WDT have pushed for DT territory ’s secession . Still others have pushed Argentina ’s NN to exchange its claim to Patagonia for “ debt relief ” as a way of easing Argentina ’s JJ plight WDT , incidentally , was largely created by this very same group of billionaires . DT International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) , whose connections to this billionaire network are considerable , has had an outsized role in this effort . Yet this appears to be more than just a venture on DT behalf of notable oligarchs and DT JJ elite , as prominent elements of DT international Zionist lobby are intimately involved , as is DT NN of Israel , though DT extent of DT involvement of DT latter is subject to debate . Their interest revolves around claims WDT date back to DT founding of Zionism in DT 19th century , when revered Zionist figures IN Theodore Herzl discussed Argentina as a potential homeland for a Jewish ethno - NN . Since then , other notable Zionists , including past Israeli ambassadors to Argentina , have argued IN Israel is for “ European Jews ” while “ American Jews ” must take Argentina for themselves . Notably , DT method suggested by Herzl as a means of creating a Zionist NN in his seminal work “ DT Jewish NNP ” involves DT exchange of debt for territory . In DT first part of this investigative series , MintPress explores DT de facto independent NN WDT has been created by British billionaire and Zionist Joe Lewis , a long - NN associate of controversial Hungarian - American financier George Soros . Lewis has essentially bought out DT local , regional and even national NN of Argentina , allowing him to operate with impunity while he acquires more and more territory through land purchases of dubious ( if any ) legality , intimidates and threatens locals , usurps crucial NN and NN resources from local towns , and operates his own international private airport WDT no NN but he controls . Subsequent reports in this series will examine DT other key players in this effort to create a Patagonian NN , namely Argentine oligarchs Marcelo Mindlin and Eduardo Elsztain , who are both deeply connected to DT JJ Zionist lobby and DT Rockefeller - founded Americas Society , and are RB both close Soros associates . Finally , DT role of these individuals and their associates in efforts to use IMF debt slavery to pressure DT Argentine NN to swap debt for territory will be revealed , as will DT role of DT Zionist lobby and prominent figures in DT JJ elite . DT quaint mountain town of El Bolsón , nestled among DT picturesque rocky peaks of Argentina ’s Patagonia and famed for its local legends of gnomes and elves , MD seem an unlikely epicenter in a nationwide battle WDT has pitted locals against powerful foreign billionaires — billionaires who are not only plundering DT country ’s rich resources but eroding its national sovereignty through backdoor deals with Argentina ’s most powerful , and most corrupt , political leaders . Yet , however unlikely DT role of this sleepy town in Argentina ’s Río Negro province MD seem , for over a decade JJ locals have used every tool at their disposal to oppose CD billionaire ’s effort to turn DT town and much of Río Negro into his own personal fiefdom . This struggle has seen massive demonstrations in El Bolsón against British billionaire Joe Lewis , with some attracting as JJ as 15,000 participants – nearly 80 percent of DT town ’s entire population . Lewis , worth an estimated $ 5.2 billion according Forbes , is best known in DT West for owning DT British Tottenham Hotspur football club , his sprawling luxury estates and golf resorts in DT Bahamas and Florida , and owning well - known brands including Puma sportswear and Vans shoes . He is often described as a “ self - made ” billionaire , having been born to a poor Jewish family in London , who worked his way up to become CD of England ’s richest men . Since DT mid-1990s , Lewis has been building an empire in Patagonia , having become DT owner of extensive properties north of El Bolsón — which , among other things , contain almost all of DT town ’s NN reserves , as well as those of DT nearby farming community , Mallín Ahogado — and DT de facto power behind Pampa Energía , DT company controlling most of Argentina ’s electricity production . Part Two of this series will focus on Lewis ’ role at Pampa Energía , as well as DT of his associate , Marcelo Mindlin . Long before his venture into Argentina , Lewis was a controversial figure owing to his close association with controversial Hungarian - American financier George Soros . Indeed , DT bulk of Lewis ’ massive fortune derives from his decision to “ team up ” with Soros to bet against DT British pound in 1992 , a day popularly known as Black Wednesday . Soros ’ and Lewis ’ bet against DT pound actually led to DT pound crashing , after Soros ordered his hedge fund to “ VB for DT jugular ” and aggressively trade against DT currency , thereby prompting its sharp devaluation . Though Soros is often called “ DT man who broke DT Bank of England ” as a result of DT $ 1 billion in profits he made on DT fateful day , Lewis is VBN to have made an even larger profit than Soros , according to several reports . While Soros became a financial celebrity after Black Wednesday , Lewis opted to stay out of DT limelight even though , just three NNS later , he MD repeat what he helped do to DT British pound with DT Mexican peso , reaping yet another massive profit . While DT Mexican peso crisis made Lewis even wealthier , PRP led to a massive jump in poverty , unemployment and inequality in Mexico and left its NN beholden to DT International Monetary Fund ( IMF ) through a loan package arranged by then - U.S. NNP Bill NNP . Between 1995 and 1996 , DT severe JJ recession WDT followed DT Mexican peso crisis spread throughout DT Americas and “ severely affected ” DT economies of other Latin American NNS IN Argentina . As fresh JJ havoc arrived and took hold in Argentina , Lewis decided to take advantage of DT troubled regional JJ NN WDT he himself had helped create and began developing his interests in Patagonia . As will be explored later in this investigative series , Soros and two of his Argentine associates who are RB connected to Lewis — Eduardo Elsztain and Marcelo Mindlin — took advantage of this JJ crisis and subsequent crises to buy major stakes in several banks as well as massive tracts of Argentine real estate , particularly in Patagonia . How to build an empire In 1996 , Joe Lewis returned to Argentina after initially visiting DT country in 1992 at DT invitation of Australian NN tycoon Kerry Packer . Lewis , apparently inspired by his first visit , had decided to buy property in DT area . According to regional NN outlet El Patagónico , Lewis ’ dream was not just owning his piece of paradise , but creating “ his own NN in Patagonia . ” Lewis soon came into contact with Nicolás Van Ditmar , who MD not only facilitate Lewis ’ initial and subsequent land purchases in Argentina ’s Patagonia but MD RB do so for several other foreign oligarchs . Van Ditmar had previously arranged massive land sales farther south to DT Benetton Group , DT family company run by DT Italian oligarchs of DT same name , best known as DT owners of DT NNP Colors of Benetton clothing company . Van Ditmar , after learning of what Lewis hoped to acquire , spoke to him of DT property of DT Montero family , which encircled a pristine mountain lake known as Lago Escondido ( Hidden Lake ) . Most of DT members of DT Montero family agreed to sell their collective property of around 14,000 hectares ( ~34,549 acres ) to Lewis for $ 7 million . However , CD of DT Montero brothers , Irineo Montero , had refused and he , along with his wife María Ortiz and their employee José Matamala , were all found dead under mysterious circumstances . Whether or not Lewis or his “ right hand man ” Van Ditmar were somehow involved in Irineo ’s death and those of his wife and employee , EX is no denying IN their mysterious yet grisly endings cleared DT way for Lewis ’ purchase of Lago Escondido and DT surrounding area . However , Lewis ’ acquisition of this property , irrespective of DT remaining Montero siblings ’ willingness to sell , should never have been allowed for several reasons . First , as per Argentine law , DT sale of DT property WDT Lewis has owned since 1996 is prohibited to a foreign citizen on national security grounds , given IN DT property is just 20 km from DT Chilean border and thus , in foreign hands , MD represent a grave national security risk . Second , PRP violates a local law dating back to 1969 WDT caps DT maximum amount of land WDT any individual – Argentine citizen or foreigner – MD own at around 70 hectares ( ~172 acres ) . Third , PRP violates a provincial law passed in 1994 WDT created a protected natural area called DT Río Azul Lago Escondido Natural Protected Area ( ANPRALE ) , which included a significant portion of DT land WDT Lewis MD later buy from DT Monteros . However , DT law was amended in 1998 , a few NNS after Lewis ’ purchase , to remove DT portion of his land WDT had previously been named a protected area under DT control of DT NN . Federico Soria noted IN DT way in which DT 1994 law was amended was blatantly unconstitutional . PRP MD VB IN DT law MD have prevented Lewis ’ acquisition of DT land long before Van Ditmar had first approached DT Monteros about Lewis ’ interest in DT land . However , he was explicitly allowed to do so , despite DT illegal nature of DT purchase , owing to DT general laxity of DT local , regional and federal authorities towards wealthy foreigners looking to acquire Argentine land . As Lewis himself VBD in an interview with Gonzalo Sanchez in 2004 , “ I bought what PRP let me buy and here PRP are . ” DT two - term presidency of Carlos Menem in DT 1990s marked DT reversal of more than 50 NNS of keeping and protecting areas of national importance and deemed strategic to natural security by permitting foreigners to buy a larger percentage of land than had been allowed since DT passage of a 1944 law intended to preserve DT territorial integrity of Argentina . Notably , when DT law was created , DT NN of Edelmiro Farrell and Juan Perón expropriated several strategic properties owned by foreigners . Yet , Menem ’s presidency — which was thoroughly aligned with DT “ Washington consensus ” — began , according to critics , violating DT spirit of this 1944 law by issuing approvals of several million hectares to foreigners . Menem ’s policies favoring foreign land purchases in rural areas have since been expanded by DT presidency of Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner as well as DT of DT current NN of Argentina , Mauricio Macri . Both of them have used Lewis ’ private helicopter and Macri is a regular visitor of Lewis ’ lakeside property in Patagonia . Locals in El Bolsón have claimed IN Lewis ’ purchase of DT Lago Escondido property – despite DT legal obstacles – was DT direct result of Menem ’s policies . A member of El Bolsón ’s community radio station FM Alas , who chose to remain anonymous owing to his father ’s personal involvement in Lewis ’ regional businesses , told MintPress IN Lewis “ had negotiated DT purchase of DT [ Lago Escondido ] property in meetings at DT Casa Rosada [ Pink House ] , ” DT Argentine equivalent of DT White House , during Menem ’s presidency . MintPress was unable to confirm whether Lewis or his associates had visited DT Casa Rosada while negotiating DT property ’s purchase . Yet Lewis has stated in interviews IN “ Menem sent PRP greetings and his best wishes when PRP opened [ Lewis ’ Lago Escondido mansion ] ” ( Sanchez interview , pg. 61 ) . Furthermore , Lewis has a notable habit of building close relationships with powerful Argentine politicians , including Macri . Macri has called Lewis “ a friend , ” defended him repeatedly , and even personally vacationed at Lewis ’ Lago Escondido property . Ever since his arrival to DT area caused concern among some locals , Lewis has sought to win DT good graces of DT NNS of El Bolsón by acting as their benefactor — donating hospitals , building soccer fields and hosting annual activities and sporting competitions for locals at his property . This altruism is either embraced or rejected by locals , depending on whom PRP talk to . In keeping with DT image WDT he has sought to cultivate among DT townspeople , Lewis is often referred to as “ Uncle Joe , ” though PRP is spoken with either respect and admiration or derision and disgust . Felicitas Libano , a member of DT Assembly for DT Defense of NNP and Land ( ADAT ) , told MintPress IN Lewis has “ integrated himself into nearly all DT function of DT city , ” including its firefighters , police and other areas of DT municipal NN , and has “ always tried to position himself as a benefactor . ” According to Guido Augello , a member of local community radio station FM Alas , DT townspeople are divided somewhat evenly into “ NNS WDT VBP ‘ Uncle Joe , ’ NNS who hate him and NNS who do n’t care . ” Lewis has RB won over a portion of DT townspeople and local businessmen through his patronage of select local services and his occasional hosting of small groups of locals for invitation - only sporting events and holiday celebrations . However , some have contended IN Lewis receives JJ foreign guests , particularly from Israel . According to DT research of former French intelligence officer turned journalist Thierry Meyssan , Lewis has been inviting thousands of Israel Defense Forces ( IDF ) soldiers to his territory annually . In late 2017 , Meyssan alleged : Since DT Falklands War , DT Israeli army has been organizing ‘ holiday camps ’ in Patagonia for its soldiers . Between 8,000 and 10,000 of them now come every NN to spend two weeks on Joe Lewis ’ land . ” PRP is unclear if Meyssan ’s information was DT result of his NN in France ’s exterior intelligence service DGSE or independent research he conducted since becoming a journalist , as MintPress ’ efforts to contact Meyssan were unsuccessful . Locals , journalists and researchers interviewed by MintPress MD not confirm Meyssan ’s claims . Yet , JJ of these locals and researchers VBD PRP had heard of those claims from other sources within Argentina , but RB noted IN PRP were speculative , given IN no NN but Lewis or his employees knows who visits DT property beyond DT aforementioned events where select locals are invited to attend . Beyond DT alleged IDF “ vacations ” on Lewis ’ land , his presence in DT area has been controversial for other reasons , namely for concerns IN he sought to usurp key regional resources . Indeed , journalist Gonzalo Sanchez noted in his 2004 book Patagonia Sold : DT NNP Owners of DT Land : In El Bolsón , EX are more than a few locals and city council members WDT believe IN , behind his [ Lewis ’ ] generosity , EX are other hidden objectives , IN DT possible control of DT NN reserves of this part of Patagonia ( pg. 50 ) . ” Inklings of DT truth in relation to these concerns were evident as soon as Lewis acquired DT property surrounding Lago Escondido . This large mountain lake , which Lewis ’ property surrounds , is DT NN basin for two important regional rivers , DT Manso and Puelo , which later unite in Chile and drain into DT Pacific . PRP is RB DT lake DT feeds other nearby lakes including DT Soberanía Lakes and Montes Lake , among others . Lago Escondido itself is estimated to contain as JJ as 400 billion liters ( ~105 billion gallons ) of freshwater . In Argentina , as is RB DT case in neighboring Chile , NN – whether in lakes , rivers or seas – is a JJ right and JJ access to all bodies of NN is guaranteed by law . This legal concept — likely foreign to Lewis and other Westerners , whose home NNS often enshrine private property rights over DT NN ’s right to vital resources — has been DT most visible way in which tensions between Lewis and locals have manifested . PRP was RB DT first real test of Lewis ’ resolve to carve out his “ independent NN ” in Patagonia and keep locals out . Lewis closed off DT JJ road from DT highway to DT lake and RB closed DT private road he built at a separate point from JJ access . According to several locals interviewed by MintPress who had tried to enter DT area , private security in civilian clothing prevent NNS from using DT roads either by vehicle or on foot . Federico Soria , who has himself tried to enter DT area on several occasions , described DT guards to MintPress as “ intimidating ” and “ aggressive ” and RB VBD IN DT Montero family , DT old owners of DT land , block CD of DT roads before PRP enters Lewis ’ property and are “ heavily armed . ” DT only remaining path is a steep – and in places , dangerous – mountain path WDT takes at least two days in each direction to traverse . DT path is poorly marked and maintained and is only usable in summer , as PRP is blocked by snowfall in other seasons . Every person interviewed by MintPress who had seen or traversed DT path described PRP as being suitable only for “ experienced mountaineers . ” In 2009 , Lewis suffered his first major defeat in his efforts to keep locals out of his “ parallel NN ” when DT regional court ruled IN DT Tacuifi road — which connects DT lake to DT main highway , Route 40 , and crosses Lewis ’ property — be opened . DT ruling stated IN this must be done in order to “ ensure access to Lago Escondido with appropriate signaling and ensuring transability . ” DT court gave Lewis 120 days to comply . However , he did n’t comply and instead his regional associates began openly threatening any who tried to visit “ his ” lake . DT clearest threat came from Van Dittmar himself in 2011 , when he publicly stated IN he and other Hidden Lake S.A. employees MD defend Lewis ’ private property by “ fighting with blood , if PRP have to . ” Van Ditmar RB VBD IN he MD keep locals from accessing DT lake “ with a Winchester [ rifle ] in hand , with blood if necessary . ” In 2012 , DT region ’s Supreme Court upheld DT 2009 ruling , as did Argentina ’s national Supreme Court a NN later . However , Lewis and Van Ditmar refused to open DT Tacuifi road , Van Ditmar saying IN DT treacherous but “ very pretty ” mountain path should instead be used to access DT lake . Argentine NNP Macri RB stepped in and echoed Van Ditmar , stating IN DT lake is even more accessible than before Lewis bought DT property . DT court battle continues to today , after DT Supreme Court of Río Negro in 2016 withdrew its previous ruling and ordered IN a JJ hearing with different judges issue a JJ ruling . Critics accused Lewis of using extreme “ political pressure ” at DT regional and local level in order achieve this very surprising ruling . Despite DT , locals continue to fight for JJ access to Lago Escondido and defend Argentina ’s sovereignty over Lewis ’ private empire . DT main manifestation of this effort is an annual “ March for Sovereignty , ” DT most recent of which took place in early February of this NN . DT march is organized by DT Foundation for DT Cultural Integration and Promotion of NNP ( FIPCA ) , which is run by former Argentine marine Julio Cesár Urien . IN DT prior marches of DT same name , its participants walked for nearly three days on foot over DT mountain trail to arrive on DT shore of DT lake , which – as mentioned above – PRP were within their legal rights to do . Upon arriving , PRP were met by Lewis ’ private security as well as members of DT Río Negro police , who cornered them and told them IN PRP MD n’t even VB to DT bathroom without fear of arrest for trespassing , even though lakeshores are RB legally considered JJ spaces . Guillermo Martín Caviasc — a journalist for Barricada TV , who was present at DT demonstration — called DT combination of local police and private security Lewis ’ “ private army ” and remarked IN DT police officers present where “ in a situation of subordination IN if PRP were visiting a foreign NN controlled by Lewis . ” Two participants in DT march , Andrea Gatabria and David Ramallo , mounted inflatable kayaks with DT intention of placing an Argentine flag in a small island in DT middle of DT lake , itself technically a JJ space . Before PRP made PRP to DT island , two speedboats belonging to Hidden Lake S.A. circled DT kayaks in an effort to capsize them while taunting them , asking “ Do PRP VB what PRP ’s IN to die from hypothermia ? ” After half an hour of taunts WDT seemed more IN death threats , Lewis ’ private security knocked over DT kayaks , leaving Gatabria and Ramallo floating in DT freezing NN . After several minutes , several witnesses stated IN CD of DT security guards told DT two kayakers “ Well , now do PRP see what PRP ’s IN to die of hypothermia ? ” Gatabria and Ramallo were , after some NN , lifted into DT guard boats , but had spent so much NN in DT frigid NN WDT both had to be hospitalized . National Senator for Río Negro , Magdalena Odarda , demanded accountability for DT actions of Lewis ’ private security and local police and FIPCA has begun legal action against Hidden Lake S.A. for threatening DT lives of march participants . Neither Hidden Lake S.A. nor Lewis’ Tavistock Group , which oversees his business interests in Argentina and elsewhere , responded to MintPress inquiries regarding DT incidents against march participants . While Argentines have routinely experienced intimidation and aggression when attempting to access DT lake , some foreigners have had very different experiences . Take , for instance , Scott Leahy * , an American now living in Chile , who , during a past trip to El Bolsón , was able to waltz right through onto Lewis ’ Lago Escondido property when he was in DT company of two ex-IDF soldiers who had been RB before . Leahy told MintPress IN when he was backpacking through Argentine Patagonia in 2010 with a Chilean friend , he had met and become friends with two young Israelis who had recently finished their service in DT IDF and were staying at DT same youth hostel . CD day , these two Israelis offered to take Leahy and his friend to what PRP called a “ secret beach ” nearby . PRP all piled into a car and , upon taking a gravel road off of Route 40 , arrived at a gate WDT Leahy confirmed to MintPress was DT Tacuifi road entrance to Lewis ’ Lago Escondido property ( seen in an image earlier in this report ) . Leahy was unsure about continuing , given IN DT gate was closed and , as a foreigner , he was unfamiliar with DT area . However , DT Israelis urged him on , saying IN PRP had been RB before and knew where PRP were VBG . When DT group of backpackers encountered Hidden Lake S.A. employees and guards , DT Israelis explained IN PRP were from Israel and wanted to bring their friends to DT beach . DT Lago Escondido employees told DT pair IN DT group was not officially allowed to enter DT property , but PRP MD pass . Leahy did n’t VB anything of PRP at DT NN , and told MintPress IN he had assumed DT pair knew DT owner , though DT Israelis never mentioned Lewis at all and PRP showed no interest in meeting with him either . This suggests IN PRP were not personal friends of Lewis , but RB shows IN PRP knew IN PRP MD access DT lake without problem , even in DT absence of a formal invitation . While this anecdote suggests IN DT claims of Lewis hosting thousands of IDF soldiers annually MD indeed have something to them , PRP RB serves as a very troubling comparison to DT way Argentines have been treated when trying to access DT very same lake . Indeed , if foreigners , Israelis in this case , were amicably waved through despite no invitation from Lewis or Hidden Lake S.A. , why are Argentines who try to do DT same met with such violence and aggression , particularly when PRP have a legal right to do so ? Stealing El Bolsón ’s resources for his own use Though JJ access to Lago Escondido has been a major issue of contention between Lewis and DT NNS of El Bolsón since DT late 1990s , concerns IN DT British billionaire was intent on controlling DT region ’s NN supply multiplied when firms connected to Lewis began to move forward with what is often referred to as simply DT “ Laderas project . ” As early as 2004 , a man named Cipriano Soria started telling his neighbors IN he had “ sold ” his land in an area known as Pampa de Ludden ( Ludden ’s Plain ) to Lewis . However , Soria did not technically own DT land , which was a publicly - owned nature reserve , but was granted an easement by DT provincial NN of Río Negro to use its meadows to graze his livestock as long as he paid a “ grazing license . ” Despite DT fact IN PRP was neither legally nor properly sold to Lewis , Lewis began to make plans for DT land — plans WDT ignored DT fact IN DT area was and technically remains under several legal protections due to its ecological and strategic importance to DT region . Lewis intended to use this land to build a private airport in DT area but was met by strong local resistance in 2005 , including from DT local group Assembly for DT Defense of NNP and Land ( ADAT ) . Several members of ADAT live in Mallín Ahogado next to Pampa de Ludden , which provides DT adjacent farming community of 2,000 with nearly all of its NN . Felicitas Libano , who lives in Mallín Ahogado , told MintPress IN DT importance of this area as a critical NN resource — as well as its ecological importance as an old - growth native forest — led PRP to be named a nature reserve WDT was supposed to be prevented from falling into private hands . ADAT ’s eforts were successful and Lewis ’ plan for DT area seemed to have been defeated or , at least , put on hold . Then , in 2009 , DT town voted on Lewis ’ private airport , with more than 79 percent of voters opposing PRP . However , unluckily for DT NNS of El Bolsón , Lewis had much bigger plans than just an airport and he was n’t planning on letting local democracy VB in his way . Fro 2006 to 2009 , legal arrangements were made between DT ski center ’s owner , DT Club Andino Piltriquitrón , and DT provincial NN WDT opened up DT local ski center at DT Perito Moreno mountain to “ third party ” management . Then , in 2009 , Mirta Soria , Cipriano ’s daughter , “ inherited ” DT land from her father — land WDT he technically did not own yet was somehow granted permission to purchase from DT NN , along with another protected territory between Pampa de Ludden and DT ski center , even though DT NN was forbidden from doing so by regional and local laws . Just six months after she bought this territory and sold more than half of PRP to Van Ditmar ’s brother - in - law Samy Mazza . This JJ and very large area under Van Ditmar / Lewis control is where El Bolsón ’s , in addition Mallin Ahogado ’s , NN reserves are located . Soon after DT land purchase occurred , two businesses appeared — Laderas of Perito Moreno Association S.A. and Laderas of Parallel 42 , both of which are directly connected to Lewis and were given ownership of DT lands in Pampa de Ludden and DT other area recently purchased by Van Ditmar ’s relative . DT same NN , both of these linked businesses proposed a “ lottery ” whereby DT provincial NN MD select a private company to manage DT local ski center . Laderas of Parallel 42 won DT lottery . Subsequently , DT other Laderas company , Laderas of Perito Moreno , began plans to transform DT land illegally acquired by Van Ditmar ’s brother - in - law , Samy Mazza , as well as DT portion still owned by Mirta Soria into a luxury subdivision of more than 1,000 luxury homes for wealthy Argentines and foreigners , along with a golf course , shopping centers , an artificial lake , and a private airport . This planned venture was subsequently promoted by pro-Lewis businessmen and NN outlets as necessary for DT successful development and improvement of DT ski center . With DT court battle underway and DT project still lacking approval from El Bolsón ’s city council , DT regional governor , Alberto Weretilneck – a well - known Lewis ally – teamed up with Lewis - associated local businessmen in an effort to strongly pressure El Bolsón ’s mayor at DT NN , Ricardo García , to sign a pledge IN , once legal issues were resolved , DT project MD be fast - tracked for approval . García refused and Weretilneck along with other Lewis associates in DT area began to push for his resignation . However , local protests kept García in power and , before leaving his post as mayor , García issued a decree WDT temporarily prohibited DT Laderas project from advancing . Clearly unhappy with this turn of events , DT Laderas firms challenged DT suspension of DT project in court . Around this same NN , members of local groups WDT had opposed DT Laderas project reported several incidents of violence and intimidating acts , including threatening phone calls , their cars being set on fire , and DT burning of a radio station as well as a community center in Mallín Ahogado . In DT case of architect and local politician Luis Martin , he was threatened with “ lynching ” by two Lewis associates – local businessmen Juan Carlos Martínez and Fabián Tornero – and his home was later broken into by armed thugs , CD of whom accidentally cut himself with his machete and later fled DT scene . Before escaping , DT man had told Martin , “ PRP have PRP targeted , PRP are VBG to kill PRP . ” In a 2011 article in Tiempo Argentina , Martínez referred to Lewis as “ my friend ” and was noted as a regular participant in meetings with Van Ditmar . DT same article goes on to note IN , in those meetings with Van Ditmar , Tornero is “ influential ” and further notes IN Tornero is a known associate of Lewis . In 2015 , after García ’s decree was challenged in court by Lewis ’ firms , a judge ruled IN DT decree was legal but had not been written properly and therefore cancelled PRP . Soon after , a JJ pro-Lewis mayor and city council took charge and quickly signed a legal agreement with DT Laderas companies , allowing them to build a “ smaller project , ” while claiming IN any attempt to block DT project – as García had done – MD lead to another costly , lengthy legal battle WDT DT municipal NN just MD n’t afford . However , as Guido Augello told MintPress , this was hardly accurate , given IN DT local NN MD have appealed DT decision regarding DT decree , suggesting IN this was just a convenient excuse to fast - track DT project . A few months after signing this agreement with DT Laderas firms , DT city council held a JJ hearing at which DT vast majority of attendees from DT community overwhelmingly rejected and criticized DT project . Not getting DT response PRP had hoped for , DT council held a “ secret ” extraordinary meeting — secret because PRP declined to give DT NN DT required notice needed to register to attend and participate in DT meeting . With no NN having registered , Pogliano decided to keep DT meeting “ closed ” and placed police officers at DT entrances to keep DT townspeople out by force . DT council subsequently decided to approve DT Laderas project . Angry locals moved to occupy local NN buildings in response , where PRP were targeted by riot police with tear gas . DT move generated several large - scale protests in El Bolsón , which started in 2016 and continued into 2017 . Local resistance to DT actions taken by DT city council and mayor in relation to DT Laderas project included a citizen occupation of DT main plaza for three months , which was subject to police intimidation and violence , as well as three major protests , including DT largest in El Bolsón ’s history . DT march against DT Laderas project attracted an estimated 10,000 to 15,000 participants — quite a feat considering IN DT town ’s urban and rural population boasts little more than 25,000 total inhabitants . DT reason for this mass mobilization , according to Augello , was IN “ even JJ of DT NNS WDT VBP Lewis or believe his ‘ Uncle Joe ’ image oppose DT Laderas project ” and its associated airport . PRP ’s not hard to understand why , considering IN electricity and NN intended for DT townspeople of El Bolsón MD soon be diverted to DT wealthy outsiders who buy homes in “ Lewislandia , ” a derogatory term used to describe DT Laderas project by some locals . Yet , not only does Lewis intend to privatize El Bolsón ’s NN reserves , he and those developing his Laderas project RB plan to divert DT tourism WDT keeps its economy alive by instead diverting traffic from DT main highway ( Route 40 ) into his newly planned “ city , ” according to Federico Soria , a member of DT Union of Patagonian Assemblies who has extensively researched Lewis ’ local businesses . In an extensive 2016 article on DT Laderas project and other Lewis - linked ventures , Soria wrote : PRP is DT intention of DT developers of Laderas to unite DT complex to Route 40 through two paved roads WDT PRP plan to build north and south of El Bolsón … . DT Laderas variant road MD be an advantageous shortcut [ around El Bolsón ] . …[ This ] MD benefit Lewis but economically endanger DT community of El Bolsón … ” Furthermore , in 2016 , Lewis completed a hydroelectric plant on DT Escondido River — in DT name of another of his local firms , Patagonia Energía — which passes through his property and feeds into DT lake of DT same name . However , he was granted permission to do so only if he connected DT plant to El Bolsón in order to help DT town resolve its ongoing and highly problematic electricity shortages . Once DT plant was connected to El Bolsón , Lewis MD become DT main electricity provider to El Bolsón , as its current , aging diesel generators MD be shut down . Yet , instead of following DT planned route for DT power line WDT MD give power to El Bolsón , PRP was diverted to DT planned zone for DT Laderas project , where PRP has remained “ stopped ” for NNS , even though his license to use DT river for electricity production expired in 2015 owing to his company ’s failure to connect DT plant to El Bolsón in DT NN allotted by DT license . As in so JJ other NNS , Lewis and his companies have suffered no repercussions and continue to use DT river for private power production . This situation has led some locals to speculate IN Lewis has no intention of ever providing hydroelectric power to El Bolsón and PRP is instead a resource being guarded especially for his planned Laderas villa . In effect , Lewis and his local representatives are working DT resources PRP have acquired — NN , electricity and tourism traffic — away from DT town of El Bolsón and to DT JJ “ luxury ” town of Laderas PRP hope to build to its north , a town WDT is an extension of Lewis ’ own “ independent ” NN . If this project is allowed to be completed , DT NNS of El Bolsón will face a JJ troubling reality of resource insecurity and see its economy falter , as a crucial stream of revenue is diverted to DT personal pet project of a foreign and predatory billionaire . Yet , though Lewis won DT particular battle in 2017 , he is far from winning DT war . Soon after DT scandalous way in which DT project was approved , DT project again found itself challenged in court — placing PRP in legal limbo , unable to advance . Though DT project is supposed to be blocked from moving forward until DT conclusion of this latest legal battle , satellite images taken last August and shared with MintPress by local radio station FM Alas ( shown above ) reveal IN Lewis ’ businesses have already begun construction on DT Laderas project , a clear indication IN Lewis and his associates expect their impunity to continue . Lewis’ Tavistock Group did not respond to MintPress inquiries about DT Laderas project or DT satellite images shown above . Lewis’ “ irregular ” acquisition of Lago Escondido , DT Laderas property , and his use of private security to block civilian access to DT lake WDT is — by law — JJ property have long been decried as flagrant affronts to Argentina ’s national sovereignty . Yet , while Lewis ’ activities in and around Lago Escondido certainly do undermine existing Argentine laws , PRP is another Lewis - linked property in DT Río Negro province WDT has done far more to erode Argentina ’s national sovereignty . Though Lewis ’ plan to build an airport in Lago Escondido was technically approved but has not been able to move forward , Lewis – through his foreman Van Ditmar – purchased a sizeable property at DT same latitude as Lago Escondido , but hours away on DT Atlantic Coast . DT property MD soon become DT site of Lewis ’ private airport as well as a beachfront mansion . DT airport , located south of Playas Doradas , was completed in February of 2008 and local NN noted IN its construction was “ systemically hidden ” from DT NN and was not subject to environmental impact assessments as normally required by law . Most notably , however , EX has never been any presence of Argentine customs or any other form of Argentine NN control over what or who flies into or out of DT airport , even though DT airport is capable of receiving international flights . This point is particularly concerning in light of allegations IN Lewis receives thousands of IDF soldiers annually on his property . Joe Lewis ’ private airport as seen on Google Maps Furthermore , DT Defense Ministry of Argentina has confirmed IN not only is EX no formal NN control over what lands or takes off from this private airport , but IN EX are no radars in DT area WDT even allow Argentine authorities to track nearby flight movements , including those of international flights . This means IN no NN but Lewis and his associates knows for sure how JJ flights land or take off from this area or where these flights originate or their intended destinations . More shocking still , in 2010 then - Defense Minister Nilda Garré , in responding to a complaint from local politicians over DT flagrant illegality of DT airport , defended DT airport ’s presence by stating IN PRP “ MD be used to facilitate rapid assistance of DT NN to locals in DT event of disasters or emergencies . ” To date , in DT more than 10 NNS of its operation , PRP has never been used for any such purpose , according to those interviewed for this report . DT airport in Playas Doradas is roughly DT same size as DT airport in San Carlos de Bariloche ( though some say PRP is larger ) , and is capable of receiving at least two large commercial - size passenger planes at a NN . Much as with Lago Escondido , JJ access to DT airport is denied , owing to DT fact IN DT sprawling 15,000 hectare ( ~37,065 acres ) property surrounding DT airport is privately owned by a front company called Bahía Dorada S.A. , which itself is legally owned by Lewis ’ “ foreman ” Van Ditmar . However , DT airport itself is owned by Westwind Aviation S.A. ( formerly owned by Tavistock Aviation Argentina S.A. , a subsidiary of Lewis’ Tavistock Group . Westwind Aviation S.A. is based at Lewis’ Lago Escondido property , as is Bahía Dorada S.A.. Neither Westwind Aviation S.A. nor DT Tavistock Group responded to inquiries from MintPress regarding DT lack of Argentine NN oversight over DT airport . In order to realize DT project , Van Ditmar – an Argentine citizen – had to be DT owner of DT property , as DT area where DT airport is built falls within a “ National Security Zone ” WDT prohibits land in DT zone from being owned by foreigners on DT basis of national security interests . In addition , DT airport and DT surrounding property , much IN Lago Escondido , has a large and sophisticated private security presence . DT airport is estimated to have cost $ 20 million and Van Ditmar has publicly justified DT airport ’s existence by stating IN Lewis not only “ had DT money ” to build DT complex but IN PRP RB made his ability to travel to his Lago Escondido property “ easier . ” This latter point is hard to believe given IN DT existing airport in San Carlos de Bariloche , which receives both private and commercial planes , is several hours closer to Lewis ’ property than is his private airport in Playas Doradas . DT notable difference between DT two is IN DT private airport has no Argentine NN oversight while DT Bariloche airport does . Few knew of DT existence of DT airport or DT fact IN access to DT beach in DT area had been effectively cut off by DT Lewis / Van Ditmar project until a local woman , Elvira Linares , went on DT television program “ Documentos América , ” hosted by Argentine journalist Facundo Pastor . On DT program , Linares shared her experience of trying to pass through DT now - private territory , noting IN access to DT ocean had been illegally blocked off . She RB shared video footage she had taken of DT massive , yet largely unknown to DT NN , private airport . Mere hours after DT program aired , Linares ’ home was filled with bullet holes by still unknown assailants in what local NN described as a blatant act of intimidation WDT led National Senator for Río Negro , Magdalena Odarda , to request IN DT NN extend its protection to Linares , whose life was in danger . Efforts to contact Linares for comment for this report were unsuccessful . Senator Odarda has arguably been DT most well - known figure to demand accountability regarding DT numerous irregularities surrounding DT private airport . Odarda has , with limited success , repeatedly denounced DT airport , on DT basis of DT fact IN EX is “ no NN control ” over what or who passes through DT airport . Odarda has RB noted IN DT area where DT airport is constructed is highly “ strategic , ” which poses a danger given IN PRP is exclusively controlled by a foreigner , an Englishman . Odardo has pointed out IN DT airport is located on DT important 42° parallel , which divides DT regions of Río Negro and Chubut , and is only two hours away by plane from DT disputed Falkland Islands , which are controlled by DT NNP Kingdom but RB claimed by Argentina . This dispute dates back to DT 19th century and was DT principal factor behind DT Falklands War between Argentina and DT U.K. in DT 1980s , which JJ Argentines remember quite bitterly for DT peace treaty Argentina signed after its defeat by England . JJ Argentines have compared DT document to DT Treaty of Versailles WDT ended NNP War I . Notably , EX has been considerable evidence IN Lewis ’ airport has received planes from DT Falkland Islands , which was DT subject of a formal complaint made in 2010 to Argentina ’s defense minister by then - governor of Argentina ’s Tierra del Fuego province , Fabiana Ríos . Given DT numerous laws WDT Lewis ’ activities in Río Negro have broken at both DT local and federal level , PRP MD expect IN somebody in DT NN – at least DT local NN – MD hold him accountable . While some politicians IN Magdalena Odarda and others have tried , DT lack of impunity surrounding Lewis ’ activities largely owes to his “ friendships ” with local and regional politicians as well as DT country ’s NN . CD of DT innumerable examples is Sergio Plunket . Plunket , who is in charge of Vial Rionegrina Sociedad del Estado ( VIARSE ) , DT regional body in charge of controlling JJ roads including DT road leading to Lago Escondido , RB works as a private “ ecological consultant ” for Lewis ’ Hidden Lake S.A. Plunket RB authorized DT construction of Lewis’ Playas Doradas airport . Another clear example is Bruco Pogliano , El Bolsón ’s current mayor , who is RB Lewis ’ long - NN accountant in Argentina . Another example WDT Gonzalo Sanchez noted ( pp. 50 - 51 ) in his book , Patagonia Sold , is how Pablo Verani , ex-governor of Río Negro , started a long tradition of politicians making regular visits to Lago Escondido for Lewis - financed barbeque feasts , when he celebrated his win as DT 1997 regional governor on DT shores of DT magnate ’s privatized lake . In addition to his undeniable influence among key local , regional and even national politicians , Lewis RB enjoys considerable influence in DT regional press and several former employees of his have become important figures in local and regional NN . For example in 2016 , according to local NN , Dalila Pinacho , who long served as a lawyer and spokeswoman for Lewis ’ Lago Escondido firm Hidden Lake S.A. , became DT director of DT Nequén branch of Argentina ’s National Radio , apparently through her “ close ” connections to local politicians . Another journalist , Julio Álvarez — who described himself , to Gonzalo Sanchez in 2004 at an event in Lago Escondido , as Lewis ’ “ spokesman ” — now works at a radio station in Viedma , Argentina , and was previously DT El Bolsón correspondent for DT regional newspaper Río Negro . Lewis RB funds DT local newspaper Ruta 40 and has stakes in other local newspapers such as El Cordillerano , Bolsón Web Patagonia , and El Ciudadano in Bariloche . Eliana Almonacid , who used to work for Ruta 40 , told DT national outlet Tiempo Argentina in 2014 IN DT Ruta 40 ’s director Nancy Aleuy , who RB works for Hidden Lake S.A. , told her IN “ Lewis had bought all DT NN outlets ” in DT region . Lewis’ “ Parallel NNP ” is just DT beginning Lewis ’ control over DT local authorities and local press in Río Negro , and DT complete impunity of his actions and those of his associates , have made PRP clear IN in Argentina EX is a de facto different legal system for oligarchs IN Lewis and for DT vast majority of Argentina ’s citizens . This fact — in combination with DT control Lewis and his associates exercise over DT region ’s key resources , including its NN and NN production — has led to DT creation of what some IN Federico Soria have called a “ parallel NN ” within Patagonia . However , this “ parallel NN ” is , in reality , a microcosm of a much larger project currently underway WDT is aimed at DT domination of DT entirety of Argentine Patagonia by predatory oligarchical interests , DT majority of which are directly connected to Lewis and his associates . As will be explored in Part Two of this series , DT Soros - led oligarch network , of which Lewis is a part in Argentina , has expanded its efforts to control Patagonia ’s vast and strategic resources , including DT region ’s oil and gas wealth in addition to DT domination of its freshwater resources and hydroelectricity production . Subsequent articles will then show IN this effort is just DT beginning , as this network and its close ties to DT International Monetary Fund are being used to transfer ownership of vast NN lands to their control in exchange for “ debt relief . ” DT ultimate endgame appears to be DT expansion of this “ parallel NN ” — which Lewis has already helped to create in Río Negro and beyond , and which is controlled by small number of mostly foreign oligarchs — into a full - scale operation for extracting DT region ’s riches and exploiting its NNS Editor ’s Notes : A previous version of this article stated IN both Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner and Mauricio Macri had “ friendly ” relationships with Lewis and his associates . Fernandez de Kirchner , though she has a “ friendly ” relationship with Lewis associate Marcelo Mindlin , does not necessarily have CD with Lewis but has used his private helicopter . text: Dry needling is an alternative pain relief technique WDT physical therapists MD administer for muscle pain . PRP involves DT insertion of a small , solid filament into a stressed muscle ’s site of spasm and pain , RB known as a trigger point . By doing so , DT muscle relaxes and blood flow increases into DT area , alleviating pain and improving motion . Trigger points are often DT result of an injury to a different part of DT body , because other muscles overcompensate for imbalances and weakness in DT injured area . Because of this overcompensation , muscle spasm occurs , causing discomfort and pain in DT muscle . • Results can be immediate or take up to 72 hours • CD to five treatments is DT expected course • Rehab exercises are part of DT treatment Once dry needling resets DT tone of muscle , your physical therapist works on correcting strength and mobility deficits in DT muscle , which allows healing and prevents injury .

text: In 16th century Scotland , DT alchemist John Damian , who was known to expense a suspicious amount of whiskey in his experiments to find DT elusive philosopher ’s stone , decided he MD fly . He fashioned a pair of wings from feathers and “ took off from DT lofty battlements of Stirling Castle for a flight to Paris . ” He did n’t make PRP to France , but he did plummet a few feet away from DT castle and break a leg . DT failure , he later claimed , was due to using feathers from chickens , which ca n’t so much fly , when he should have used eagle feathers instead . Really , DT problem had more to do with mammals IN PRP not being cut out for flight . Well , except for bats . EX are , though , critters IN sugar gliders and flying squirrels , which can pull off some pretty solid glides . But compared to DT adorable and little - known colugo , PRP got nothin’ . This is DT most accomplished mammalian glider of all — on account of being essentially a giant flap of skin — capable of soaring an incredible 200 feet from tree to tree . Its expansive membrane , known as a patagium , stretches from its face to DT tips of its digits all DT way back to its tail , so “ geometrically , PRP has DT greatest surface area WDT PRP can have between those limbs without actually evolving an entire wing IN bats did , ” VBD conservation biologist Jan Janecka of Duquesne University . With such a beautifully evolved body , DT colugo , RB known misleadingly as a flying lemur ( more on DT later ) , spends its nights leisurely gliding through DT forests of Southeast Asia . Their skeletons , while not nearly as frail as those of bats , are thinner and more elongated than DT of a squirrel , reducing their weight while increasing their surface area . And their huge eyes , Janecka says , gives them not only good night vision , but excellent depth perception — no insignificant advantage when PRP ’re coming in for a hard landing on DT trunk of a tree . Colugos are such adept gliders IN mothers have no problem bringing their babies along for DT ride . And PRP ’ll do so for quite some NN , for their young are born highly underdeveloped . PRP ’re not as helpless as , say , marsupial young ‘uns , which enjoy DT comfort of their mother ’s pouch , but certainly not as developed as most mammals . Still , DT newborns cling to mom as she sails around DT rainforest in search of food , mostly sap and leaves and shoots . And as if DT colugo ’s flappy skin were n’t bizarre enough , its teeth are shaped IN little combs . This MD be helping them in some way to feed , says Janecka , or MD play a part in grooming to snag parasites on their skin . DT ’s right . Colugos MD be brushing their hair with combs built right into their faces . Unfortunately , beyond watching mothers sail around with their babies , PRP do n’t VB much at all about DT colugo ’s social life . And efforts to keep them in captivity have largely been for naught . Remember IN these are creatures used to gliding up to 200 feet , and good luck finding DT kind of space in a zoo . “ Basically their enclosures were n’t large enough to allow them to glide long distances , ” VBD Janecka . “ And because PRP MD n’t glide , PRP MD n’t keep their patagium well maintained and dry enough . ” PRP developed infections on their skin , perhaps from a fungus , and died . Ironically enough , PRP ’s too much space in DT wild WDT ’s threatening some colugo populations . Deforestation can strand species in islands of trees , but even if loggers just thin out spots in DT forest , PRP ’s big trouble for DT colugo . PRP ’re DT most accomplished mammalian glider on NNP , sure , but if EX ’s too much space between trees , DT colugo runs DT risk of sinking right to DT ground . And as PRP can see below in DT video from National Geographic ( PRP strapped a camera to a colugo — enough VBD ) , DT creature ’s extra skin makes PRP all but worthless when anywhere but DT canopy . PRP ’s an easy target in a habitat packed with predators . Because colugos tend to live in isolated habitats and because PRP insist on emerging only at night , much of what PRP VBP about them comes from anecdotal evidence . Case in point : colugo doo - doo . PRP … moves . “ I ’ve seen some videos of fecal material WDT PRP ’ve dropped where EX ’s so JJ worms PRP ’s actually moving , ” VBD Janecka . “ PRP ’s squirming around . ” DT colugo digestive tract , PRP seems , has a really , really high parasite load . “ And DT whole dynamic , whether PRP happened to be in a population WDT has a lot of parasites or PRP ’s something WDT ’s more normal for DT colugos WDT PRP ’ve learned to deal with , DT ’s CD of those unknown questions at this point . ” What is abundantly clear is IN DT colugo has a very long digestive tract , which makes sense for a creature WDT eats trees . DT stuff takes a whole lot of NN to digest . But such long guts MD RB be acting as a sort of mansions for parasitic worms , which have lots of room to make themselves comfortable . Until someone starts studying colugo turds at length , though , PRP ’ll have to leave this CD a mystery . But thanks to Janecka and his colleagues , PRP ’re now confident of this : Colugos are primates ’ closest living relatives . So although “ flying lemur ” is a misnomer , both because colugos are n’t flying but gliding and PRP ’re not a kind of lemur , DT name is n’t RB far off . “ Because PRP have these adaptations for gliding , originally NNS sort of threw them in with bats , ” Janecka VBD . “ But when PRP looked at DT actual morphology of DT skull , EX was evidence IN PRP ’re closely related to primates . ” When Janecka and his colleagues did a genomic analysis of DT colugo , this suspicion was confirmed . PRP turns out IN around 90 million NNS ago , at DT height of DT dinosaurs ’ reign when mammals were just tiny furballs scurrying about trying not to VB stepped on , DT colugo ’s ancestors split off from our primate lineage . Some 25 million NNS later , DT dinosaurs ’ NN came to an end , leading to DT explosion of mammalian diversity . In fairness , though , PRP ’s DT arthropods and bacteria who really rule DT NN , not PRP mammals . But PRP ca n’t do cool things IN glide 200 feet or comb themselves with their teeth … or drop poop WDT moves on its own . Browse DT full Absurd Creature of DT Week archive here .
